title: Efficient system and staff.
desc: Stayed for 3D2N to celebrate our son's 1st birthday. Check in was a breeze, facility booking via qr code was definitely an upgraded system from other hotels that we have stayed at. Kudos for this innovation! Hotel was comfortably quiet especially with the greeneries cushioning the city and road noise. Ms Amy from Lime restaurant was the highlight of our stay as she took the initiative to get personal with our baby to constantly check if he is fine and requires additional assistance (over anything at all). She deserves a commendation for the extra mile she took in the line of customer service. Overall a great hotel to stay at!

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: A first at this hotel for birthday celebration. Manage to book the handicap room. Spacious and handicap friendly. All touch switches. Steady. Room was clean n nice. Variety of view from n outside the room. Spacious dress in lobby. Check in was fast. Welcomed with complimentary plate of sweets/cakes in room. Very new b nice environment. Strongly recommend you stay here at least once. Walking distance to all places in Chinatown and city Center. Very convenient indeed.

title: Pretty good!
desc: Had a 2 night staycation here with friends. Room was decent, comfortable and housekeeping requests were usually pretty prompt through the mobile chatbot. That said, the buffet dinner unfortunately has slipped in standards in recent years/due to the current restrictions so if you are going to visit the Lime for lunch or dinner, will suggest you spring for the ala carte menu instead.

title: My experience in PARKROYAL
desc: So it was my family’s trip to Singapore and after we took a cab from airport to parkroyal hotel first we check in the room was spacious and i liked it And as much as I told in other reviews I’m not telling that much because that was in 2019 and I was 7 years old soo I don’t remember that much ok But I can tell you that it was a good, fun trip and experience in PARKROYAL You should also visit it in Singapore THANKYOU

title: Good experience with Serene n team
desc: Great experience and delightful experience after a poor start! I had a poor experience to start off a weekend celebration for my wife's birthday. This was specially planned for together with full itinerary, only to have it go out of plans when hotel forgotten to prep the room and deliver the cake. Have informed the counter and yet another disappointment. However this was patched by Serene and her whole team who wrote my wife a sincere birthday card and presented a birthday cake as appreciation. We had the chance to patron the club as a kind gesture. Thank you Serene and her team for making it a pleasant stay.

title: Wedding Banquet at Park Royal Pickering
desc: Just finished our wedding reception at Park Royal Pickering! Wedding planning and the execution of the actual day event was made easy by two very capable Sales Manager - Jarlyn and the actual day Banquet Manager Jason, who are very experienced and made sure all grounds are covered well. Jarlyn replies to our queries even at midnight, what a professional! Jason has a calming presence and helped us feel at ease throughout the event! Highly recommended to choose Park Royal Pickering for hosting your Big Day!

title: Chinatown Green Hotel
desc: I love this hotel because it is strategically located right in front of Hong Lim Green. It is also opposite the Hong Lim Food Market which has famous local food. You can also roam around Chinatown and check out all the streets. Hotel itself has plenty of greenery although it is an urban style hotel. The pool and surroundings really look different from other urban style hotels. Always make sure you get a room facing the hong lim park rather than looking into all the shophouse roofs. A stones throw from Chinatown Point and also Peoples Park Complex + the City Center which is still walking distance to Boat Quay and Clark Quay.

title: Over Charged us 330sgd for the spilled wine over the Pillows and Bed sheet.
desc: I know i made a mistake spilling the wine on the bed but They overcharged us 330sgd for the spilled wine over the Pillows and Bedsheet, I think its so unfair to charge us that much, So disappointing and inconsiderate. The experience for birthday celebration that’s suppose to be fun end up into nightmare thanks to the inconsiderate manager!!!

title: Gratifying 3D2N Staycation!
desc: Had a 3D2N Staycation at Parkroyal Pickering, overall the experience exceeded expectations. Check in: Easy fast check-in with early check-in granted for weekday check-in. Service staff near the door greets us everytime we enter or exits the hotel, making us feel welcomed. Breakfast at Lime: Buffet is back! After staying so many hotels, this is the first that I've encountered during this covid period. Of course with safety measures (panels to avoid contamination, staff helping you to take the items that you would like to have). The breakfast has pretty a good spread given the situation now: Asian hot food (dim sum, nasi lemak, noodles, congee), Western hot food (standard eggs, hash brown, tomatoes etc.), salads, bread, fruits.. Service staff is prompt to serve, refill drinks

title: Excellent service and hospitality
desc: Had a wonderful anniversary celebration at lime. The waitress Soo Yoke Lin was extremely thoughtful and provided excellent hospitality service. It was a wonderful night and will definitely come back again for the service.

title: Strongly recommended
desc: Overall stay was lovely with great services provided and friendly and helpful staffs. Every request made and questions asked were responded professionally and felt as if they are putting themselves in customer's shoes. Detailed housekeeping with additional effort done outside of standard procedures. This pleasant stay is definitely made possible with parkroyal collection pickering staffs, from concierge (assisted me with proposal plan), club lounge staffs and chef ( making club access experience a warm and enjoyable one), housekeeping team and ONE CONNECT staffs who will assist with room requests and follow up again to ensure request has been completed. For it, it is definitely a choice I would consider again for a vacation or staycay. Aside from service, collection signature

title: Excellent location and service
desc: Excellent location and service. Room is clean and comfortable. Glad to receive a complimentary birthday cake from the hotel with handwritten birthday greetings from the GM, greatly appreciated! Hassle free check-in and checkout process and all the staff are friendly! An enjoyable staycation! 😊

title: Great place to chill
desc: Friendly and welcoming staffs! Super nice room to live in, quiet and eco-friendly hotel. Will definitely be back. Loving the vibes here, free complimentary parking if you're a guest here! Wish I had booked more days

title: Excellent Service!
desc: Excellent service by the team, Chef Thye, Chef Sylvia, Chef Edmund, Jaycelle, Samuel, Jensah, and Christina! Told Samuel that it’s my boyfriend’s birthday and asked if they could present a cake at the very last minute (during the evening cocktails). He got everything arranged and sent a little cake to the room together with a card! Thank you so much for putting in the effort and making arrangements despite the last minute notice. Had a wonderful stay at Park Royal Collection Pickering, hope to be able to come back next time. The staff at the Collection Club Lounge were really hospitable and helpful. Wonderful job! Thank you for making our stay a great one!! 😊 Boyfriend is a vegetarian so they specially prepared pasta on the first evening cocktail session and fried rice on the

title: Staycation for our anniversary
desc: The whole experience is great. Comfortable bed, nice food, great service by the staffs make us feel so welcomed. Location is near to shopping centre and Chinatown station too. Lots of good food around the area! Highly recommended and we will definitely be back.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: The main reason for choosing this hotel was its location. Very convenient and within walking distance to many eateries. Service was also polite and prompt throughout the stay. I booked the Lifestyle Room, and it was very well maintained. I loved the layout as well as the large bath tub. The room had a modern design and layout.

title: Pleasant Stay, Worth your time
desc: My family and I had a great restful stay at the hotel. From the moment we stepped into the hotel till we checked out, we are always greeted by the courteous staff. Room wise was fantastic and everything is new and comfortable. If Garden City theme is your thing, this is the hotel to go for your holiday / staycation!

title: Excellent stay at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering
desc: My friends and I had an enjoyable stay in one of the Lifestyle Room (with bathtub). The room was clean and cozy. We requested for early check-in and/or late check-out and thankful that we have gotten both! The hotel is conveniently located near several malls and hawker centres so our choice for food varies. The staffs stationed at the lobby are very friendly, always greeting us with smiles whenever we enter/exit the hotel. Also, a staff named Micah Angeles was very accommodating! She was kind and she made sure that all our requests were handled promptly. Thankful for her too! Overall, we had a great experience and I would consider having a staycay here again next time.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Came here to celebrate my sister’s birthday and it was perfect. The service was tip too. Pool was clean. Gym was big. Room was great. Staff was efficient friendly and welcoming. Definitely recommended!

title: Most hospitable and baby friendly hotel
desc: We had a wonderful stay Love that the hotel staff is so very hospitable, multi- generation and multi-ethnic. Apart from being a sustainable environmental friendly hotel, Parkroyal Pickering is an inclusive and diverse hotel. As new parents, the services, facilities and generous services Parkroyal Pickering staff showed us we felt so very at ease and our baby is most happy with his first staycation. Thank you very much

title: Comfortable and relaxing stay for family with kids
desc: $400 nett per room for 25hr package is excellent. Hope it will continue to be extended. The stay is refreshing with a big room. The big & clean bathtub is another plus point. View from my stack 03 unit is excellent.

title: Best weekend staycation:)
desc: Had a really pleasant stay at Parkroyal Collection Pickering. The level of service surpassed expectations from the time we arrive at the hotel till check out. I would like to mention Bobby, the lovely manager that assisted us during check in. He is very detailed in the check in process and offered us some welcome chocolate to ease the hunger pangs during mid day. Will definitely be back!!

title: Great food and service at Lime Restaurant.
desc: Had a birthday celebration at Lime. Fantastic food coupled with great service. Tables are cleared when you are done and without fuss. Shashi was fresh and snow crab were to die for. Do try out local favourites like the durian pengyet and lobster laksa.

title: All round excellence!
desc: I recently stayed end of Aug and again end of Sep. Both were outstanding as usual. I stayed in the Urban Junior Suite on both occasions and the room was truly lovely. I had really clean rooms on both occasions, and I really love the comfortable and clean bed. The Junior Suite comes with a nice bathtub which was perfect for a relaxing soak. There were two televisions so you had a choice of watching TV in bed or in the adjoining living room. Too bad I had a problem streaming to the TV. The Front Desk was also manned by friendly and helpful staff and you can request a top up of amenities if you are lacking in any. What I love most about staying in this hotel is the club lounge, manned by some of the friendliest and service oriented staff around. Jessy, Twinkle, Jenisah, Christina,

title: Lime Restaurant Buffet
desc: Good quality food with a decent variety of seafood, western and Asian cuisine. The durian pengat was particularly good. Sevice was good as well. Tables were cleared quickly and our requests were attended to.

title: Perfect Staycay
desc: Great location and lovely lush greenery surroundings. Very relaxed stay with modern furnishings. Enjoyed every min of the stay. Prompt replies on hotel bookings and customer services. Booking on gym/pool is such a breeze.

title: Top notch service at the Club Lounge
desc: Had a great experience at Parkroyal Pickering. Once again, the Club Lounge staff were very attentive and service was top notch. Special mention to Samuel, Jessy and of course Serene in the lounge. Even the chefs were very pleasant and approachable as well - Chef Edmond, Chef Thye and Chef Sylvia all proactively explained the day's menu and gave suggestions on food pairings. A great stay!

title: Not as Imagined
desc: Room was comfortable. View was spectacular. Sanitisers were not readily available at different locations. When asked for some, sanitiser had to be retrieve from cupboard and even then the bottle failed to work. We paid more for what we thought was a premium and also exclusive access to the lounge. We were disappointed to find out that the spread was limited and rather disappointing with plenty of fried items and less than impressive desserts. There was also no dress code enforced. People were coming in slippers and basketball shorts which means the difference between breakfast at Lime restaurant and the COLLECTION lounge was the variety in the breakfast spread and alcohol. It was not really worth the extra amount paid.

title: Staycation
desc: One of the best hotels in Singapore. The room was very spacious and the location was great. Loved the bathtub and bed was comfy to sleep in. The service from the staff were also friendly and the breakfast was good. My girlfriend and I enjoyed our stay and would return for a visit in the future.

title: Could have been better
desc: My wife and I have always wanted to stay at the Parkroyal Collection Pickering but never had the chance until recently. As a Discovery member, we were confused by the types of rooms and offers available. We prefer to book a room with access to the club so that our staycation would feel more like a holiday. As a guest who likes to check-in and check-out early, I was attracted by the flexible 25-hour promotion. Unfortunately, when I tried to book the room on the website, there was no way for me to input my desired time of arrival. Hence I had to call room reservation and I became even more confused because I was put through to “One Connect”. On average, it took 20 minutes before someone would take my call. I understand that the hotel might be shorthanded due to the

title: Nice staycation and unwinding
desc: The hotel pool and the garden is the highlight. The nice secret natural trail within the hotel building is great. Enjoyed oysters and sumptuous food. Will stay again when I want to unwind and treat myself.

title: Good Service from technician Asri
desc: My minibar wasn’t working and Asri was very efficient, he got it fixed within a few minutes. He was very polite and provided good service! Came in energetically and greeted me w a smile behind his mask. Thank you!

title: Excellent stay with excellent service
desc: Amazing time with my family and friends with excellent service both at the lobby and restaurant. Great pool with nice view. Helpful and warm staff are helps you book for your cab. Awesome greenery all the way leading up to our spacious room.

title: Wonder staycation
desc: So glad that we choose Park Royal as our staycation option! Fanatic accommodation and extremely helpful staff. Due to the COVID situation, they even went the extra mile to provide the guest with a care package which includes masks and sanitation wipes. The lime restaurant at the ground floor serves up great food and the pool is very cosy. The room is clean and spacious and everything else is perfect apart from the broken HDMI cable which was promptly replaced by the staff. Definitely will come and stay here again!

title: A memorable Stay-cation
desc: I arrived around noon, stopped my car at the driveway. Chef Concierge Ong a friendly staff assisted me with my baggage. A nice lady Ms Abby, the Duty Manager attended to me for the check in. She was very attentive and professional. She explained to me what needed to be done for the booking of swimming pool and breakfast. I requested her for extra pillow and she immediately replied that it will be served. Before going away, she said, "Thank you and have an enjoyable weekend".The room was nice and clean. (Look at the picture attached for more visual.) The toilet cannot be locked. We have to book the swimming pool and gym through the TV system. Chinatown Point is nearby and there were a lot of shops to visit. B1 of China town Point has a halal food shop which sells Thai food.The

title: Definitely be back again
desc: Booked a collection lifestyle room to celebrate my birthday. Appreciate the GM Mr Jean-Philippe Jacopin for the surprise cake when I checked in the room. Club lounge view is fantastic, valued for money buffet dinner at Lime, service staffs were attentive and friendly. Pool and gym facilities were easily accessed using the QR code provided. However the gym equipment were a bit old and rusty, especially the Lats pull down machine (squeaky sound can be hear when using). Overall a nice hotel to stay in

title: Beautiful hotel location within heart of CBD. Poor communication within staff/team.
desc: Enjoyed a wonderful birthday weekend here with my wife. Really enjoyed the aesthetics and design of both the hotel and the room which came with a great view of the city. Having a hotel situated within the CBD really allowed for us to travel to many good dining spots easily. Hotel staff were also wonderful and helpful by allowing us to extend our checkout by an hour. However, We faced an issue with the cleaning crew. While I was changing in the room, the cleaning crew just opened the door and came into our room unexpectedly! Luckily it was me and not my wife changing. They apologised and mentioned that it was stated on their app that we had already checked out. Again this miscommunication may have resulted in them walking in on something more unsavoury(let’s leave it at that).

title: Great staycation experience
desc: We love the modern look and convenient location of the hotel. Room is quite spacious, well-designed and clean. Infinity pool is very nice with bird-cage-like cabanas, lounge beds and jacuzzi. Overall a great experience for our staycation. Thanks for the fabulous service too!

title: Fabulous Stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay from the moment we arrived to the moment we departed. The staff were welcoming and attended to every need. The cake and bubbly on arrival was a particularly nice touch seeing that we were celebrating our 20th anniversary. We were especially pleased with our room, which was bright, comfortable, a stylish. It was all great value, the room, food and drink, and the spa. Overall, it was a fabulous stay and we would certainty choose the Park Royal again.

title: Staycation
desc: Bought 2 rooms for 2D1N family staycation at trip.com during its promo period. Its our 2nd visit. PRC Pickering did not failed us. The stay was very comfortable, staff was very efficient and service was excellent. We were able to check in early as well. Would like to specially mentioned staff Ms Serene Teo for making our stay so comfortable :) highly recommended hotel.

title: Mrs Tan
desc: 1hr late in check in, in order to wait for our room to b ready, we went to Lime restaurant to eat something trying to used the dining credits. Despite we told the reception that we are using the dining credits, we were not told that the Hi-tea set cannot b used with the dining credits... We ordered a burger n a Hi-tea set. But when we were in the room, we recieved a call to tell us we cannot use the dining credit for it.. After verifying with their staffs n we told ltr that they allowed us that they allowed us to use it for that time. Dinner we choose to have it sent to the room.. We've ordered 2 steak (medium well) n 1 lobster Laksa. 1 steak was done to perfection and tastes awesome but the other was too rare, Laksa was too dry with too much noodles and little gravy. So we

title: Lime Restaurant
desc: We went for some drinks & food at their Lime restaurant. Customer service was excellent. Usage of technology to order our items was seemless and efficient. The Manager - Yus or Zul (didn't manage to get his name) ensured that all his customers were having a good time. The portion of drinks and their desserts was very good! Really hope they can maintain this high standard consistently. We are looking forward to plan a staycay at this hotel soon! 😀

title: Great family bonding staycation!
desc: The service officers are very friendly and approachable. Service standard is excellent. The location of the hotel is very good, near to China Town and many eating places nearby. I and my family had a wonderful time during our stay. We will return soon. Thank you!

title: Lime Buffet Dinner
desc: We came here to celebrate my husband's birthday. Staff were prompt to clear our plates. A special mention to Soo Yoke Lin who was attentive to our needs. Food selection was ok. Overall a good experience.

title: A rewarding staycation choice
desc: The Lifestyle room had the perfect holiday vibe, which made our staycation so rewarding. The room itself was spacious with a great view, and it was truly a relaxing stay. Service was impeccable as well right down to the staff trying their best to cater to our special requests and helping us secure a slot at the pool, which I really appreciate. Overall, I enjoyed my visit so much I’ve booked another stay with them in two weeks.

title: A 5-star hotel indeed.
desc: Everything in this hotel was great. Check-in was quick and seamless, with the counter staff offering us late checkout at 2pm without us having to ask. We took the urban room and topped up $30+ for a room with bathtub. Our request for baby bathtub, high chair and cot were also acceded to. Booking of facilities and breakfast slot was also super easy, with everything done online now. Fuss-free. Do I need to mention their architecture and lush greenery throughout the hotel? We felt like tourists in our own country! Food choices are APLENTY with shopping centres, hawker centres and 2 mrt stations a stone's throw away. Loved our experience here and would love to be back again. ❤️

title: Best Birtday Stay cation in Singapore
desc: All associates that we interacted during the 3 days stay were impeccable. During check-in, we were warmly greeted by Jessie & Andy- EH. The check in was seamless, the room was ready for us. During breakfast, we were served by Roneth & Andrew and both are very accommodating and keeps on checking on us. Aunty Amy was friendly & sweet. The room was well kept, amenities were replenished, room attendant slipped a message to ask our preferred timing to clean the room as we are on dnd. I was pleasantly surprised for the welcome card handwritten by the GM/JP, it felt so personalised plus the welcome amenities were carefully done. In the afternoon, we received a cake which I believe was baked by the team Chef Kelly, Chef Pik Kar - it was really delicious. The associates who kept on

title: A good getaway vacation place
desc: Overall is good. And just the wifi very slow during my stay and only one concierge counter is available at night. The staffs are very polite. I like their complimentary birthday treat. The body wash shampoo smell nice. The room is clean. They will give you a reminder call before check out.

title: Would have given 5 stars but…
desc: Went there for a staycation with my friend to celebrate both our birthdays; service was great from reception to room service, the room was in extremely presentable position and the facilities were impressive. Late check out was also granted which was well appreciated! However, requests were made for birthday amenities to be arranged (agreed upon by hotel) but did not take place. Hope the hotel can improve on this part! Overall a fantastic stay otherwise.

title: Lime restaurant
desc: The food and service was great along with wonderful atmosphere! Definitely recommends to visit and have a nice meal with family! The vegetarian menu is great as well... Safe covid 19 measures to ensure safe dining!

title: Great city escapade!
desc: It was a wonderful staycation with the family in this city hotel shrouded in superbly curated greenery. We enjoyed the Garden Walk - interesting layout in such a compact estate! The interiors were luxe and well designed, with much attention paid to details. But hospitality is nothing without the hotel staff. In particular, I would like to give a shout-out to the F&B crew at the Lime Restaurant at dinner service on Fri night and breakfast on early Saturday morning for being warm and attentive, and knowing how to make a kid feel special! Kudos also to the hardworking and delightful crew on the 16 flr Collection Club Lounge - Samuel, Serene, Jessy, Jaycelle, Jenisah, and not forgetting Chefs Edmond and Sylvia. All these people make the stay at Parkroyal @ Pickering a great

title: Family staycation with kids
desc: Family Staycation with 2 kids. Floor to ceiling windows with unobstructed view toward the parliament. Rooms are clean and cosy but dark toilet. Should have more light inside. Managed to upgrade to junior suite with $ top up. Was consider worth the money as had a good view room. Swimming pool is good which also has a nice view at level 5. Location wise is just beside China town point shopping center. Great variety of food for breakfast and service of the staff at Lime restaurant was good. All your small requests are being fulfilled and we were well looked after. We wanted to book Pan Pacific but it was already fully booked for the dates. As this hotel was under the same group and relatively new we decided to take our chances. The hotel concept of everything Green and

title: Great service and value for money
desc: The hotel layout and room design create an exclusive feel of being in a private cabin in a resort. The Collection Club benefits are really good value for money, with delicious bites and drinks. The service at the club lounge is top-notch. Serene and her team really ensure that every guest is taken care of even when the place is packed. They always accommodate our dietary needs (vegetarian) and the plant-based items that are on the main menu are very good too. This is our 4th stay and we will definitely returna

title: Great 5n4days
desc: Went with my mom for a staycation, Booked the Urban Lifestyle Room, super comfy king bed and they managed to accommodate us for the bathtub even though it's subject to availability. Staff are really friendly even at Lime down to the housekeeping staff like Rosy. Rosy was super efficient and quick in cleaning our rooms! Definitely coming back again!

title: Serene environs and Collection lounge
desc: Fourth stay in a year, so this time comments more focused on Collection experience. The hard products (Lifestyle room, hotel environment, facilities, greenery) remain the really strong components - this is a unique experience in city centre. Check-in was a little disappointing - was offered an upgrade opportunity by email, but clearly stated "you will be informed at check-in if you will be granted the upgrade". At check-in, nothing was mentioned - and as everything was processed as per norm, I assumed the upgrade was not successful. The room was as pleasant as ever, this time with a verdant garden view. The room came with Nespresso, Appelles products and TWG tea... and suspicions aroused, I checked with the desk later that evening and was apologetically told that the upgrade HAD

title: Great stay, convenient location.
desc: The room was really spacious and comfortable to stay in. We didnt opt for the breakfast, but it was a short throw away from various food places that we could enjoy too. Staffs were welcoming and approachable (:

title: Good Overall, but with Unacceptable Issues for a 5 Star Hotel
desc: Overall, the stay was comfortable and enjoyable - but there were a few issues that will prevent us from staying there again. The check-in process was quick but the desk staff were not very friendly. The room was very comfortable and clean, but we experienced a few negative issues: - The shower head was leaking badly, spraying water everywhere when turning it on - The water pressure was very low - The HDMI port at the desk did not work - The menu in the room showed that in-room dining was available from 11pm to 6am, but this was not the case. And when calling the operator at 10pm, no one answered. Dining at the restaurant was the highlight of the stay - the staff were extremely friendly / attentive and the food was great. However, after dinner we moved to the Lobby Bar, which

title: 7 Day SHN at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering
desc: Travelling in these trying times could have been a harrowing experience, coupled with the need to quarantine but everyone at ParkRoyal made me feel extra welcomed the minute I alighted from the taxi! I understand that the tourism/hospitality and events industries have been hit the hardest in the pandemic and morale can be at an all time low - it takes sheer will and absolute determination to continue smiling beneath the mask and doing the best that you can at a job that is already challenging. Customer relations is incredibly tough and I am so appreciative and in awe of everyone who has worked so hard to make this such a pleasant stay for me. I would want to take the IRD team (Vikram, Wan and everyone else who so kindly fed me through out my stay) and everyone at Lime! The

title: Best staycation thus far!
desc: We stayed in a Signature room for slightly under $400 a night (including breakfast) and was pleasantly surprised at what we got. Generously sized room with a sofa / dining area, huge bed and gorgeous shower. Plus beautiful city views. Loved that the room had a big Samsung smart TV so that we could connect our laptop and watch Netflix (our previous staycays did not have this) Breakfast at Lime restaurant was decent too, proper buffet style with attentive service staff. The location is really great too. You’re really spoilt for choice for food and entertainment, a lot of which is within walking distance. Oh, and the pool! I was lucky to go when it was empty, so I had a great time doing laps and admiring the view :) Overall we had a great time and it will be hard to find a

title: Repeat visitors to this great hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel & rooms, wonderful ambience, great personalised service by Serene Teo & her team at the Collection Club @ Level 16. We have been coming here repeatedly for our staycations. The staff are friendly and helpful and go the extra mile to ensure your needs are met. Wonderful food at the Collection Club and great chefs. The hotel is conveniently located in the heart of the city next to Chinatown with good transport access and also choice of food places nearby. Would highly recommend this place for a staycay.

title: Dinner at lime restaurant
desc: Wonderful dinner spread, amazing service. I would like to thank a few of the staff "Fal, Eileen, Wei Feng for making my dinner at the restaurant extra special but serving me with a surprise birthday cake which I was not expecting at all while I was having my dinner.

title: Negative experience
desc: Smooth check in process , no complaint on the room & hotel as a whole. Just that I’m Quite surprised that my emails to the respective department wit regards to my booking/stay got ignored. Not a big deal as I went there for a day-stay only, but confident to the hotel is definitely affected. Will I personally visit the hotel again ? Will I recommend it to other? I think my answer is quite clear. Happy to be the one and only that encountered this kind of experience.

title: Best place to staycay and celebrate your love ones’ birthday!
desc: My husband was the happiest man for his birthday. As newly weds, I planned a simple staycation to allow my husband time to R&R. The very first person we met was Bobby, and boy was he the best. I did not specifically mention anything to Bobby, but while checking us in he caught on that it was my husband’s birthday. He asked if we drank red or white wine after wishing my husband a happy birthday, and sent to our room a cake, card and wine. That set the standard, and our staycay was enjoyable throughout. Thank you Bobby, and thank you Parkroyal@Pickering!

title: Staycation
desc: Had a wonderful stay at this hotel, everyone is so accommodating and friendly..visited Lime as well , special mention to Alice, Jemin and Falini..extended their amazing hospitality, Jessie as well at FO..for being so accommodating and friendly as well. We will definitely come back..

title: Beautiful Serene City Stay
desc: Amazing location a 5-10 minute drive from MBS. Beautiful spacious room (signature) with light and bright tones with Japanese-inspired wooden interior. Gorgeous stone-floored bathroom. Breakfast buffet had a good spread, good quality and great staff. Would highly recommend for any couples, families and friend groups

title: Staycation cum business
desc: This particular stay is memorable as it included $400 food credits. The services of the front desk staff & the Lime Restaurant crew are laudable & praiseworthy, always so cheery & helpful. The buffet spread for lunch or dinner recommended. Fresh & good, palatable enhanced with the ever attentive staff always on the lookout to serve with a smile.

title: Nice green getaway in the city
desc: I didn’t think very much about getting this hotel but it turned out to be a good decision. The pool though closed partially due to Covid was a nice place to chill. The location of the pool means there is not much sun (if you want a tan). However the hotel is really nice and the rooms are spacious. No bath tubs but it’s a great place to stay alone. The food wasn’t all that nice though. Service is good.

title: Great daycation
desc: Check-in was seamless thanks to Juhi :) And thank you to Zovian from the call centre who was very helpful in attending to our requests! Joanne at the front desk was also very helpful in helping us find our missing item, even though we didnt find it haha

title: Feedback
desc: Hotel location & environment was very nice how ever housekeeping service was very poor & left dirty dusting cloth on iron board. & bed didn’t do well. On my wife birthday no greeting by hotel staff or any thing send to room for wish her. Disappointed

title: Staycation at upper Pickering
desc: Very friendly customer service and good food outside the hotel. (Hong Lim food center) Like this place as a staycation getaway. Managed to get a room with beautiful night it was of the city skyline. :)

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: My partner and I came for a two day, one night stay and it was almost seamless the entire way. Everything can be attended to through the online concierge, although the phone concierge is still viable. Booking of the facilities was easy, the pool was lovely and relaxing. The cabana was a nice break between laps in the pool that offered a heck of a view. The rooms had a very modular vibe. Ours wasn't huge, but it was cozy. The day and night blinders were great and everything was touch controlled. There was even a little dessert for the missus' special day. Breakfast was delicious and we were quickly seated. The virtual menu made it easy to avoid waiting on things like the omelettes and toast, which have some prep time. While waiting, you can go ahead with the buffet stations

title: Family staycation
desc: Overall a good experience staying at the hotel. 5-stars hotel with great location next to Chinatown point and nearby shopping centres. Easily assessable and 5 mins walk to MRT. Signature room is spacious and good facing city view.

title: Nice from outside, once inside do need a "fresh layer of paint"
desc: Stayed Pickering for the first time and to celebrate my wife's birthday. As she is an avid gardener, thought the Pickering would be perfect for her to enjoy and admire the greenery. Positives: Check-in process was fast and easy. Size was our room was perfect. Bed appeared comfy and was still fairly firm. Bathroom was clean, and certainly enjoyed the bathtub. Amenities throughout room were sufficient, with decent sized TV and channel selections, bathroom amenities, bottled waters. Buffet breakfast despite pandemic, had enough selection for a good breakfast. To improve: Hotel app to reserve pool, breakfast, etc slots doesn't work well. Had tried numerous times to book slot for breakfast despite restarting my phone still couldn't book. Ended up calling frontdesk to help. Hotel

title: Wedding lunch banquet
desc: Just finished our wedding lunch reception at Park Royal Pickering! Wedding planning was made easy by the sales manager, Josco. He was prompt in responding to our queries and he was constantly providing us with the latest updates on the new Covid guidelines. The actual day banquet manager, Jason was very professional as well. He was very attentive and he took good care of us from the start, and made us feel at ease throughout the event. We only had a very bad experience with one of the AV staff when we went for an AV testing few days prior to the actual day. He made a rude remark to our guests which we felt it was uncalled for and unprofessional. Despite the bad experience with the AV staff, we would still highly recommend Park Royal Pickering for hosting your Big Day!

title: Heart of the city relaxation
desc: Superb interiors. The wooden wall finishing was calm to the eyes. Bed and the sheets provided good night's rest and lulls you all the time. Full length windows provide the singapore river skyline and HongLim park. Excellent toilet + bath facilities.

title: Wedding Lunch Banquet
desc: Recently had my wedding banquet held at PRP. Understand that the head chef in charge of the banquet menu had put careful thought into the menu to fit the current Covid restrictions and curated it such that food presentation and portions are perfect for individual consumption rather than treating each course as a single dish to be distributed into multiple plates. Personal opinion that the Oven Baked Halibut with Bonito Shoyu glaze was the most outstanding dish which I've never seen from any other Hotel banquet menu i've researched on. Josco Tham was our wedding coordinator and our primary point of contact prior to actual day wedding. He remained professional and responded promptly throughout our engagement despite uncertainties with government regulations due to Covid. He was

title: Great stay for 2nd time in Lifestyle Room
desc: Beautiful eco hotel with great rooms and large spacious rooms. The application for booking of facilities was wonky though. Near places of interest and food as well as shopping options. Other than that, all is good!

title: Lime Buffet Dinner’s Wonderful Services
desc: We had a wonderful dinner experience at Lime this evening, many thanks to few wonderful staffs who made it happened for us. Firstly, Many Thanks to the Lime’s reception lady who served us on the 1st evening when we made our dinner reservation. Though the promotion I saw on the website had ended, she had notified her supervisor or person-in-charged with my queries & thanks to both of them for honoring what we seen on the website, we got to enjoy the promotion & the beautiful wine which definitely had enhanced our buffet dinner experience. If not for them, we may not take the dinner buffet. Thanks to Zul too who served us to our table. He is kind, helpful & patient & had explained each types of wine to us well to facilitate our selection. Thanks to the chef too who handled the

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: had a memorable time at Park Royal Pickering. Check-in was smooth and fast by Syukri. The room is cosy and had a nice greenery view. Breakfast spread was awesome. Nana Jasman assisted me with the check out. She was quick and cheerful. Would definitely come back, thank you to Nana & team!

title: Good location and Love it
desc: The location of this hotel is superb, it is just next to Chinatown town MRT. We miss our stay. The room is nice and bright. Like lime restaurant, the staff are friendly and service is good especially Andrew, he is helpful. Love the sky walk in green, enjoy the swimming pool. Enjoy the ala-carte food at lime restaurant. Overall, satisfy with our stay.

title: One Night Stay to Experience the Collection Club Privileges
desc: This was my second time at Parkroyal Collection Pickering. First was a two-nights stay in Urban room. Hence, this time round, decided to try the Collection Room. Check-in was a breeze with friendly Natasha. For next day late check-out, was advised to enquire from front-desk on the next morning which I did, and Ash helped to extend to 1pm. Thank you both. The Collection room was at Level 13 while previously, I was at Level 12 for the Urban room. View wise, this time round I got to see the unique architecture of the building with slightly better clarity. Collection Club Lounge is at Level 16, and not too busy during this period. Afternoon tea served was alright but there were about 3 items which could be further improved, namely popcorn chicken, pumpernickel bread and muesli

title: None
desc: We were not given an upgraded room when checking in and was told that hotel was full. It's funny as our friends had checked in slightly earlier and was upgraded accordingly. It was only after my request that we were given an upgraded room, but it was located on the extreme end of the wing, with no view at all. Front counter staffs should have informed us about the facing of the upgraded room, but sadly, she did not. Despite the lousy facing, I would say the room is spacious and comfortable. But I must complain about the minibar (chiller). It is not cold at all. I've brought some food and needed to keep inside. When the technician was called to the room, he said it was working and left. From day 1 till the day we check out on day 3, the minibar was still warm. We went

title: Best Suite Ever
desc: Living Room is well equipped with sound system, chrome cast for us to just chill by the sofa enjoying our movies, food and the scenery. This stay happened in May 2021 where certain covid restrictions were still in place. Check-in was fast and we were directed to the Club level for high tea while waiting for the room to be ready as we had booked the suite which came with club benefits. Bedroom was comfy but curtains needed to be drawn as it faces directly to the office building opposite and can get quite bright in the morning. Sadly there were no minibar in room when we checked-in (covid period) and our room was all the way to the end hence, a larger room probably but the constant walking back and forth to get to club or out of the hotel or to pick up food delivery was a

title: Want to Come Back❤️💯
desc: 💯 will return to the hotel. Lovely room with a very nice view of both city and greenery. Check in & check out was done by Nana. She was quick and always assist me with my enquiries during my stay- super helpful! The pool, afternoon tea and breakfast was a perfect experience in a lovely place. Thank you to Nana & team, I'll come back!

title: Great Staycay
desc: Room was nice and facilities were great. Facilities were exquisite and it’s very green. If you like plants and greenery, it’s a good place to stay. Staff were very pleasant and helpful as well. Would definitely stay again.

title: Excellent Staycation @ ParkRoyal Pickering
desc: My wife and I celebrated our belated wedding anniversary with a staycation at ParkRoyal Pickering in early October. We had a most enjoyable and relaxing experience. The hotel is beautifully designed and the eco-friendly ambience makes one feel relaxed and close to nature. Overall, it was an excellent two-day staycation. I will definitely come back for another staycation.

title: Disappointing stay
desc: I am disappointed with the stay in this property...where shall i begin reservations: i called in as it was my husband's birthday and i wanted to suprise him so the purpose of the call is i booked the hotel not realising that the rooms got no bath tub except for the suite but the agent of th Reservations department cut me off by saying that i got to sort that out with reception and i got to pay for it ...well i know that as i have worked for 10 yrs in hospitality industry i was the impression that reservations can arrange that for me...I came late to the hotel at 4pm i had asked an early check in but some family issue came up and i had to appear late so i asked to have a late check out i was given only till 1 pm i had missed my pool time but there was no alternatives given i

title: Great staycation
desc: Very cozy room and looks very aesthetic! Bed is very comfortable :) Like the Lime restaurant buffet dinner (non inclusive). I think the breakfast food range and quality can be slightly improved though.

title: Wonderful Staff and great environment
desc: Once I stepped to the hotel, i feel so welcomed. Even from frontdesk, they greet me with exceptionally wide smile. The instructions and guide give was clear. The room looks great and it feel great too. Love the upkeep of the room and the room design. The people in the hotel know how to give clear instructions with a smile. Even the checkout, the staff is very helpful and very fast. Love the environment and the people. This will make me come back. Shoutout to the front desk that check us in, Shakira. She is so attentive and very aware of the people checking in. Feel so great to receive such a great attention.

title: Excellent time at Lime Buffet
desc: Extremely pleasant time and meal there, food was great with excellent service, despite the covid measures, the selection was superb as well! Definitely will come back for more! Especially the meat selections! Highly recommend the laksa as well, could taste the hours that goes into the gravy

title: Lime Restaurant
desc: Went to Lime restaurant for their dinner buffet and it was a good experience. My fiancé and I really enjoyed the food, the staff there were nice and friendly. Made a reservation without knowing we had to state that we wanted to have lobster, but the staff was kind enough to let us order the lobster anyways. It is a nice restaurant, the ambiance was great. Will go back there to dine again.

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Stepping in the hotel we were greeted by the attentive staffs at the entrance and check-in staff was friendly and the process was smooth. Room is quite spacious with separate section between shower and sink and also have a bathtub in the room which you are able to enjoy the outside view. The bed was super comfy. We never feel back pain or awake until the sun comes up. Overall this hotel offers a great service!!

title: Beautiful green hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel with lots of greenery. Environmental friendly and courteous staff creates an atmosphere of home. The bed was ample king size and the lighting features are user friendly. Nice shows on the TV with wide choices to choose from. The safe entry to the hotel was well managed.

title: Picturesque swimming pool
desc: This hotel is suited in the Chinatown area of Singapore. Upon checking in, the staff didn’t gave me the “care pack”. However, I’m not sure if you need to book the room directly to get it (I booked it through an agent). Nevertheless, the Lifestyle room I stayed comes with a bathtub, perfectly clean. Booking is required to access the swimming pool and gym, where guests are allowed to make 1 booking per day.

title: Awesome stay with great service from Hotel Staff!
desc: Spent a weekend getaway with my girlfriend on their Lifestyle Room. Posted on instagram about the rooms and many came to ask me where is this nice looking hotel. Great service from start to finish, from the moment we alighted being greeted by the staffs to accommodating us on our requests. I would like to give a special shoutout to Shaun (heard he was a team leader?) for being kind and understanding to our situation when we needed more time to check out. Really awesome hospitality 👍🏻 Definitely will be back!

title: Staycation to celebrate wedding anniversary
desc: Best staycation that my wife and I ever had. Staff were friendly and facilities were top notch. Room was very spacious and clean. Also appreciated the plate of desserts that you gave in celebration of our wedding anniversary. If I had to point out an area of improvement, I would say that it would have been nice to have been able to access Netflix on the TV though. The screen mirroring didnt work for on our iPad but that's just a minor inconvenience. Definitely will come back :)

title: thank you very much aqaqqqqqfor your wonderful and friendly service provided
desc: Would like to thank me Shawn at the front desk for the wonderful and friendly service that he provided. He is very attentive and helpful in assisting us with our request. We are very grateful for his help. Thank Thank you very much 👍

title: Very good and relaxing stay
desc: Did a couple of stays recently and really enjoyed their Lifestyle rooms. Staff were very professional and club lounge staff were extremely attentive to our needs. Thank you to Ms Nana and Mr Bobby for ensuring my stays were comfortable, as well as the super attentive housekeeping staff uncle Ang!

title: Daycation for a short recharged
desc: Booked a day use room to work and chill. Checked in at 8am. The room was big and clean, internet speed was good, room having a perfect lighting for taking pictures. Love their high tea, it was delicious. Most staffs are very attentive. Will be back again.

title: Positive Feedback on GV
desc: Very helpful and friendly. Appreciate his help upon my arrival at the hotel. Helped me to carry my bags in the hotel. Was very careful with my items as well. Very polite. Made sure I had a great stay.

title: Great deal, lovely service
desc: Managed to snag an awesome deal from trip.com: 1-for-1 with Club benefits. I’ve been dying to try ParkRoyal on Pickering’s Club Lounge because I’ve heard so much about it so we paid $140 more for it - totally worth it. Think we spent more time at the Club Lounge over the duration of our stay than our hotel room instead! Breakfast wasn’t out-of-this-world, but decent enough. The main Lime Restaurant offered more options with local delights such as Nasi Lemak and Noodles. Dim sums were also different between the Lime and the Club Lounge. Each day we ate what we felt was unique at the Lime Restaurant, and then headed up for Part 2: champagne breakfast + more nibbles Afternoon Tea selection was presented as a fixed ensemble, though we could request for additional items if we

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Beautiful hotel, nice scenery and great atmosphere! Food was not too bad also, love the open concept toilet with its bathtub. Only cons are dim lighting and extremely soft bed that can be uncomfortable for the back.

title: Fantastic Stay!
desc: We were welcomed by the receptionists and concierge staff members, who were helpful and nice. Room was super clean and new, loved the high ceiling and full-length mirrors. Breakfast at Lime was awesome too, not the biggest selection but food was prepared nicely. Shoutout to Ash and Natasha who were super helpful, thankful for their help! :)

title: Memorable stay for my daughter and I
desc: Had the best birthday surprise for my daughter… she loved the hotel, loved the staff, loved the coziness of the room. Want to shout out to Bobby at the front desk who helped with checking us in with his kind gesture. Another shout out to Christina who escorted us to our lovely room. Got an upgrade from her and surprises for my girl too. Thanks for the birthday cake and our stay was wonderful. Thank you for the lovely memorable time there.

title: One in a life time hotel stay!
desc: Stayed at the hotel for 2 weeks as a part of a business trip. From the moment I arrived the amazing staff took care of me and everything I needed with a heart warming attention. The hotel is absolutely gorgeous, the view from the room is phenomenal, everything is so clean and neat, amazing room service and absolutely gorgeous staff. The hotel facilities are the best you can ask for, the beautiful swimming pool, the amazing gym and the lovely garden walking terrace. The breakfast at the Lime restaurant was by far the best hotel breakfast I had, everything so fresh, so clean and adorable service. Every evening went to the hotel lounge, where you get this amazing 360 degrees view of Singapore 🇸🇬 The food and cocktails served at the hotel lounge were absolutely stunning, had the

title: A little disappointed
desc: I am very satisfied with this hotel on my first visit about 2 years ago. Everything was just perfect. However on my recent visit, it was kind of disapponting. The room cleanliness was not shocking at some areas. I noticed there are alot of dead insects near the windows panels and the bed side tables. However i didn't bother to request to switch room as it was a hassel to me. It's only a night. The other parts of the room is still ok. As for the staffs, they are really helpful and friendly except for one indian chef that served at the scrambler egg and pastry section for breakfast. The way he told one female customer when she accidentally took the plates on the display shelf on the counter was kind of harsh. The label on the plate (stated: its for display) is just too small. The

title: Great stay, amazing staff, will be back!
desc: Always wanted to visit Park Royal Pickering and I’m glad I did! Beautiful room and facilities, and staff were all exceptional. Would like to give a shoutout to the team at Club lounge, especially Samuel, Jenisah, Christina and Jermin for being so attentive and helpful throughout our 3d2n stay and for accommodating to our requests whenever we had any. Samuel, especially, provided excellent service as he was really observant and friendly and helped us wholeheartedly with all our minor queries. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one, we will definitely be back 😊

title: Staycation
desc: Beautiful hotel with excellent customer service. They even gave my twins a surprise cake for birthday! The pool was a little tiny but the view from pool is great. Only thing that tainted the experience was a stain I found on the blanket cover. All in, I would still return for a next visit.

title: Solemnisation at Parkroyal Collection Pickering
desc: A wise choice to have our solemnisation at Pickering! The team are experienced and helpful from day 1 till the actual day! Special thanks to Josco and Edmund who helps us the most during our solemnisation, try the best to fulfil our requests and assist us on a lot of arrangement! Highly recommend this hotel!

title: EXCELLENT service
desc: Booked Pickering for our wedding night cause our hotel was a SHN location. Was sad but after 2 nights, honestly no regrets! Room was super clean and service was v fast. Breakfast buffet was good w many options. Main thing is that, they have a very honest team. We left some valuables in the safe and we retrieve every bit of it. Really need to give a shout-out to Aswini and Lian Jiang for finding and returning it. Bobby and James for making the collection so smooth. Thank you so much! Such an excellent team. 10/10!!

title: Bad experience
desc: I previously had a last minute staycation on 2nd October 2021 for a 2 nights stay. I had booked my stay at Booking.com the night before for $567 Nett. I guess everything was pretty much confirmed since i received the confirmation letter from booking.com twice. However, when it was time to check in, i was attended by the DM, Anna. She mentioned that my booking wasn't in the system. As a guest, I was definitely not pleased with that. I don't think there was an issue with Booking.com as well since the booking is confirmed. To make things worst, I was told that if i still wanted the room, i would have to pay the Best Available Rate walk in rate which is about $100 more than what initially booked for. How is this fair for the guest who have no idea what was going on and had to pay an

title: Great hotel, perfect service
desc: Great hotel, amazing service. Very attentive and friendly staff. We were there for filming and the rented a room as well. Everything was perfect, staff is flexible and has just the right amount of service acumen and involvement.

title: Fantastic stay, great room and lovely staff!
desc: Stayed 1 night, mid-week, as part of the stay and dine and promotion. Really enjoyed ourselves. Check in was straightforward with no queue, swimming pool was easy to book and no problems with getting slots, food at LIME was lovely, staff were extremely friendly and worked very hard despite it being so busy. Check out staff was also very efficient and helpful. Great room too. Everyone (2 adults, 2 children) had a lovely time.

title: Rooms with Unique Designs
desc: Booked two rooms for a family staycation with breakfast. The stay was overall pleasant and the staff did the best they could with the Covid-19 restrictions in place. Service: Both our rooms were only ready for use well past the check-in timing (1 hour and 3 hours). Was served by Xin Y. at the counter who was really apologetic about the experience and tried her best to speed things up. Even though we did not make a big fuss about the issue, she handled the service recovery well and extended a meal for us at the hotel. The team at Lime restaurant is superb as well. Room service request was speedy as well, however as it was via an QR code link/automated chatbot, that wasn't the most user friendly (i.e. if you options are not within the automated chatbot, you still had to

title: Disappointing Check-In Experience
desc: We booked our room via Klook and the check-in date was 28 Nov 2021 to 29 Nov 2021. On 24 Nov 2021, days before our check-in date, my wife called in to request for some baby’s accessories such as bath tub and high chair. She has also requested for an early check-in and was told by the staff that we are able to check-in at 2pm on 28 Nov 2021. Unfortunately, due to our timing issue, we managed to only arrive at the hotel at 2.45pm on 28 Nov 2021 and proceeded with the check-in. During the check-in process, the counter staff noted that prior notes have been captured that stated our request for baby’s accessories. Hence, this proves that my wife’s call on 24 Nov 2021 is valid. However, the staff informed us that the room isn’t ready and we are required to wait. We are fine

title: Friendly masseuse & stellar massage
desc: Came to get a massage as part of our honeymoon staycay to relief all the wedding stress, and am highly satisfied with the massage! We had the full-body balinese massage done by Yvonne and Jasmine. They will ask and adjust the pressure to your liking, let you know the problem areas of your body, and even offer suggestions on how to improve on them. The massage was very comfortable and both masseuses were also very friendly and chatted with us.

title: St Gregory’s spa @ Pickering
desc: Excellent service and professionalism by Jasmine and Yvonne. They were adept at finding out where our tight spots were, and were constantly attentive to the amount of pressure to use. The masseuses were very thorough, and after the Balinese massage, my wife and I felt as if all the tension had melted away! They were also good conversationalists, making us feel relaxed and at ease! 5 stars for Jasmine and Yvonne! Truly a good experience, and very very highly recommended! We look forward to coming back again! P.a. Front desk staff were very courteous and service oriented too.

title: Had a lovely 33rd Birthday Celebration
desc: I've always wanted to visit Park Royal Pickering because of the building's architectural design. My husband surprised me with a scrumptuous dinner for the two of us at lime restaurant. There were a lot of choices. We were served with a glass of champagne and water on the table. Drinks can be ordered via the QR code. The best ones for us were the Seafood Lobster LAKSA, Roast BEEF and the Fresh OYSTERS. I commend & praise Ms. EILEEN SEO. She's hospitable and has an outstanding service to customers. She kindly took pictures of us and the photos were nice too. She has a nice personality and suggests what is nice too. You can see how she loves what she is doing--simply just full of energy and has a cheerful attitude. THANK YOU. Will definitely recommend this to family and

title: Lime restaurant Buffet Dinner
desc: Eileen Soo is very friendly and helpful. We have birthday ladies in the group but we had forgotten to inform in advance… she helped us checked and managed to give us cakes for the bday gals. We are grateful for her initiation! Thank you Eileen.

title: The Lime Restaurant
desc: Not much foods choices during the Christmas festive menu, perhaps will come back during non- festive season. Overall foods was still okay, just the lamb chop is abut chewy and hard. The service crew was keen to ask about feedback which is good.

title: Lime Restaurant Dinner Buffet
desc: Had a great time dining at Lime Restaurant for a birthday celebration! The laksa with crayfish and durian pengat the best!!! Would like to thank Eileen Soo for her attentiveness and great service! Definitely will come back again!!! :)

title: Coackroaches in the hotel and slow services
desc: This is probably the worst staycation experience I have encountered before. Firstly, hygiene of the room and corridor was a nightmare. Strains and cockroaches can be seen in both the room and the corridor. This was my first time seeing coackroaches in a hotel. Secondly was the questionable service and it make me wonder whether this was still a 5-star hotel. Requested for two drinking bottles to send to via their mobile application does not acknowledge and work. Thus I need to dial the reception to request for it (waited very long for the hotel receptionist to pick up and was told because she was the only staff working at the point of time) . Even informing the receptionist, I need to wait close to two hours before getting it. Everytime I requested for any amenities, I need to

title: Buffet celebration at Lime Restaurant
desc: We had a very enjoyable dinner at the Lime restaurant. The food was good but what was more impressive and memorable was the service there. Wanted to really point out the excellent service from Eileen Soo - she service us with her bright cheery smile and we can really feel her passion in providing the customers with the best form of services. Thank you for the memorable night! Kudos!

title: Lime Restaurant customer service
desc: First time dining in a buffet in years and was not disappointed in the great food and service from the staff! Our server, Eileen Soo, is really engaging and proactive in her job, as well as accommodating to our table and offering her hand in taking photos for our birthdays! Will be back once again!

title: Commendation of staff service
desc: Had the opportunity to visit Lime over the weekend and had a great experience. Eileen went above and beyond to cater to our friend’s birthday and made our celebration a wonderful day to remember. Food quality is also great with restaurant servers who served us with a smile.

title: Staycation
desc: Had a comfortable stay at PARKROYAL on Pickering! The breakfast spread at Lime restaurant is also good, staff were friendly and helpful too :) Would definitely come back for another staycation at the hotel.

title: STAYCATION
desc: Front desk service was really loudly not efficient at all, told them is our wedding anniversary they don't even bother and no upgrade and surprises at all. They say will check on this but never get back to you at all. Really disappointed with their services. Will not recommend friends to stay this hotel. Although location was very good but hotel service was lousy.

title: Good deal on a great hotel
desc: Staff were friendly, and hospitable The rooms were clean with with modern facilities, blinds were great. the basic room does not have a bathtub. The water provided can be difficult to open, hotel may want to consider providing a water dispenser so we do not have to keep requesting for the water. w The breakfast had the basic spread - western, asian, nothing special

title: Terrible in-Room Dining Experience
desc: On 29 November, a friend visited me and we decided to have room service for dinner to avoid COVID-19 infection risk as I was flying on 1 December. We ordered around 7.30pm. a short while later the operator called to say my friend's order of pasta wasn't available so we changed his order to steak. A short while later the food trolley was delivered. Then the operator called to say my dessert wasn't available. I said the trolley had been delivered and I signed the bill. I questioned why the operator didn't know what was unavailable when I ordered and why the food delivery person hadn't also informed me. Then I discovered that my friend's steak hadn't been included in the food delivery. When I questioned the operator the line was cut off. The operator did not call back. I

title: Stunning Building but appalling service and in need of maintainance and cleaning.
desc: Claims to be 5stars. Requested a room change upon arrival as an office block looked directly into our room and we were staying 11 nights. We had to wait 5 1/2 hrs for a room to be cleaned. Trays of food left in exterior corridors for 24hrs and covered in bugs. Hall carpet hoovered once in our 1st 7 days. Exterior hallways very poor maintaiance of walls. Mirrors in restaurant very grimy. Sat at a restaurant table which had been relayed but had food and stains on it. A huge turnover of staff resulting in little consistency or quality of work. Room key failed and locked out. 1/2 litre containers of gel and conditioner ran out and we're replaced with 18 single use tubes. When I mentioned it, the containers were refilled. Tried to contact their headoffice to provide feedback but

title: Staycation with family at Parkroyal
desc: I booked Parkroyal for a staycation with my family. The check-in process was smooth and Joe Kok our receptionist was very friendly and politely assisted with our requests. Thank you Joe and other friendly staff of Parkroyal! We enjoyed our stay at the hotel😊

title: Stay was very good as expected
desc: Revisited one of my partner and I's favourites just 5 months after our previous stay with park royal pickering. It was a last minute decision to have this stay and we were hoping that we could have an (payable) upgrade upon checking in if there were availabilities, but it was to no avail. The front desk staff, Joe, was attentive to the remarks that my partner and I had indicated when making the booking and was personable in the check-in experience. We were hoping that the stay this time round would differ a little from the previous one; be it a change of scenery (floor of our stay), or a different room layout/configuration. All in all, it was a comfortable stay.

title: Excellent Staycation
desc: Had my very first staycation at this hotel, and it was fantastic. My sister and I stayed in the Lifestyle room, which was comfortable, spacious and spotless. The check-in process was very smooth sailing, and we were even able to check in an hour earlier, which I appreciated a lot. The bathroom trapped heat very well, so soaking in their tub felt like being in a sauna, which was a cool experience. While it took a while to place an order for room service via the phone, the food arrived in less than 15min, and I also received a complimentary birthday cake as it was my birthday. The bed was really comfortable and I had a very good night's sleep. Overall, we enjoyed our time there, and we'd like to commend the staff for their excellent service.

title: More Hits than Misses
desc: Stayed here for the first time over the weekend and reserved the Collection Lifestyle Room. Check-in was on a Saturday and for guests driving to the hotel, do take note of the following. When I entered the hotel car park, it shows it still has many lots available, but in actual fact, the car park was full. I drove down to the lobby and was told that I could park at any available space, not obstructing traffic. As with a Saturday, long queues are expected during check-in, but there is no differentiated queue for guests of club rooms. At 3pm, my room wasn't ready, hence we were given a temporary access card to the Club Lounge on level 16 for the afternoon tea. The room still wasn't ready by about 4pm and we were allowed to use the pool. Then at about 4.50pm, we got a call that

title: Experience after a few staycay
desc: I recommend going for the lifestyle room. It’s bigger with rain shower and a bathtub. The urban room does not come with bathtub. I’ve stayed here quite a few times for staycations and mainly to take a break. The fixtures in the rooms are showing some age but the location is fantastic. Near Clarke quay, Chinatown with Hong Lim food center nearby. Lots of food options. Bed is large and comfortable. Hotel architecture is beautiful and the environment is quite serene with lots of greenery. Service at the reception could be warmer. However the rooms aren’t very soundproof. Can often hear noise from the corridors.

title: Our worst staycation in Singapore
desc: We planned our staycation to celebrate our son's, who is turning 1-year-old, birthday. We have reached the hotel about 10 minutes before advised check-in time (3pm) and found the long queue like everyone was going to the boot camp. After queuing for half an hour, it's our turn to check in before being told that the room was not ready and they had expedited the cleaning process. They would give us a call once the room is ready. This affected us a lot as we have planned milk and napping time for our baby. An hour passed, it was about 4.30pm and we have not received any calls. I checked with the senior staff and was told that the room would be ready in 10 minutes. 15 minutes passed, I talked to the other front counter staff and received exactly the same reply that the room would

title: Husband birthday
desc: Hi i would like to feedback you regarding my stay in your hotel on 28th november 2021 room 1320. The room was great but sadly to say that the complimentary cake which was supposed to deliver to my husband and surprise him was not delivered to our room. I waited the whole day. I was very disappointed as this was known to you guys way ahead before i checked in. I even enquire about the room decoration and all and u guys noted on that. The next day before checking out I dialled 0 to feedback about the cake and your staff said that she will send it to me right away pack in a box as i told her that I will be checking out soon to have my breakfast. Waited again but still no delivery of the cake so i decided to proceed checking out. Im just very disappointed and sad about this. I hope

title: Hard to match hardware @ pickering, nice food at Lime, and an exceptional friendly staff..
desc: Pre communications w the reservations team was most negative among the staycay hotels i did. However, the newliness, modern & practical room design quickly erased the earlier negative feelings. Surprisingly fresh food at the Lime buffet (though b4 discount price point on the festive buffet is on the high side). The whelks n oysters (suggest u bathe them in salt water to enhance taste?) are all huge sized, desserts had a good spread...which my sibling and i enjoyed very much. Special callout to Eileen Soo/Amy, very friendly and cheery thr'out, surely enhanced our dining experiences, and Eileen also went out of her way to help find a small takeaway container for us....as we insist we dont want to waste using the larger container, and rather not dabao. But while 3 of the ala-carte

title: HOPLESS STAY
desc: Very poor room and room services as well as the view of the room . bad view when i booked this hotel they charged me as per city or garden view but when i checked in into the room you can see the service building at the back side of the hotel with very bas corridor only one person in the whole hotel was good is Mohmad at the main entrance and extremely helpful.

title: Family Staycation Nov 2021
desc: This is not a complaint but a serious and honest feedback for management to consider. The overall experience is unfortunately subpar to put it nicely, this is clearly attributed to 1) Very low morale of staff, which is clearly observed in 7 or 9 staffs encountered during the stay (reception and/or club staff) 2) Perhaps the low number of present working staff With my knowledge of what ParkRoyal used to be and now being part of the PanPacific Group, the standard was expected to improve. However, this stay unfortunately caused much distress to my family. I love the brand for the longest time, this is clearly recorded in my membership, I believe proper leadership and management is required to save this brand.

title: Waited 3 Hours to check into our room.
desc: My partner and I booked a room for 1 night for a staycaytion. Our room was delayed and we were kept waiting with little to no updates unless we enquired the staff. Although we were offered complimentary coffee at the restaurant and eventually allowed access to the pool area after the 2-hour mark (this was upon requesting for updates on the room status). Eventually, we checked in to our room, 3 hours later at around 6pm. Although the hotel and room was great, I must say that this is the first time I've waited 3 hours just to check in at a hotel which I feel is ridiculous, considering the fact that we were only able to access our room at dinner time. We were only allowed to check out 1 hour later the next day. Hence, we were not compensated for the remaining 2 hours we spent

title: Business Trip
desc: The rooms are very good, clean and comfortable. Room service to ages to respond and found out one evening that there was no food after 22:30 except 2 options which had fish - which I didn't want. Just a burger and chips would have been fine or even a cheese toastie. I actually asked reception (as you cant drink after 22:30) if room service would still be available and was told yes. Its a really nice hotel and covid has put a damper on the experience after 10.30 pm. The communications and finer details need some work.

title: Not Much Expectation
desc: Check-in Queue too long at 3:00 pm and the Room is very small. The location is good though. Near to Funan Mall & Clarke Quay as well as Chinatown But rarely go there. Overall, I feel that ParkRoyal Pickering is overly rated by many.

title: No longer a nice hotel
desc: Parkroyal Pickering used to be one of my favourite hotels in Singapore but it’s since gone downhill. Elite recognition for GHA black members has disappeared. The hotel claims to be at maximum capacity even though there were rooms available for booking. Our bed was sunken in on one side. We requested for someone to check it out but the person never came until we complained again. The staff just flipped the bed over to the harder side which resulted in me not having a good night sleep. The lounge food has also gone downhill. The Saturday menu has not changed in months. Worse still, the quality of the food has declined. It’s not as tasty as in my previous stays. Club rooms are also supposed to come with a 2pm late check out. However, the hotel wanted the room back at noon

title: Lime Restaurant at Park Royal Pickering hotel
desc: We have a pleasant staycation at ParkRoyal Pickering hotel SG. The buffet breakfast and dinner are nice, especially dinner where we were attended by Ms Elaine Soo, who was very friendly and helpful. She made our stay even more pleasant.

title: Pleasant solo staycation
desc: Overall, I had good solo staycation at Park Royal Pickering. Even though, there was a delay of 2 hours in the check-in due to the large number of people who were staying at the hotel, and I did not feel particularly special nor valued throughout the stay, the hotel did meet my expectations. The place was clean, the staff was friendly, and the room was very nice and comfortable. A suggestion for improvement would be the use of scent in the common areas (i.e. lobby) and even in the room. I felt that a nice scent would have elevated the whole experience.

title: Amazing experience
desc: Farlini and the staff of lime restaurant made such a lovely impression! From when we were greeted, to having our meal, accommodating a last min request for a birthday slice to ending the meal, a definite winner! Thank you for the great experience and we’ll be back for another visit!

title: Lime Restaurant - great buffet
desc: 2nd time visit to Lime restaurant, this time for birthday celebration. Food variety less compared to pre-covid days but expected. Service was good. Staff was very friendly, especially Eileen, who was very warm and helpful when serving our food. Really enjoyed the dinner this time. Lime has once again impressed us. Will be back again.

title: Family staycation
desc: Had a wonderful staycation with my family at PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering. Very friendly and approachable staffs with great ambience and cosy rooms. Would love to revisit again. Thank you PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering for the awesome stay.😊👍🏻

title: Clean and friendly staffs!
desc: Warm and friendly welcome upon entering the vicinity. Although check in was slightly late, apologies were well extended to us. The hotel lobby is really clean and nice, rooms are tidy as well. Will come back again for a relaxing staycation!

title: Service has severely dropped.
desc: Honestly, this was one of the worst stays I have had at a Pan pacific property. From the first day, I was given the strong impression that with the recent change in manpower all over the hotel and the large amount of experienced staff that left; the service standards of the hotel is in shambles. This was compounded by how many times the staff failed to acknowledge that GHA DISCOVERY black member benefits had previously been accorded. This includes the welcome amenity and local benefit. The staff also seemed very unfamiliar with these benefits as well - some even questioned me what they were. This issue was made worse then by the fact that the phone lines were more often than not unmanned and on one occasion even timed out 3 times before someone was on the other end of my call.

title: Memorable Birthday Staycay
desc: Did a 3D2N staycation at Pickering, and was amazed by the experience. The rooms were inviting and modern. The floor-to-ceiling windows and high ceiling gave the room a spacious feel. There was greenery everywhere, and it was unlike anywhere else I stayed. Breakfast was delicious, although a wider variety of food over the two days we had breakfast would have been great.

title: FAMILY STAYCATION
desc: Thank you for the wonderful and pleasant stay at Parkroyal @ Pickering. To the wonderful and friendly staff, Shawn Goh, who helped our check in and out process so smoothly and was very efficient. He was able to fulfill our requests of checking in early and late check out as well which was very helpful because we had to settle our baby in. The baby cot and bath tub with a shower set was really good and so helpful for us even though we didn't have a bathtub in our room.
