Our baby managed to sleep so well in the cot during our staycation as well! Would definitely recommend to stay at this hotel to our friends and family! Thank you for giving us such a pleasant and lovely stay! 🥰

title: Family Staycay!
desc: Exceptional friendly staff and prompt service! Special shout-out to Mr James and Ms Jaycelle for their warm and pleasant welcome upon our arrival at the reception, as well as the club lounge. I thought this hotel won’t be children friendly but am positively surprised by the kind accommodations in allowing children to have access to the lounge during breakfast and cocktails hours. If you love green and eco, this is the hotel for you! The decor is soothing and relaxing. The pool offers an amazing view and it’s romantic:) Not to mention the accessibility to the amenities- close to a mall which offers everything! Thank you for making our 3D2N family staycation a fabulous! We wouldlove to come again!

title: Totally enjoyable, would be back again
desc: I stayed at Parkroyal Pickering for two nights and I felt rejuvenated after my stay. Quality of accommodation - The room was so spacious! I loved the rest area / reading nook, and the fact that there was space to stow my belongings at every turn. The bed was comfortable, and aircon, TV, etc worked well. While my Urban room did not come with a bathtub which I would normally opt for, the shower space was large and high quality toiletries were provided. Service - Check out was really express. Kudos to the staff who would greet guests so warmly every time we walked into the property. General - Love the green spaces, and the thoughtfulness / small touches - down to the different coloured toothbrushes, recycling bins, glass bottles. Pool - the pool was small but it is an

title: Best place to hold wedding banquet
desc: We have nothing but praises for our stay and wedding lunch banquet here. The service level at PRP is beyond our expectations and we are so extremely impressed by our banquet manager, Jason. We were not the only ones impressed because we received so many compliments from our guests about the food and service. It made our entire wedding so much more memorable and joyous. The rooms were very clean and comfortable too. We are also very impressed by the in-room dining. The food is so tasty and portion is huge. I especially love the Nasi Padang. The location of the hotel is also very convenient as it is just situated next to Chinatown point and Chinatown station. The pool and cabana area is also a must visit for that instagram worthy photo. Overall, we would highly recommend Park

title: Leading example of Eco-friendly
desc: It’s my first stay with the Parkroyal brand and I loved how eco-friendly Pickering is. Was there for my birthday stay and it was seamless. Nonetheless, would definitely return to Pickering, if not other Pan Pacific brand hotels.

title: St Gregory Spa
desc: Had a total wellness ritual done by a skilled therapist Siti. The massage was nice and relaxing. My muscle knots were released! She noted that my skin was on the drier side, and used a more moisturising mask during the facial. Generally, a great experience, would recommend the spa treatments, and would come back for more of it next time.

title: Upsetting staycation experience :(
desc: @ Parkroyal Pickering Selfpaid for upgrading but no nespresso machine, misleading info on website :((( website clearly stated got nespresso machine but not in reality. Can you please update your website info properly? Collection Lifestyle Room is without nespresso but your website stated come with nespresso coffee machine and tea making facilities. Others hotel will provide free upgrading of room while guest stated for birthday or anniversary celebration; while this hotel doesn't provide such free upgrading. Manage to check in earlier at 1:35pm unfortunately no late check out :(( No late check out is still fine, at least we manage to check in earlier. Appreciate this effort from your staffs. No special arrangements or amenities for our birthday and wedding anniversary as

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Stayed on 8th Nov in the signature lifestyle room with club access. Value for $$$ since it includes breakfast, tea break and evening cocktail. Thanks to hotel for providing a birthday cake & card upon arriving in the room. Was checked in by reception Joe, maybe he is new therefore abit delay in the check-in but it is alright. Just need more confidence and experience and I’m sure he will improve. As it was on a Monday, not very crowded in the hotel. We manage to enjoy the pool by ourselves, unfortunately the steam room in the ladies is not working (alright in the gents). Room was nice and comfortable although not completely spotless as there are hairs around the sofa. Air conditioning was hot during the night although i have put it on 21 with max fan speed. Love the amenities in

title: Staycay at ParkRoyal Pickering
desc: Friendly and helpful staffs, room cleanliness exceeded our expectation. Room was well proof to minimise disturbance from external. We had a great buffet experience at LIME too. Walkable distance to many iconic spots at Chinatown and good food can be found easily around the area. Value for money if you're looking for a relaxation and exploration weekend getaway.

title: St Gregory Spa & Massage
desc: Most excellent massage by Jasmine and Yvonne for my friend and I!! So so impressed. One of the best massages I have experienced ever. All the knots soothed and tension gone. Definitely worth a visit if you are staying. Will come back again.

title: Daycation @ Park Royal
desc: Extrenely pleasant check in procedure, we were assisted by Joe who was very accomodating and had a hassle-free experience! Joe was very polite and took the effort to explain everything, would definitely come back:)

title: St Gregory Massage
desc: The best massage hands down. The front desk was very nice to keep me updated on the last min slot and was so glad that the 60 min massage went great! Ask for Jasmine when you're visiting - she gives the best massage in my experience so far!

title: Mr Chia
desc: Signature Room very spacious at 398 sq ft. Room layout and bathroom facilities very well appointed. Full height windows very impressive providing 180° view. Convenient location next to Chinatown MRT. Next to hawker food centre with many famous dishes like charcoal roasted meat, prawn noodles and "bak chor mee".

title: Urban room package and requested for accessible room
desc: The accessible room was cosy, spacious and designed with end-user in mind. 2 way sliding doors to the bathroom. You can freely maneuver your wheelchair in the room. Automatic door. Emergency button available in the bathroom and room as well. Barrier free below the sink. Staff are all friendly, attentive and service oriented. Whole hotel is decorated using all real plants. Focus on eco friendly. Very pleasant stay. Will revisit. Special thanks to Ash and Steven Wong.

title: Lovely stay & Awesome Food
desc: We had an lovely stay at the Hotel in a Lifestyle Collection Room which was very clean and well maintained. Thanks to Khin. The food and drinks in the Collection Club and the Halloween buffet at Lime were awesome. Thanks to Jenisah, Chef Edmond and the others. We will definitely come back on our next trip to Singapore.

title: Compliments to chef sasi from like restaurant
desc: Overall it was a good stay! Shout out to chef sasi, from lime restaurant! I was vegetarian on that day during breakfast couldn’t find much of a variety of vegetarian food . Chef sasi who was at the buffet surfing , he took the initiative and effort to make a vegetarian noodles dish specially for me, even without me asking ! It was delicious ! Thank u chef sasi!

title: None
desc: Warm and welcoming staff and they offer a good advice on choosing our room. The Lifestyle room is spacious and the toilet has a bath tub facility. Our overall staying experience and the facilities like swimming pool, fitness center were well maintained. But the complimentary breakfast at Lime Restaurant could have been better. The food was satisfactory but the staffs could have been friendlier and could have offered better assistance.

title: Pleasant and Friendly staff
desc: We checked in on 9 Nov and were greeted by Shawn Goh, the front office receptionist on duty with a warm and friendly welcome. As we have booked three rooms and was early, we were given 1 room to check in first with the baby, it was really helpful when baby is around and when he needed a nap, appreciate much Shawn! The hotel room was spacious, clean and comfy, we truly enjoyed the rooms. We have had our dinner on 2nd night, 10th Nov at Lime. The Chef was very helpful and offered to cook some porridge for baby as there were nothing suitable for him, he took 15mins to prepare and within mins, hot plain porridge was served. It was the thought that count. Food selection at Lime was fantastic and delicious. We had fun and satisfied after dinner. We truly recommend this place and

title: Deep Appreciation to FO & Club Team
desc: My parents were celebrating their Anniversary & all the staffs at the Front Office & Club were truly helpful & wonderful, despite the manpower shortage during pandemic. I would like to specially thank Mr.Joe Kok, Ms. Esther Chai, Ms Jemmin, Ms Jenisah, Mr Fahmi & Chef Sylvia & Chef Edmund for taking such good care of them. Thanks so much for all your warm hospitality & prompt attention to details. We sincerely appreciate your efficient initiative & excellent guest services. You have really made their stay enjoyable & celebration memorable. We will definitely return again to support all of you despite such challenging times. Keep well & stay safe always, from a very grateful Dr J Lim

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: I came to celebrate my wife’s birthday at Lime Restaurant. Food is flavourful and delicious. Thank you very much for the great service! Especially to staff, Ms Eileen Soo, who is helpful and polite! You have made our day!

title: Good Service and Friendly Staff - Lime Restaurant
desc: Have dinner at the Lime Restaurant on 21 Nov. I was impressed with the service from your staff, Eileen Soo. She is very attentive to our needs. She took extra mile in recommending the desserts to us. We enjoyed the desserts. She would also clean up our table frequently to ensure our table is tidy. Eileen has provided excellent service and brought the service standard to the next level. It was a fantastic and memorable dinner experience for me at your restaurant. We will be back again and hopefully will be served by Eileen again.

title: Poor & inconsistent service. Room & amenities below 5*standard. Room not child-friendly. Online portal needs more work.
desc: I arrived as a pregnant person, managing a stroller and luggages up the stairs by myself even though the person at the lobby was available. The ramp was not clearly visible, and no one directed me towards it either. Check in was smooth and excellent, but still no offer to help me with luggage. Perhaps I looked all put together and merely disproportionately overweight around my middle. I was promised that housekeeping would send a baby cot to my room to see if it was suitable for an older baby. The time was 3.20pm.  I unpacked and waited for the cot.  Room was okay, view was good, cool double sliding panels that open up the corner of the bathroom to make the place feel more spacious. Bathroom supplies, tea & coffee were great. 4 varieties of cups/glasses seems like overkill,

title: Good location and helpful staff
desc: Helpful staff at Front desk. Nathalie, is able to handle pressure and fulfill my request during my stay. Good and quiet location. Accessible to train stations. Able to chill with my family at sky garden at night. Not so crowded when using the gym and pool in the morning. Easy to book the facilities on mobile phone. Overall, it was a pleasant staycation.

title: Birthday Dinner @ Lime Restaurant
desc: My Second year coming here and no regrets with the food . Customer service has always been good and suprisingly extremely fast when it comes to serving something or clearing something . Worth to come for an date night or like me to celebrate your birthday

title: Fantastic Day In My Life!
desc: I booked the hotel for my Girlfrine's Birthday on 14/11/2021; Initially i booked the standard urban room and later decided to upgrade to Lifestyle Room. To my suprise that hotel upgraded my room to COLLECTION Lifestyle Room instead! The staff wished Happy Birthday to my girlfriend upon check in, and the hotel frontdesk team also prepared a piece of cake for her and delivered to our room. I am really so grateful for all of this wonderful experience!! A huge APPRECIATION to the frontdesk team ! THANK YOU for making a wonderful birthday stay for us! Ohya, the room is superb NICEEEE

title: Dinner at Lime Restaurant
desc: Eileen and Li xuan were really helpful and prompt in their service. Appreciated the food and ambience. Good variety of food, would have liked maybe more variety for the western side. dessert was good and really enjoyed the yuzu meringue tart. thank you!

title: Exemplary Service in Lime Restaurant
desc: The staff Zul, Eileen and Lixuan are very attentive to our needs and meticulous in their service. An asset to the service industry! Ambience is great. Service of staff is exemplary. Will definitely be back to patronise again!!

title: Had a recharged 3D2N staycation
desc: Natalie at the front desk was efficient in letting us to check in the hotel room. Love the designs of the hotel,corridor & swimming pool 😊 💜 the bathtub of the urban room! 😊 Variety of bf to choose from & food were delectable. Hotel staff were polite.

title: Great wedding experience, even better customer service
desc: Held our wedding lunch on the 20th November 2021. Great venue with excellent customer service. The food was also amazing as commended by our guests. Our banquet coordinator, Jason was highly experienced and provided us with top notch service throughout the banquet. The hotel is very lucky to have such a dedicated employee like Jason. Without him, our wedding would not have been so smooth sailing. Special thanks to Josco as well for his dedication and support for pulling the wedding together during the pandemic. You are in good hands should you be lucky enough to have this duo for your wedding. Highly recommended!

title: Romantic staycation
desc: Absolutely loved it. Even the standard room has nice and big bed and very romantic. The food and service was also really good. Best part was being surrounded by nature. Really loved the whole experience

title: Excellent service
desc: Celebrated my partner’s birthday at lime restaurant and the staff Eileen helped to arrange for a surprise birthday cake with candle. The experience was fuss free and delightful. Thanks for the great service!

title: Great location, staff, room, facilities
desc: Great property that is well maintained. Amazing location located within walking distance to Clarke Quay and Chinatown (just next to chinatown point and Hong Lim food centre!). Infinity Pool is great for photo and for swimming. Staff exudes professionalism and friendliness. Had a great 3d2n stay!

title: Fantastic hard product elevated with an even better soft product
desc: Booked the Suite Life package, granted 9am check in with GHA Black. The Urban Junior Suite was excellent, had great views over the City, can even see the Marina Bay Area quite well. Best part of the hotel was the Collection Club Lounge for sure, 100% worth the premium. Unfortunately the hotel could only grant a 3pm checkout due to the high occupancy, if only I could enjoy the spacious room more! Overall service was excellent, especially at the Collection Club Lounge with Chef Sylvia,Chef Edmond, Jermin and Esther taking great care of us, proactively offering us drink and food too-ups, making sure we are well fed and happy! Special mention to Esther and Chef Sylvia, always keeping a sincere smile that is noticeable despite the mask, and ever ready to chat with guests. Micah at

title: Birthday Dinner
desc: I alway came here for my girls’s birthday celebration yearly twice. Food wise quite limited but I totally love the environment and all reactants staffs’ positive attitude. Especially gratitude to restaurant service crew Ms Eileen who helped us arranged the birthday cake to us. And will stop by to check whether food ok etc. 感恩 Ms Eileen…

title: Excellent Staycation at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering
desc: I cannot express how grateful we are to the service and quality at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering street, especially Ash who was the check in staff who checked us in. He was polite and accommodating, and wanted to make sure my pregnant wife had a wonderful birthday staycation at this hotel.

title: Pleasant Dinner at Lime Restaurant
desc: The dinner experience was quite alright, looking at the shortage of manpower attending to us. However, Eileen made up for the shortage. Her attentiveness was commendable and making sure our dinner experience was memorable.

title: Lounge Service
desc: During our stay here, we went for the afternoon tea and evening cocktail. We were greeted warmly by the staff Charmaine as well as Chef Sylvia. Chef Sylvia came to check with us on the taste of the food and we made some small talks. It was nice to see a chef paying so much attention to our experience. Overall, it was an extremely pleasant time.

title: Dinner buffet at Lime
desc: Waitress Eileen Soo was very friendly and helpful. She recommended us what food is nice, especially the desserts. This experience makes the overall dining experience wonderful! A good variety of food selection. Will definitely come back.

title: Amazing spa!!
desc: The ladies that attended to us, Cindy and Jasmine, was especially friendly towards us and made the experience more enjoyable and relaxing with their nice personality- sharing interesting stories while enjoying a nice, relaxing spa.

title: Staycation with Family
desc: Hotel rooms were excellent! The interconnecting rooms were great especially for families! Very happy with complimentary parking coupons as well! Will highly recommend to friends and family and also for my next staycation!

title: Staycation
desc: We were offered a complimentary in-room dinner and opted for one local and one western dish. Both were exceptionally fresh, well prepared and presented. We chose two fresh juices which were also a pleasant adage to the meal. The staff was very proper and presented us with our meal at the time we requested.

title: Otah themed staycation/ Christmas dinner buffet
desc: We booked 2d1n staycation here to celebrate Christmas. The services provided are wide ranging, from the afternoon tea, to the evening cocktails. The buffet spread for our Christmas dinner at Lime was nothing short of amazing, and the laksa was by far the best I’ve ever had in Singapore. Special shout-out to Eileen for her impeccable, attention to detail service, and going the extra mile to make our visit here special!

title: Wedding Banquet
desc: We just had our wedding at Parkroyal Collection Pickering on 18 Dec 2021 and was served by Mr. Jason Khew (banquet manager). Jason was extremely attentive, professional and he was very familiar with the operations of the wedding. His top notch service made our big day a very memorable one indeed. He even went out of his way to carry my gown trains during the whole wedding and gave his utmost best. Everyone noticed and complimented Jason even. Thank you so much for all your help, Jason! We truly appreciate you for making our once in a lifetime wedding so so enjoyable and memorable, not just for ourselves but for our families and guests too.

title: Poor service from front desk staff
desc: Check in on 20dec2021, spoke to Shawn at the front desk speed of check in was acceptable, however when we indicated that we were entitled to a double room upgrade, he seem to be lacking in comprehension and ability to rationally understand the situation and to escalate to higher management. Kept arguing that we were not entitled, and proceeded to take a snapshot of the membership entitlements from his back office, and proved that we were entitled. Insisted that the website was incorrect and he wasn’t going to do anything about it. I had to ask to see a manager before he even thought of it. After which he when to the back office, and came back saying that the manager Nana was not available to speak, and also said the website is incorrect, but could offer us a single level

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Had a wonderful experience at the LIME restaurant. Great food especially the BOSTON LAKSAAA🤭. It was my boyfriend’s birthday. I went up to a staff (Eileen Soo) to help me in preparing a little mini surprise for my boyfriend. My boyfriend loved the mini surprise, thankful that she entertained my request😂 Thank you Eileen, we had a great night🥰 (The cake was good too!!)

title: A decent stay with room for improvement
desc: I have stayed at various hotels in Singapore and decided to give Pickering a try for my wife anniversary along with my friends last week. Let me start off with what I like about this hotel. 1. Hotel is neat & cozy and their room is very clean. Layout is nice with good amenities. 2. Called for their room services to ask for extra pillow and other services and they are very polite and responsive to my requests. Moving on to what I found to be lacking. 1. We had bookings for 2 rooms and we checked in slightly before 3pm. 1 of room was ready while the 2nd room is still under inspection. We were told that the 2nd room will be ready within 10-15 mins so the reception advise us to wait at the first room and they will deliver the keys to the 2nd room shortly after. We waited close to

title: Excellent service and staff initiative
desc: Stayed in a collection club room, had some confusion when using the club collection lounge. Jaycelle was very attentive when listening to my issue. And promptly check and resolved the issue immediately, demonstrated good initiative and empowerment from management. Also very friendly and made effort to communicate with us and made us feel welcomed. Very knowledgeable on mixing drinks, made me a special cocktail of vodka pineapple and grenadine, very impressive with her initiative. Special mention to , win win, min Lin, chef sylvia jenisah and edmon in making our stay a memorable one.

title: A good worthy stay.
desc: The view was good. Convenient location. Near Chinatown and Clark Quay Mrt. 5 mins walk to Chinatown Point. The view from the pool was great. There’s a very long queue during check in. During my check out, I asked the front desk if I could just pass the cards and check out but she asked me to join the queue. Then when it was my turn, this male front desk asked me to drop the cards in the express check out box. This was a hassle and a total waste of my time.

title: Lime Restaurant dining
desc: Went for night buffet at Lime restaurant. Eileen Soo who served us was very courteous and helpful. She makes us feel welcome and gave us complimentary cake for our anniversary. Thanks for helping us take beautiful pictures!

title: Inadequate service
desc: 1) Early check-ing was not granted although I informed hotel in advance that I was there to celebrate my wedding anniversary. Queued to get my hotel key card from 2.45pm to 3.45pm. That is after I went back to concierge service to check-in on the status. 2) Pool is way too cold 3) Facilities are not exactly new anymore. 4) LIME festive buffet was overpriced and the quality and variety of food is not up to expectations. I have always heard good reviews but i was disappointed overall, disappointed.

title: Great suite room, good Club lounge service and food and drinks, fantastic location. Really worth it!
desc: The Collection Signature suite is truly a great experience. It makes you feel like not leaving the room. Plus the inclusive, constant flow of food and drinks at the Club Lounge. Not recommended for those on a diet ! The pool and garden on the 5th floor are an Instagrammer’s delight, as well as really soothing. We spent a wonderful evening just lying by the pool and watching the sunset over the city. It brings a different perspective to the city area.

title: Good staff services.
desc: Having a birthday celebration buffet at the LIME restaurant special shout out to the restaurant staff ELIEEN SOO and WAN for their attentive and responsive service. My family indeed having a good dinner here. We will be back again.

title: Spectacular looking building for a decent business hotel
desc: We were drawn to the beautiful exterior of the hotel which is lush with greenery. On the inside, there are some nice touches incorporating plants and water features here and there. However, overall it still felt very much like a compact business hotel. If you are looking to be surrounded by nature with green spaces to explore, you are better off looking elsewhere. I stayed in the Urban Room which quite small. Design was modern with high ceiling. Clean and comfortable but nothing spectacular. We didn't like the fact that the room was pretty dark even with all the lights on. The pool area looks nice but the water is extremely cold, as it is a high rise pool that is in the shade for much of day. There is a jacuzzi but unfortunately the water is cold too. Check in was also

title: Great experience and very good service
desc: I spent a month in this hotel and overall it is great experience staying in here. Good location and nice people, saw a lot of weddings here and 5th floor has a hidden forest park in it! Michael, the chef in the lounge at the 16th floor and Eileen in the Lime restaurant, are very friendly and nice. I definitely will come back again.

title: Excellent hotel, some challenges but still a recommendation
desc: Focusing on the positives first this hotel is a visually spectacular eco garden hotel with gardens spread across various layers of the hotel. Internally the theme is similar with a nice entrance and long corridor leading to its Lime’s restaurant, rooms are not over spacious but sufficient for a couple to relax and some have lovely views over to Clarke and Boat quay and towards Marina Bay. In room facilities are excellent with various light settings and night and day blinds and a mini bar, this was unstocked and typically when staying in a Discovery Hotel these are usually stocked if staying in a club room. On the subject of club rooms I would recommend this rate as it provides access to the club lounge for breakfast (with fizz), unlimited soft drink (hence my comment about the

title: Just Average
desc: Hotel maybe 5 stars but staff is problematic. Reception were the nicest and helpful. Bell boy made me carry my own bag and when they did carry, they threw my bag on the trolley and then stood there waiting for tips. Then murmuring like a kids behind the mask all the time. I would give a 1 star to the people working there.

title: Beautifully landscaped - needs improvement on customer service
desc: The hotel is beautifully landscaped, the rooms are clean and neat... that's about all we get for family staycation. We booked 2 nights for our family of 5 in 2 Junior Urban Suites, we emailed to inform the hotel of the 3rd person in one of the suites and received a reply that there was a surcharge of $70 per night. During the email exchanges, the hotel got to know that we were celebrating a birthday and offered to serve a birthday amenity specially prepared by their chef. Even though we arrived more than an hour later than the official 3pm check-in time, the rooms were not properly prepared. They didn't prepare anything for the 3rd person and there was no birthday amenity as communicated. We tried to call the reception just to ask for the add-on toiletries, towet sets,

title: A hotel stay in paradise
desc: I can honestly say that my stay at ParkRoyal Collection on Pickering in Singapore was the best hotel accommodation that I have ever experienced. We stayed from early morning Friday December 17, 2021 through evening Sunday January 9, 2022. The hotel staff was friendly and always helpful, especially Front Desk Guest Services Managers Natasha and Mujad. Our Collection Signature Room was very comfortable with everything you needed and the bed was perfect. The concierge staff was especially helpful in making sure that our laundry & dry-cleaning was always picked up and returned promptly to our room every day. But the best part was the heavenly oasis, the Collection Lounge on the top floor with breathtaking 360 degree views of Singapore, which featured a very talented chef

title: Parkroyal on Pickering - amazing hotel
desc: Unbelievable hotel !!!!!! cleanliness, staff, unique architecture, food ....everything was impeccable. We couldn't have enough of exploring the hotel and its gardens, brilliant architecture and greenery. Also the executive club access made it special with drinks at sunset, high tea and perfectly helpful and friendly staff.

title: A hotel with phenomenal architectural design, but less than average customer service
desc: CHECK-IN: The checking in was much later even though there was no crowd and we arrived on time. Check in time was told to be after 2:30, we arrived at 2:35, ended up only allowed in 3:30 or so. There was no crowd. HOTEL & ROOM: The hotel architectural design is amazing! From the high ceilings to the intricate designs on the wall at reception area felt like wonder. The room was a little disappointing imo, in terms of cleanliness, ergonomics and and the choice of some interior design elements like toilet floor tiles etc. ROOM DINING & FOOD: Their menu may have been the most confusing one I’ve experienced yet in a hotel. In short, after selecting items from a set of menus, supposedly available for room dinning, when ordering I had to walk the person through on the phone to the

title: Review
desc: The decoration of this restaurant is really luxurious, which makes people feel noble when they come in. The restaurant’s food has a different kind of exquisiteness This restaurant is not only unique in its dishes, but also very attentive in service, which makes it feel at home. Perhaps this is the most satisfying service I have ever experienced. This restaurant has achieved customer first in all details. The waiters in the hotel are very kind, especially Miss Eileen Soo, who warmly entertained and cleaned up very carefully, very clean and hygienic, which makes people feel the unique affinity of this hotel. No matter how small it is, she can respond to customers in a timely manner, just like the consumption experience of a five-star hotel in a big city is much better. If

title: None
desc: Went there for staycation. Best thing was the hotel was wrapped in greenery, trees and plants indoors and outdoors. Felt like an oasis in the centre of the CBD. The fitness floor on level 5 features a cozy infinity pool edged by pavullions overlooking the city scape, perfect for lounging or having a dip.

title: Poor Hotel - totally not 5 star worthy hotel
desc: Booked a room at PARKROYAL Pickering to celebrate my bf birthday, there was no cake/gift or any compliments given by the hotel or staff. The buffet breakfast at the Lime Restaurant was totally not worth its cost of $22.80/pax ++, the variety were limited and the food items were simple off-the-rack items, the taste were also bland. The gym and pool were below expectation in terms of size and both were packed during our visit. Not recommended

title: None
desc: The Hotel is new, clean and modern. Near MRT, Food Hawker Centre and Chinatown. Can find lots of food and shopping near the Hotel. The room is spacious but no connecting room for family. The bed is nice. Slept very deeply throughout the night. Aircon and many things are easy to control. Very environment friendly.

title: Amazing experience!
desc: Our first massage at St Gregory was amazing! From the warm welcome at the reception to the massage, the entire journey was very welcoming. We will definitely visit here again. Unfortunately there was rain and hence we were unable to enjoy the pool. Looking forward to visit again

title: lime
desc: Have a wonderful experience of dinner time in Lime especially your crew Ms Eileen Soo served us with the warmest welcome and overall good service. The choices of food seems to be lesser than before maybe because of the pandemic😷

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Really love how friendly the staffs are, services are excellent, comfortable environment for us to relax and take a break from working life ❤️ Recommend to anyone that love rainforest view and more to wooden furniture.

title: Excellent service
desc: Very satisfied with the service that was provided me. I couldn’t connect my Nintendo Switch to the TV but was served by Asri Nesbari and he went miles to do his best to help me by bringing me an extension cord. Very grateful to him :)

title: Christmas Buffet
desc: Awesome service from server Eileen Soo and also the other server servicing our table. Food wise could be better and have more variety. Not sure if this was the usual spread of due to covid they had cut down the variety of food. Overall it’s is still a awesome experience.

title: Highly Recommended! 🥰
desc: Dropped by Lime for our dinner before departing from pickering. Thumbs up for the food and service provided. Staff Eileen Soo was very attentive & nice & thoughtful! We really enjoyed our time here! ;,D

title: Great stayca and dinner at Lime
desc: Decided last minute to come by Lime restaurant to try our luck for dinner as we were told booking was full. Restaurant managed to accommodate us with their bar counter seats. Great service by Eileen Soo at Lime restaurant. Ambience is great. Food is fresh and delicious. Hotel is clean and well maintained.

title: Excellent Club Lounge Services
desc: Did a 4-night staycation at this hotel and overall it was a great stay but the highlight of the stay was the club lounge services. The room was spacious and clean but we stayed at 13th floor and there was sound of machine running by the bedside during the day because of the water feature on the 14th floor. Generally other services was great, although it’s odd that housekeeping service follows a certain timetable and you can’t request for a turndown service midday. But the best part of the stay was the club lounge service. The service staff there - Jenisah, Terry and Chef Sylvia - were very polite and the food was great. Their service was personable and we enjoyed our time there. Special shoutout to Jia Ying who went up and beyond to remember our orders over the 4 days we

title: Birthday staycation for family
desc: We celebrated our daughter’s birthday at the hotel on 19 December 2021. The good: The hotel is near 4 MRT stations (Chinatown, Clarke Quay, Telok Ayer and Raffles Place), making it easy for anyone to move around for sightseeing. It is also surrounded by malls where you can buy stuff you need. Prior to our stay, we requested a change in room type from Collection Signature Room to Collection Lifestyle Room. Even though it was a downgrade (we paid more for the Collection Signature Room), we wanted our kids to have access to a bathtub in the room. The Reservation Team accommodated this request and even arranged for a birthday surprise for our daughter. The rooms are clean and well-lit by natural light. Food and drinks served at the Club Lounge were good. What made us come back

title: Wonderful staycation with family
desc: Outstanding building structure. Green and Enviroment friendly design. Beautiful pool deck view. Homely bedroom decoration. Nice dining ambience at Lime Restaurant. Ideal location for tourists travel by public transportation.

title: Short Breakout in the midst of COVID-19
desc: Nice hotel. Great location, convenience with flexible accessibility. Great ambient. A few gym equipments breakdown and resulted limited equipment available. Should have remove or move breakdown equipment to make space for SD compliance.

title: Company dinner at Lime Restaurant
desc: We had our company annual dinner at Like restaurant and was serve by Eileen Soo. She is extremely friendly and took very good care of us during the entire evening. She gave good recommendations and took care of our dietary restrictions. Kudos to Lime!

title: Lovely staycation for family . Hope to come back again.
desc: Check in was a breeze served by front desk staff Javi. The lifestyle room was amazing with a beautiful view . Breakfast at Lime restaurant was limited for us as they are not halal certified . However was served by the cheerful and ever polite Amy who advised us on what we can choose and made the experience invaluable. Overall a very good stay ☺️

title: None
desc: All good, but I missed the personal touch. The face mask does not help to show the smiles of the people. But this hotel was too big and fancy. I choose this because of my 'normal'hotel was assigned as a quarantine hotel, also Park Royal. I am used, as a frequent guest to have an early check in and late check out (due to my flight arrangements.) This time I had to pay for 2 additional nights. I did not feel recognized, and I feel a bit ripped of. Sometimes housekeeping did not clean the room until late afternoon.

title: Son's Birthday Memorable trip
desc: The Good: -Very good location -Room was spacious / Clean and neat -Love the greens when I stepped into the room -Toilet design was very spacious The Bad: -Pool was freezing cold. -Too dark to swim in the night. The people I want to thank: -Thank you James and the other Old Uncle (staff too) to greet us (gave us a warm welcome) when we reached the Hotel -Thank you Gilbert for helping us with the luggage. -Thank you Jovan who helped me to get my new towels when I met him at the door. (He was responsive and fast) -Thank you Hotel for giving my son a nice complimentary cake -Thank you Hotel for giving us fruits (this is a very pleasant surprise) Thank you for making our Staycation memorable!

title: None
desc: Rooms are not upgradable and not able to get late-check out at all despite being top tier elite membership, we felt like an ordinary guest during the stay. The hotel was full most of the time so the environment felt noisy and cluttered too.

title: Absolutely amazing!
desc: What an absolutely amazing hotel! The staff, the service, the cleanliness, the location, the food..everything! Cannot recommend this hotel enough. We travelled with a baby and they made it so so easy for us, accommodating in everyway!

title: Anniversary
desc: Thank you so much for taking such wonderful care of us during our visit for our wedding anniversary. Your staffs were so very accommodation , especially Ms Eileen Soo , she was excellent (friendly, knowledgable and helpful even it was a busy day. Thank you for the cake and make us felt warm and unforgettable. The cake super nice. Once again THANK YOU SO MUCH for everything! We had a great anniversary day , and your staff helped to make it that way! We will be back next year! I’ll be sure to let you know in advance before we come again. Thanks again for all your hard work and consideration

title: Birthday Dinner
desc: Great ambience, ample selection, and attentive customer service. Shout out to Ms Eileen Soo at Lime who provided the best services waiting on our table and incredibly warm with her hospitality. Would recommend repeat visit for sure!

title: Birthday Dinner at Lime
desc: Was here for my birthday celebrations with my family, staff was friendly and helpful, attentive in clearing my plates, food was delicious especially loved the sashimi octopus was chewy but all sea food was very fresh, overall great experience. Two thumbs up

title: Buffet Dinner
desc: A nice buffet dinner with friendly and attentive waitress Eilee Soo. She keep checking on us how our dinner and even bring us an extra chair to put our bags so that we can eat comfortably. Service is so much better than food. I will rate service 9/10 and food 7/10. Overall above satisfactory. Thank you Eileen for making my dinner experience beyond my expectation

title: Hotel kept me waiting!!
desc: 1.First wait - Checked in on a Monday at about 2.45 p.m. Waited about an hour plus for my room. No one from hotel bothered to update me and I have to keep on going back at least five times to check on readiness of rook as my family was getting very upset with the wait. The queue at hotel reception for checking in was extremely long at about 3 p.m. and there were many families waiting for their rooms too. Queue for checking in was very long too. Unlike some guests, I did not receive any free coffee or cakes from the hotel. 2. 2nd wait - Called operator for room service at about 8 plus at night as there wasn't any direct line to room service. I was not able to get through for an hour! My brother has to go down to the front desk to advise them the situation. Then it was

title: Super bad experience check-in to celebrate occassion
desc: I have booked 2 rooms at Parkroyal Pickering to celebrate my very own birthday from 1st-2nd December 2021 1. Counter lady was speaking so softly We had to ask her to repeat multiple times and tip our toes for the details that she was trying to explain. I do expect some level of voice with clarity when you are performing a front line service in a 5 star hotel. 2. Check in is not possible at 3pm as the counter lady mentioned they are still "rushing to clean the rooms". If 3pm is given as the check-in time officially, we expect it to be fulfilled. If you cannot fulfill this request, you should then think about hiring more cleaners to speed up especially during the December holiday season. In my opinion, if you cannot fulfill 3pmas the check in time just because of the unexpected

title: Oasis in Chinatown
desc: The landscaping is awesome, the rooms are large and generally well maintained. It really does give a very posh feel and mixed with the greenery, gives a great, luxurious vibe. Located between Chinatown and Clarke Quay so it's extremely accessible. Food is never an issue with Hong Lim, People's Park and Chinatown Food Centre just nearby. Special shout out to Hamizan, the housekeeper on the 9th floor for such a cheery greeting in the morning and that welcoming smile.

title: Friendly staff @ Lime
desc: Went for High Tea on a Sat with frens. Food is good, unlimited serving of TWG tea and Bacha coffee, value for money. staff (Amy) was friendly and helpful. Its an enjoyable experience, will definitely come back again.

title: Compliment letter
desc: Dear Eillen soo, I want you to know how much I appreciate the excellent service you provided on us when I took my friends and family having food here. Your attention to detail, great communication skills, and ready smile made the experience even better than I expected.I am writing to thank you for a fantastic and memorable evening for me and my friends at your restaurant.The photos you helped to take is nice and clear. I would love to see you continue offering such an appreciating dining experience to your guests ..

title: Birthday Buffet @ Lime
desc: Good service! Kudos to Eileen and Li Xuan. They really served us like a family! Well done! And the foods are fantastic! Will come back again. I will bring my family over for the good services and food.

title: Satisfaction
desc: Tried this restaurant based on a recommendation whilst on a short stay in the area. Found everything to be excellent. Good food and service.The food is exceptional! Very tasty and well prepared and you can chose the different style of food. The dessert is wonderful too.I love the service at the place ( atmosphere is chill and cool ) and the staff named Eileen Soo is so friendly with the guests and always takes care to offer the best quality! She recommended the food is pretty good and for their price is reasonable. I highly recommend this place.

title: Exceeded Expectations
desc: I was really apprehensive going into my staycation due to the various bad reviews recently on TripAdvisor (late room, hygiene issues). However, I was pleasantly surprised when I got there at around 2pm. There was only a short queue at check-in and my rooms were ready. I had club rooms and the service at the club was fantastic. Afternoon tea had more hits than misses. Evening cocktails and canapes had a good selection. Breakfast food was very ordinary but the highlights were made-to-order eggs, porridge, Australian jams on toast and sparkling wine. If I were to nitpick, it would be that my mother's birthday card was missing. I pre-arranged it with the reservations' team, and I even offered to pay for it - just so my mother feels special celebrating her birthday. Thankfully,

title: Wonderful wedding banquet
desc: The William Pickering Ballroom was very beautiful for our wedding banquet. Many of our guests were satisfied with the service level of the banquet team. The AV / lights crew were also on point during the whole ceremony. We had a great wedding coordinator, Jasline, who was always prompt in responding to our whatsapp messages (even on weekends) and accommodating to all our requests. She also helped in the checking in of the bridal suite and day room on the actual day. Our actual day banquet manager, Jason, was also very impressive. He guided our whole programme flow very well. He taught me and my wife how to hold my dress and march in, was always rearranging my dress and guiding the phototaking/champagne popping! He also help us during the banquet to allocate time for us to take

title: Spend your money elsewhere.
desc: Champagne breakfast nerfed to cheap French sparkling wine. Lack of manpower, long check-in queues. Service staff that have lapses all over which too numerous to name. Example: If I arrived at the club lounge first, I should be one of the first to be served right? But I was one of the last to be served and I had to ask for service. Operators are poorly trained and not service orientated, and make comments that show that they do not know their hotel and rooms well. Will be staying far away from Pan Pacific and Parkroyal group in Singapore for awhile. It appears that management is not managing well amidst the pandemic, seeing various nerfs and the infamous charging for toilet amenities at Pan Pac SG back in 2020.

title: Lime Restaurant
desc: Food was good, atmosphere was great, customer service was the best :) To top it off, the dessert bar had fantastic flavours. Eileen Soo attended to us with utmost professionalism. She gave my friend a small birthday treat to celebrate the occasion and that was very much appreciated. Definitely a positive experience and will be back to visit again!

title: Pretty good in general.
desc: Check in staff is very friendly and allowed me to check in early since the room was available. Receptionist and waitress/waiter at Lime are friendly and nice. But not the staff at the buffet counter. No smile, more like working robot distributing food.

title: My birthday dinner yum!!
desc: Our server Eileen was so lovely and somehow guessed it was my birthday even though we didn’t say anything! And she gave us a free birthday cake that was suuuper delicious. Yummy :)) they also give you free champagne

title: Great rooms, service was a letdown
desc: Let me first say that I absolutely love the rooms. PR pickering in my opinion is the prettiest and has the best interior design / layout that is why we came back again. My recent stay at PR Pickering was quite disappointing. We booked the discovery suite dreams package for one night, followed by a collection lifestyle room on the second night. Total cost was slightly above $1K. On the first day, we were told that early check in was not possible but we could start queueing at around 2.30pm to check in. Understandable. At 2.45pm, we were told that our room was not ready. Seeing that the queue had more than 10 people already, we rejoined the queue and came back again at 3pm, and was told that as of 2.45pm the room was not cleaned yet and it can take anytime from 30min and 1.5

title: Great Service for the F&B team
desc: Brilliant service by the team. We got customised cakes for our birthday boys. Eileen Soo and Alys served us well. The food for great and ambience was lovely. Really enjoyed the company and evening. Will come again

title: nice attentive staff
desc: it was my mum’s birthday and the staff Eileen Soo made it special. It was sweet of her to give us a complimentary cake and offering to take photos. It’s not easy to maintain service level during covid when hotels are short handed

title: Best Customer Service
desc: Room service is prompt, they kindly helped us with birthday suprise as well~ The pool and room views feels really zen, with all the flora around. The Lounge is lovely, with impeccable customer service by Jiaying, who took time to check on us and recommend us different teas. I was impressed by the twg tea selection and highly recommend waterfruit greentea and moonfruit blacktea, which are exclusve to this hotel! Lovely experience with warm hospitality, thank you!

title: Cooking fume and scent on the pillow case
desc: The staff tries to make the stay pleasure but there should a more keen attention to details. Pillow case having cooking fume. Indoor slipper without plastic cover makes one wonder is it reused by others. Bath robe one has logo the other doesn't have.

title: Dirty pool and service. No customer service recovery effort.
desc: Check in was ok though there was a queue,the proess is smooth but not enough seats for the accompanying person to sit. Staff services are subpar to other 5Star hotel ive been to. Exterior of the hotel is pretty and nice. But the interior of room can be better maintained for a 5 star hotel. I felt like i was in a 4 star or 3 star hotel. The pool was very dirty and poor maintained. Please do something about it.

title: Lime Restaurant
desc: Visited Lime Restaurant for lunch buffet on 13 Dec 2021. Food wise is so limited with no much varieties. Quality so so only. Service is good but the spread is definitely NoNo for the price paid. For buffet wise will not come back or recommend.

title: 5 Star rating for a 5 star hotel with a very big BUT
desc: I wanted to rate this hotel 5 stars because everything is 5 star, from the cleanliness, to the holiday decor, to the service of the staff (except a really grumpy old man at level 5 manning the pool deck and garden walk. He needs to put a smile on his face.) But, Minus 1 from the score for a really poor hotel breakfast that came with my reservation. I cook a better breakfast than this hotel, tbh, and I'm not a good cook at all. All reviews online since last year across all platforms from blogs to Google Map reviews are already talking about the lousy breakfast -- cold eggs, cold pastries... Even the chicken wings for the Nasi Lemak tasted suspiciously from McDonald's. Maybe they didn't want guests to hang out a longer time in the hotel breakfast, but there are other ways to

title: Great dinner and service at Lime restaurant!
desc: I recently went to the Lime restaurant for their christmas buffet and my family and I really enjoyed ourselves. The service staff especially Eileen and Twinkle were particularly attentive and even got us birthday cakes on the house. Will definitely recommend this place if anyone is looking for a good festive buffet!

title: Dinner Buffet
desc: Today’s dinner was elite! The customer service was so awesome! Our waitress Eileen Seo was fulfilling our needs so readily. The food here are mouth-watering and appetising! We would 1000% want to experience this again!

title: Stay
desc: I enjoyed my 2-days stay as the environment is green, well maintained and clean. Love the Lime restaurant. Besides good food, there are friendly and approachable staff. The cleaning lady was also very proactive to ask us what need. They make an effort to make our stay as pleasant as possible.

title: Anniversary staycation
desc: Very comfortable environment and beautiful room, staffs are helpful and friendly. Club Lounge’s foods were delicious and the environment was very relaxing for dine in. Thanks for the special arrangement for us. The cake was delicious!

title: Dinner at Lime
desc: Food selection was average, but quality was decent. Dessert in particular was good! The service was great - Eileen was very enthusiastic and made our experience wonderful. Complimentary champagne was a nice touch as well.

title: Good service provided
desc: When my wife and I wanted to check in to the said hotel, we were told that there was a delayed in check in and we were given complimentary items at the Lime Restaurant. When we reached the restaurant, we told the staff that we have such complimentary items however, we were not told which are the items were complimentary. After asking multiple staffs who gave us different advices, Senior Service Ambassador Amy then approached us and help us resolve the situation. Despite that she can sense the unhappiness, she keep her cool and advised us according. After making our orders, she will drop by our table to enquire further about us on the taste of the foods. Amy has provided excellent service to customers which have already exceed me and my wife’s expectations.

title: Great Staycation
desc: My parents and I had a lovely staycation in the hotel to celebrate my mum's birthday. We were pleased with the plethora of facilities available - from the family-friendly and "Instagrammable" pool to the club lounge, where the staff were affable and attentive to our needs. In particular, we were swept away by the gorgeous views offered by the hotel. At night, the pool are gives a surprisingly clear view of Singapore's beautiful skyline. The bright illumination of Singapore skyscrapers against the backdrop of the night sky never fails to disappoint. The view in front of my hotel room at the 13th floor was also not lacking. It gives a panoramic sweep of Singapore's southern area: from the bustling area of Chinatown to even the Cable Car line at Mount Faber. Truly breathtaking

title: Compliments to the staff at Lime Restaurant
desc: Was here for staycation and planned for a mini celebration for my husband on one of the days. Ms. Eileen Soo has been very friendly, kind and helpful when she was assigned to set up the birthday cake at our table. Also, the manager, Nigel was professional, friendly and helpful. He actually remembered every dish that we ordered without having to check. The 2 staffs provided some suggestion based on their experience and make things convenient for us. Good food and great hospitality!

title: Lime Restaurant
desc: My family and I went to Lime Restaurant for my sister’s birthday celebration. Atmosphere was great. Food was not bad but has very limited choices. Sometimes there is a long queue for the western station, where guests have to wait for quite awhile for their turn. Would like to thank and compliment Eileen Soo for her great service. She has an outstanding customer service, always putting a smile on her face, excellent attitude as well. It is very rare to find someone like her in the hospitality industry. Additionally, she also prepared a small birthday cake for my sister. Overall, it was a positive experience.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Very pleasant encounter with Amy at Lime@PARKROYAL Pickering. She was very accommodating and tops in service! In addition she gave a surprise treat for hubby's birthday! Thank you Amy for your excellent service!

title: Disappoint with this staycation.
desc: I arrived at 09/12/2021 around 2:50pm to check in and We We arrived at 2.50pm to check in at the reception counter and was stuck at the reception for 15minutes because the receptionist seemed unsure of the check in procedures. Being already a little frustrated , the receptionist could still randomly ask me “If a room with a bathtub was still necessary?” I replied “of course” (we paid a higher price for a room with a bathtub) only to find out that the room was not ready. She even asked me to go walk around outside and will call me once the room was ready (it was already past 3pm then). I was so lost at the moment in time, because I was looking forward to get into the room for a cold shower, since I rushed to the hotel just to ensure we were on time to check in. The receptionist

title: A beautiful place to stay
desc: My husband and I stayed at this hotel between Christmas and New Year. I booked this hotel via Luxury Escapes on the spur of the moment. It was time to start travelling again and we really needed a break from the pandemic situation of the last two years. Having never holidayed in Singapore before it turned out to be a perfect base to get a newcomers feel of the city. This hotel is perfectly positioned between the Clarke Quay and Chinatown MTR stations so getting around is easy. Our room was perfect and didn't lack anything. The rooms design was very modern and amenities were great. There's even plugs to charge your phones/devices on each bedside table as well as the desk area. They've even thought of power points inside the bathroom draws to plug in the hairdryer. Having worked

title: Surpassing expectation
desc: Spent ten days here as a couple and the hotel exceeded all our expectations. We opted for the Collection Club room which enabled our access to the Club Lounge. The room we had was well appointed with all amenities and a lovely view of the front of the hotel (we were on the 13th floor in a wing room) and Clarke Quay. The general location of the hotel was good. On the edge of Chinatown and within a five minute walk of Clarke Quay and Boat Quay. We used the MRT for almost all of our travel and there were two MRT stations (Clarke Quay and Chinatown) within 150m. But for us, the outstanding feature of the hotel was the access to the Lounge. We ate nearly all our meals there, breakfast, afternoon tea at 3 and cocktails at 6. We did eat out a couple of times but needn't have

title: Stylish Hotel with excellent location (breakfast has room for improvement)
desc: I am a GHA Discovery member so, upon arrival I got a double room upgrade to a Signature King room. The room was superb, great views, loved the great windows even in the bathroom and shower. I stayed at the hotel for 8 nights. The best thing about the hotel (besides the landmark architecture and the fine interior) is the location, directly next to Chinatown. Only 5 minutes walking distance to either Chinatown MRT or Chinatown itself. I enjoyed the swimming pool on 5th floor. The water was a bit cold, but almost no one was there whenever I went there (usually early in the morning before breakfast). The only thing which disappointed me was daily breakfast at Lime restaurant. The service was superb, very nice and friendly, and the food itself was also excellent. I loved the Chinese

title: Good stay
desc: What super staycation!!! 😊😊😊 Green and beautiful hotel. Check in quick and I must say I was lucky and smart as I stay away from the weekend crowd! The best time to stay in any hotel during this pandemic where people are just booking weekend and public holiday period 😏😏😏 Food was great!🤗🤗🤗 overall a fantastic stay and thank you.

title: 4 Nights stay
desc: Beautiful and very clean hotel with large room size. The staff and check-in process was ok. Conceirge staff was friendly. Only thing is that the pool was too cold, we stayed for 4 nights but couldn't enjoy the swimming pool.

title: Beautiful but disappointing
desc: I love this hotel, the design, the facilities, the location. Unfortunately it did not live up to expectations and potential this time. After spending a month there in 2020 and achieving Platinum Card status, I had been led to believe that would have access to the Members lounge. On this basis I booked for 2022. On arrival I was told the rules had changed and I could not. It was largely on this basis I booked PRPS instead of a Hilton where I’m a Gold card holder. Very disappointing. Then there was the room servicing roulette. I asked for a flat sheet because the duvet is too warm for me. One day they’d leave it when the bad was made. Some days they’d take away. I had to call a number of times to get it brought back. Likewise the robes were so small they looked like they

title: Delightful Lunch at Lime Restaurant
desc: My friends and I used to have buffet gathering every month to catch up with each other. But ever since Covid, we didn't managed to. So this time, we decided to head to ParkRoyal Collection Pickering ~ Lime Restaurant. I must say, it's was a SUPERB choice👍🏻! The experience was indeed a pleasant one! Ambience of the restaurant was good, food was delicious, service was awesome! Definitely going to be back again🤩!! Now I am planning to have a Staycation here with my family for the upcoming school holidays in March! See ya soon ParkRoyal Collection at Pickering!🤩

title: Impressive hotel and nice restaurant
desc: An impressive hotel full of greenery. The room is very clean and nice night view. The hotel is convenient to business traveller and holiday maker as it is nearby to the business district, Chinatown, boat quay and clark quay etc. The staffs are all very friendly and great food serve at the lime restaurant.

title: Super Super stay
desc: Super super super weekend stay! Despite the busy weekend and Chinese New Year. Buffet was awesome with attentive service. Check in was a little long but understandable due to the busy weekend staycation. Worth every wait. Room was upgraded and beautiful hotel

title: Very cool hotel, great service
desc: We stayed in an Urban Jr suite which was well designed and comfortable. We found the housekeeping did a very good job keeping the room spotless. The room had fantastic open views of the city which was beautiful at night. The only downside was the lighting in the room and bathroom. The room has 10 foot ceilings with small lights which does add ambiance but makes reading difficult at night. The pool is Instagram worthy and the lobby restaurant serves above average food. Great location near Chinatown and CBD.

title: Doesn’t deserve to be classified as 5-stars hotel
desc: We’ve booked a 3-nights stay with this hotel first week of January. Due to the constant changes for covid measures, I’ve written in to enquire on the cancellation policy. Different representatives from the reservation team replied my email asking for all sorts of information but unable to give me a definite answer on my enquiry. Finally after a week of to and fro e-mail correspondences, a reservation executive took over and answered my enquiry. I was surprised that the hotel representatives weren’t able to answer such a simple question - cancellation policy! As we are arriving on VTL program, we were required to isolate ourselves up to first 24hrs upon arrival in Singapore. We’ve pre booked the room a night before so that we could check in immediately when we arrive early

title: Dinner @ Lime
desc: We had our dinner last night a the Lime Restaurant on 27th Jan 2022. It was the CNY buffet. The food was really good and the staff there were really AMAZING. They were very forthcoming and helpful. Esp Sous-Chef Mr. Shashidaran, Mr. Wan and all the service staff's hospitality were top-notch !!! Kudos to the entire team. We were really impressed and had a pleasant dinner.

title: Daycaytion
desc: Check in was a smooth and efficient process, we didn’t have to wait long for our room. We had a hdmi problem in the room and Asri Nesbari fixed our problem efficiently. Great stay and near many good food.

title: Great location, right at the centre where arts and heritage meet modern and metropolitan Singapore
desc: The location of the hotel was superb for people who enjoy both local hawker food and Instagram-able cafes or restaurants. Situated right besides Hong Lim Food Centre, the hotel is also within walking distance to many hawker centre in Chinatown and the Central Business District, The staff of the hotel were friendly and helpful. The room is well-designed and has the essential items that I need.

title: Great Service and stay
desc: We had terrific time at the hotel , Club lounge facilities are the best I have seen and made our trip the best ever There are few colleagues that I would like to recognise Abby at the reception she understood my need and helped me with my daughters and made out Anniv very memorable Jenisah/ Claudia and Jermin have made our trip the best with their service and excellent conversations , They are best staff u have and should be awarded and recognised for their service Chef Thye and Chef Serne were terrific with the food and cooked up really great meals Lime restaurant is also a amazing place along with the pool where the jacuzzi is amazing Overall I highly recommend this hotel to everyone who wants to live near all the happening places in town and close to the action

title: Birthday staycation
desc: We enjoyed our 2D1N stay. We can feel that every department made an effort to let us feel pampered during our stay. Kudos to the management to made this possible. Special thanks to the following staff: Check in -Abby and Ana went the extra mile to arrange a room based on our needs St Gregory Spa team - Angelia and Siti helped us a lot and the birthday treat massage and healing are truly to die for shout out for their professionalism Lime and Bar - Suren , Leslie and Asraf , truly a service oriented person , Gems to Parkroyal and nothing is a hassle to them , Hope to have a break again and yet to try the infinity pool . Have a blessed year and keep up the fantastic job .

title: Wonderful stay!
desc: The stay was wonderful! The junior suite was spacious and the bathroom is so inviting! I love the high ceiling and breathtaking view from my room and bathroom (yes you didn’t see it wrongly, there’s ceiling height window beside the bathtub, equipped with day and night blinds for privacy) The hotel is beautiful and this is definitely a place you can take many insta-worthy photo! The hotel prepared cakes, birthday cards and gift (chocolates) for my 2 kids and they really love it. I have to say that they took the extra mile to print the cards with their names on it. Service was great as there was help the moment I drop off from my car (I was alone with 3 young kids and a large luggage so this help is really needed). Check in was very smooth too. In terms of breakfast, I

title: horrible stay
desc: would like to say it is with extreme horrible the level of service your staff are carrying- ATROCIOUS you need to better train your "singaporean staff" .unworthy & unvalue for a night stay ,unlikely to recommend to anyone else

title: beautiful hotel but poor service.
desc: your room is beautiful but it is unhygienic to see left over food containers and room service containers left outside in rooms. Disgusting. Your communication skills are terrible in that no one told us we can pay for our room from the room, and there was no greeting when we arrived. Not very welcoming. Disappointing.

title: High Tea at Lime Restaurant
desc: Nice ambience and received very good service from staff - Goh Poh Siew. Very knowledgeable about the food/drinks! She would give us recommendations on what tea or coffee to try and also constantly checking on us.

title: Lime restaurant
desc: Thank you so much for the hospitality & the little birthday cake for my wife especially for service crew Eileen Soo.. Truly enjoy the service & environment over here.. Been here for the 3rd time to give my support to the whole team.. Thank you so much once again & definitely will be back again.. Knowing during this period abit tough, but you guys done well.. Great job..

title: Parkroyal Pickering Presidential Suite
desc: Nice hotel design but poor frontline service made me waste 3 hours at reception over check in and check out. Toilet had smell issues that took 2 hours to fix but also not completely fixed. And a foot lamp was not working making the room very dark. We stayed at the Presidential Suite. So honestly, quite disappointing experience. A relaxing weekend turned out to be quite harrowing. Please improve!

title: Great stay at Parkroyal on Pickering
desc: Smooth check in, amazing staff, conveniently located, great facilities and buffet style (but served by the staff) breakfast spread. The hotel is also environmentally friendly and tech savvy where you can request for room amenities and make quick bookings for the facilities online. Will definitely be back!

title: Birthday-staycation!
desc: The room is generally good including the service in the club lounge. There is still some opportunity to improve the food and beverage selections at the lounge. Check-in and out processes were also efficient.

title: Pleasant hotel to stay
desc: Hotel seems not enough manpower. Waiting time for room service and check in seems to be longer. Hotel staff is friendly. Allow to have early check in and glad that there is amenity from the hotel. The Lime restaurant serve nice food. Had a swim at the swimming but water is quite cold. Like their location as it is directly located beside Chinatown Point. Will consider to stay again if there is offer.

title: Great communication and very accommodating
desc: We are going to be staying at the hotel soon but even before we have arrived the staff have been fantastic in communicating promptly with us via email. They have been super accommodating with our requests and we are grateful for that. We are looking forward to our stay in a couple of weeks time.

title: Very beautiful hotel but staff lacks training and service quality.
desc: Very beautiful layout and design of the hotel. The plants and decorations on greenery theme is very pleasant and beautiful. During check in at 12.15pm, there's only 1 staff manning the counter and it took quite awhile for check in. Thereafter, shower tap in the room require a change of the hose as there were screeching sounds when it is turn out. Did not call the front desk to solve the issue as we have other appointments to rush to. In between, when I and my wife were heading out from the lobby, we were feeling thirsty and I went to front desk and ask if I could get a bottle of mineral water but the staff gave me a super unfriendly look and simply just answer no and said the hotel does not provide bottles of water. There was no question ask whether am I a guest staying at

title: Great Stay
desc: Very pleasant stay. Room was comfortable; great views at the pool/gym; good service on the Collection floor and great Nasi Lemak at breakfast. Friendly staff and was pleasnatly surprised that it was easy to request for HDMI cable. Would definitely come back.

title: Excellent Hotel stay
desc: Overall experience is great. Coffee & Tea is excellent. Shampoo & Shower is of great quality . Bed and pillow is comfortable. Definitely will recommend friends. Love the greenery of the hotel. It is quiet and present and good for relaxation

title: Caring service
desc: the team at the Park Royal always do their best to deliver in a caring way - room was comfortable and clean, good shower, wifi strong, great views. The team at the Orchid Club on L16 provides great service - thank you.

title: Celebrate birthday
desc: Not bad overall, just the blanket abit smelly. Ask to change it. Got lounge access, food is good too. Just the breakfast for club collection not different from the normal hotel breakfast. And slightly lesser food choice.

title: Dampened by weak management and service
desc: Relevantly impressive hotel structure advocating an eco conscious theme, located right smack at the heart of Singapore’s heritage & cultural district. It seems to be the ultimate ideal choice for the savvy traveler, what could go wrong? Unfortunately following the footsteps of many yesteryears’ esteemed establishments, the hotel falls lackluster in terms of service & management. Front desks were manned by a team of evidently young and inexperienced staff, delivering stiff impersonal service to a crowd of long awaiting guests. We unknowingly topped up some hefty extra for the club suite with club lounge access but were ghastly jolt by the poorly maintained tired looking room in dire need of refurbishment. Club lounge boasts amazing view, and all day refreshments, but

title: None
desc: Awesome hotel. Definitely coming back again. But am more eagerly Waiting for the $400 dining credit offers again. Room was awesome, nice and clean. Staff was alright, but need some clarification before details are correct. System didn’t reflect the accurate plans of our booking package.

title: Nice Lifestyle Room but less than satisfactory concierge staff
desc: Staff at the concierge did not greet us with warm welcome at check-in in Feb 2022. When I enquired if late check-out was possible, she sounded impatient and said that a fee is chargeable with an impolite tone. Other than this, we are satisfied with the very clean hotel room (Lifestyle Room) that comes with floor-to-ceiling window, garden view and bathtub. Please note: it was too windy at the hotel pool, the water was too cold to take a swim (around 4pm). Hotel is very near Chinatown MRT, with plenty of food choices nearby.

title: Great service at St Gregory’s but bad customer service at the front lobby!
desc: Was a patron in St Gregory spa. Always love the techniques of the masseuse as they are all very experienced. Will definitely return for more packages! Excellent! Only downside was the bad impression given by the Chinese male security officer. This is the second time that i had bad experienced with him. The first time was when we had to pass some snacks to our managing director who was serving his SHN, he spoke to us in a very aggresive tone and very unfriendly. And unfortunately, he was on shift again yesterday. This time, i felt he was very rude especially he was always at the main door. Upon confirming my spa booking, i was informed that i had to approach the reception to be given access to L5 poolside. When i arrived, i was stopped by this chinese security officer. He

title: Definitely not a 5 star hotel - don’t be fuelled by the architecture.
desc: Housekeeping didn’t turn up multiple times despite leaving the ‘make up room’ sign on the door. Food is terrible both in the restaurant and in room service. It is also a hassle to order both and the breakfast selection is extremely limited . Receptionists give zero instructions or welcome on check in.

title: Wedding Lunch 2 2 22
desc: There are 2 person that i want applaud in this review. They are Jasline Neo and Jason Khew. We had our wedding lunch banquet on 2 Feb 22, CNY Day 2, a public holiday. The pre-event coordination with Jasline was prompt and precise. She was responsive and responsible, even during non-office hours. We really appreciate it. The actual day Banquet Manager, Jason Khew was unbelievably awesome. Not only did he carry out his duties with flawless excellence, he went above and beyond such as: 1. Tea Ceremony. We had additional relatives for the tea ceremony, and he immediately assured us that it wouldn't be a problem. 2. March-in. He guided us how to walk, the pace to walk, how/where to assist by holding the gown. Practise trial march-in with us outside the ballroom before the actual

title: lots thing can be improved.
desc: cont hotel should update in the system what benefit guest should entitle. especially when its directly book from official hotel website. club lounge didnt know that we entitle for the access. key didnt been set for us to lvl 16. room 721 in toilet switch panel got problem hard to control. our room didnt have any bottle water so ask 2 times for water bottle around 3pm and 5.30pm and operator didnt show professional attitude when we ask for water by give us "sigh" on the first time we call. we request for piece of cake for birthday celebration on email which didnt sent to us. your website also advertise that we will receive strawberry and white wine which we didnt receive as well. pros the hotel was really good. the rooms and the facility was good. love the pool. except the

title: Excellent Service at Collection Club Lounge
desc: I have booked my 2 nights staycation with this hotel during Lunar New Year. I am glad given my room facing at the corner unit. Really like it, able to see sunrise at my room. During my stay, I am glad to be serve by Ms. Jenisah at Collection Club Lounge. She is really helpful and services was amazing. Really glad being serve by her.

title: A property that needs service improvement
desc: Let's talk about the good things first. I do love the concept and design of the hotel which made me felt relaxed even though the location is in the city. Simply adores the high ceiling with tons of natural lights in the Junior Suite during my stay. The bed and pillows were comfortable (I guess that's one of the basic stuff for such property right?). They have installed the drinking water filter in the bathroom which saves time to keep calling for drinking water. In Room Dining food I would say it was decent but nothing to WOW about despite the price you're paying. Breakfast/ Afternoon Tea/ Evening Cocktails at the executive lounge was great. Massage at St. George Spa was relaxing too, all thanks to my therapist Ms. Siti that made my experience a great one! Despite the

title: Wedding banquet.
desc: We made the reservation a long time ago to have our wedding banquet at the Parkroyal pickering. I can't fault it at all. Josco worked hard with us amidst all the changing COVID regulations and we had a great time. Both of us are keen foodies and we were really impressed with the quality of the eight course banquet that we chose. Or guests loved it too, with many complements for the house wine that we had as a free flow package. Service was impeccable, Jason was awesome as our lunch host and really made the transitions from tea ceremony to banquet very easy. He guided us along the way without being at all intrusive. Hotel suite had the comfiest bed I've ever slept in. Room service food was normal price and very good. All in all I am confident to recommend Josco, Jason and

title: Great location
desc: Location is great and service was outstanding but we were disappointed with the amenities. In particular, we found the bathroom too small. The Collections Club lounge was a bit of a hit or miss. It had a nice atmosphere and the staff were excellent but the standard of food on offer for breakfast, tea and cocktails was below par.

title: Wedding ceremony & bridal suite
desc: We would like to thank the PRP team who have rendered their support, dedication in making our wedding an unforgettable lifetime memory. (26-2-2022) The sales, FOH and banquet team have seamlessly coordinated a great experience for us. They are warm and professional and have done a fantastic job. Special shout out to Josco Tham (Senior Sales Manager) and Jason (Banquet Manager), they are awesome 🤩! The GM of PRP has made effort to congratulate us in person which was absolutely amazing and it was a surprise to us. 👍 Once again, heartfelt thanks 🙏 and we highly recommend PRP!

title: Urban Junior Suite
desc: Absolutely love the room! Spacious, comfortable, practical and definitely instagram-worthy. Slight concern in privacy (due to location of room/windowns not tinted) but no issue as long you keep your blinds down at night/or when needed.

title: Oasis in the city
desc: My husband and I recently stayed at the Parkroyal Collection @ Pickering and quickly fell in love with this property. The location is approximately 5 minutes away from Clarke Quay MRT, and there are lots of restaurants and food option/convenient stores within walking distance.
