You could stroll along the Singapore River, and the property itself is GORGEOUS, planted with a eco-friendly sky garden. We love nature, so it's nice to be "away" from all of the urban concrete and skyscrapers to soak in all of this lush greenery. Really a beautiful property with spectacular views, even from within our suite. While having nice hardware is a luxurious bonus, what my husband and I care about the most is a hotel's service quality. You can tell that the team is short staffed and scrambling

title: Worst place ever to stay under the mandatory quarantine (SHN - Stay Home Notice)
desc: If you are under Stay Home Notice SHN and need to stay under quarantine for 7 days please avoid this place. In-Room Dining Service is the worst, after one hour or more they inform you that something is not available on top of that they lose your food orders provided by third parties or other delivery services.

title: None
desc: Rooms are very clean and staffs are friendly, situated in very good location and easy to access. surrounded by amazing amenities and fantastic Chinese food. Junior Suite is perfect for friends and family and not much restriction on guest visit and my friends are enjoyed it

title: Best birthday trip EVER!
desc: This is the best hotel in Singapore by far, we had such an amazing experience. Everything starting from check-in, all of the staff whom we've encountered are all genuinely warm and hospitable, especially Natasha and Terry. Their Front Office Manager Jon leads a great team and you could really tell that they take passion and pride in their jobs. Seems like their management team are always constantly around the lobby as well (especially an Asian gentleman who is always floating around and smiling). It's very stressful to travel amidst COVID-19, but they make it a really safe environment for us, which is our #1 priority right now when we look and decide on which property to plan our staycation at. The property itself is gorgeous, an oasis within the city. Nature lovers would

title: Valentines Dinner @ Lime Restaurant
desc: Splendid food served at Lime for the CNY period, service was on point and spontaneous. Eileen was pleasant and very helpful, and even served us a special off the menu dessert to celebrate Valentines! Additionally, ambience was cozy and comfy, and food selection was very diverse and tasty. Recommended visit spot for festive occasions!

title: Nice hotel and will be definitely back again
desc: Check in was a breeze at the lobby as compared to other hotels that can often get very crowded and tedious. We were given a beautiful room., nice pooll etc …This staycation ticks everything on my list having a good time away from home. Will definitely come back again.

title: Romantic getaway, perfect Valentine's celebration
desc: My husband suprised me with a staycation at Parkroyal Collection Pickering to celebrate Valentine's day. It couldn't be more wonderful. The clean room and fresh linens made our rest so comfortable. The infinity pool and poolside bar was beyond fabulous. And a huge thank you to the awesome service team who made our stay really special. We can't wait to be back!

title: One of the Best, Great Service
desc: Service Staffs are friendly, courteous and knowledgeable. Good ambience and cleanliness throughout the hotel. Food is sumptuous at Lime restaurant. Missed a chance to visit the spa on this trip, but rest assured it's on my agenda on my next trip to this great hotel.

title: Pleasant enough stay but could be better
desc: After my first excellent stay at Pickering, perhaps my expectation has been elevated but the most recent stay leaves room for improvement. Plus Points 1. Serving staff at LIME restaurant have excellent attitude and service. Always trying to make one feel welcome. 2. Rooms are in good condition and interior and exterior design are very easy on the eyes and soothing with the pine wood and Japan inspired decor. 3. Housekeeping requests are fulfilled quickly and cleaning is done fast and efficient as well. Room for Improvement 1. My booking was transferred from Pan Pacific as it was unavailable for the dates I booked for ( I am totally fine with the hotel identified for SHN purpose and support it totally) but to let me know via email that my booking would have to be changed or

title: None
desc: Everything was good, just that the pool water too cold till I am unable to get down the pool. It will be good if there is warmer in the pool and the toilet light was abit dim. It will be good if can slightly brighter. Pillow is too soft and have difficulty getting sleep.

title: Love the massage! Best therapist is Siti
desc: This was my 2nd time in their St Gregory Spa with the last one being a fewmonths ago but I remember having a positive experience even then .I went for their Elemis Spa Massage this time and my therapist was Siti. She is amazing! Talented therapist, very friendly, and she customised the massage for me. I left feeling energized. I’ll be going back for sure.

title: None
desc: The staff went above and beyond to make our stay relaxed and enjoyable . The food and beverages are reasonable prices and good quality This hotel is located in a great area close to all attractions. Room was a good size and very clean. Service from all staff was awesome

title: The recharge that I needed so much!
desc: My experience completely surpassed my expectations. I felt welcome and at home through my stay with all staff contributing towards my wonderful experience making for a truly restful weekend with my family. I can't wait to come back!

title: Celebrate birthday
desc: This is my first time to park royal hotel’s buffet,nice food ,all the staff were nice,especially Elaine soo was nice,friendly and helpful.I had a good birthday celebration here.I will definitely come back to park royal hotel again.

title: Worth every penny
desc: I can’t fault the Parkroyal on Pickering, the hotel is picture perfect and the service is fantastic. If you can do yourself a favour and have a massage with Jasmine at the spa and wellness centre, I came out floating.

title: Fantastic service by server Eileen Soo
desc: She was the most accommodating and pleasant server we had for the night. We definitely will be back to the Lime restaurant in due time :) Not only was the food fantastic, but the overall ambiance and environment is to die for.

title: Best ever staycation!
desc: Had our staycation and it was the best! Spotless clean room with a garden view making you feel that you're in a resort. We started by doing our check-ins by Ms. Felicia, quick and efficient. Had our dinner buffet at lime. They have a fantastic selection of spreads. The seafood section was outstanding with chef continously shucking fresh oysters:) Few staffs that made our dining memorable with cares from the team, Mr.Asraf,Ms. Nichole, Ms. Twinkle. For breakfast, eggs can be order from your table by scanning the qr and entering passcode. The Gym and pools are all top notch. Must visit the garden on level 5, there's a lot of different plants and herbs around. Very interesting. Will definitely recommend to friends and will be back again.

title: Lovely stay at a place with lovely people
desc: We booked the junior suite for 2 nights following our wedding day. Room was clean and bed was comfortable. If there was 1 thing I must pick on, it had to be the shower temperature adjustment lever, which was rather tricky to manage. Had to rush through every shower time before it got too hot or too cold. Housekeeping was done efficiently when we went out to the nearby food centre for breakfast at 9am, when we returned to our room at 10am, the room was made up, supplies were replenished. The lady warned us about a chip on 1 of the glass, and updated us that it will be replaced shortly. Had our dinner at Lime on the 2nd night, the reception was friendly, our servers were exceptionally great, especially Satieeish and Denzel. They made us feel very well taken care of, and even

title: St Gregory Spa Massage
desc: Had a massage done at St Gregory Spa Park Royal Pickering. Jasmine was the masseuse and she was really good! Would definitely recommend. She got rid of all my knots and stress points. If you’re going to the spa look for Jasmine! :)

title: Excellent stay; would definitely return!
desc: We had an exceptionally wonderful stay and would love to return. A special shout out to Natasha from the front desk who was attentive, catered to our requests and was very friendly and courteous. At one point, our room card reader didn't work and the staff were very prompt in remedying the situation for us. The hotel is located well within walking distance to many malls and eating establishments so you're actually quite spoiled for choice.

title: staycay
desc: had a staycation here with my friend last week. really love the eco decor of the hotel. the room was comfortable and we were delighted to be treated to both greenery and city view from our room. during our stay, we received warm and genuine services from Jasmine and Yvonne from the spa and Asri who kindly helped us to set up our hdmi cable to the tv. overall a therapeutic hotel to recharge your mind and body. if i were to nitpick, i wished the room’s (1024) showerhead was less squeaky and if there was a bidet in the toilet it would have been a plus point for my muslim friend who was with me during the stay. overall, i still highly recommend you to choose this hotel for your next stay.

title: Best massage ever - fixed me!
desc: My second time staying at PARKROYAL Pickering… and my second time getting massaged by Siti- both the hotel and Siti were exemplary. In particular this time I had some sports injuries and tightness and Siti worked so hard and diligently for 1.5 hours straight and she FIXED me! The next day my tightness was gone and I was back in the gym training harder than ever - THANK YOU Siti! Whenever I return to Singapore I will always stay at the Park Royal and I will always go back to the Saint Gregory spa to see Siti

title: None
desc: The services are great at both the dining area. The staffs are so beautiful and they also can remember what drinks we like. Food at the Lime dining and bar was nice. The rooms we had was good. I liked to stay in this hotel because it’s located near Chinatown and so convenient to the public transport.

title: Great Stay, Most Excellent Service!
desc: As an architect, Park Royal @ Pickering has its own branding amongst the architectural community as a green and sustainable hotel. So I was very keen to stay and be part of that experience. That was probably my main motivation for wanting to stay here. I had a small incident on the first day. I fell down at the entrance steps (my fault really; was trying to call up the TraceTogether app on my phone) where my misstep sent me hurtling forward. As a result, I had some abrasions on my right knee. Thankfully, the surface was carpeted which helped to cushion my fall and prevented a more serious injury. What I wanted to highlight from this incident was the immediate care and attention that the hotel staff brought the moment I fell. I was tended to very promptly by the staff. First

title: Parkroyal @ Pickering
desc: Nice hotel and setting. Love the greeneries views ard the hotel and poolside. Enjoyed the club house environment and good place to relax and chill. Staff there is friendly and helpful. Travel around town was a breeze.

title: Great service & great location
desc: We stay 1 night at Pickering to celebrate our anniversary. It was a great beginning when we check in with Shirley with her beautiful smile. The service is impeccable and she give us the high floor with the preferred view. As a sweet gesture from her, we also receive the small cake when we return to our room. Pool is a highlight although we can only use one hour, perhaps due to restriction of covid19. It was never before. We enjoy the nice hotel with friendly staff. The location is super, near to MRT station(CQ) and eatery area. We would love to stay again for another remarkable memory of anniversary.

title: My experience
desc: Room was extremely impressive. Our suite room was beautiful. Food was average (lime restaurant). Quite disappointed with the meat as it’s cold when served but service was good. Received a small birthday cake from Eileen Soo ( Lime staff). The aunty (other like staff) will change our plates regularly. Lounge high tea was delicious

title: 10 star wedding banquet experience
desc: Had our wedding here.. it was an absolute blast. Our heartfelt and sincere thanks to Josco and Jason!! If there’s a way more than 5 stars we would give them more! Josco was working 24/7 to accommodate to our requests and questions, and Jason was an absolute master of the entire ceremony. Extremely patient and clear with his directions. Great team and also the food was fantastic (credits to the chef we don’t know his name). Decors and all on point. 5 stars all the way up!!!

title: Midweek hi tea at Lime with @mummiesgetreal
desc: Lime Restaurant has a Beautiful ambience & ample seating area.. great combination of savoury and sweets with their unlimited tea & coffee.. we selected the $78++ set good for 2 starting with a glass of Prosecco each for a refreshing start, then selected each a pot of the Vanilla & Moonfruit Black tea which was light and fruity for teatime. We literally savoured every bite and finished every piece… our best was the nasi lemak ball, shepherd’s pie, tandoori & yummy peanut butter, cappuccino tart… but best part was the super helpful waitstaff named Emmett when we approached him for recommendation of the selection of Baccha coffee, he politely asked the type of coffee taste we prefer and when we still couldn’t make a decision on the 4 choices they had, from 1910, Sweetheart,

title: Dinner at LIME Restaurant
desc: Came here for my mom's birthday and it was sure a pleasant experience! Here's a few shout outs to the people who really took care of us and made our dinner a special one. - Tan Bee Yen: Always cleared our table with a smile, super friendly and always on the ball. - Satieeish: Very polite, alert, and helped serve us drinks even though he was in charge of a different zone. - Eileen Soh: Brought us our birthday cake, checked in with us several times through our dinner to make sure our food and experience was good. - Chef Hoong: Man of few words but always kept a smile on his face when he served the patrons. Allowed me to customised my dishes and was generous with portions! It was a busy night but I could see the entire team working hard and tirelessly. Also shoutout to the

title: Zero GHA recognition
desc: Stayed nunberous times in Pickering as a plat member currently as a titanium member. All my stays in Pickering never once have I gotten a GHA amenities place in my room, ohh yea at least I got my double room upgrade, so it’s alright I guess.

title: Love this hotel and it's staff. Security guard save the day!
desc: Have to start by saying I lost my wallet I'm a cab and someone turned it into the police. James is a security guard at ParkRoyal, called the police station so they wouldn't transfer my wallet to a far away station. He's ex-pipice, so he knew the routine. Then he called and found out who is in possession of it there, so I could find him straight away. That extra keg work and thoughfulness saved me a very long day and possibly missing client meetings! He was so nice the whole time too. Thank you!! Also, the hotel is impeccable! I could totally live there

title: Lime restaurant dinner buffet
desc: I had my birthday dinner at Lime Restaurant with my family members. The seafood, sashimi platter and desserts are good and satisfied. Asian food is less variety. Their ondeh ondeh cake and durian pengat are very good. We like the restaurant ambient.

title: None
desc: A big applause for club lounge Need improvement communication btw lounge and reception A big minus for reservation and night reception Rsvn staff helps nothing. If not in their scope they should either transfer call or chk with Front deskonly keep saying chking upon ckh in. Some staffs at Front desk are less acknowledgedof tier benefit

title: Staycation + proposal
desc: Upgraded to the Urban Junior Suite - the room was fantastic! Room is spacious, well-lit with natural light, clean and very comfortable. It had a great view as well. The pool is a great place to chill and spend time relaxing on the pool chairs. The place is windy so suggest to come down in the robes provided. Breakfast at the Lime Restaurant was great, food was good with a wide spread of food. Service by the staff was great as well, coming over to clear the plates and ask if we would like tea/coffee. Shoutout to the manager Jon, whom helped to facilitate my marriage proposal at the outdoor terrace. Overall fantastic experience at the beautiful hotel!

title: Nice environment with well trained staff.
desc: Check in was fast. Felicia was professional and efficient and remembered me when I checked out when she happened to be on duty. The room was spacious and clean. Bed was soft and pillows were comfortable to sleep on. Amenities were good. The draw was actually the location of the hotel, being within walking distance of hawker centre, Singapore River and many places of interests. All in all, I feel that Parkroyal collection at Pickering is a well manged hotel and the staff were well trained and ever ready to serve customers with a smile.

title: Great hotel but slow service
desc: My sisters and I stayed in the Jr suite for one night. The room and facilities were great. The service staff were very friendly as well. Unfortunately, my sister met with an incident where she got her elbow cut by a small piece of glass we found in the bed. We reported this to the front desk and were told they would send the manager up. Waited for an hour… but no one came so we just decided to check out. Not sure if any follow up was intended.

title: Service awful
desc: A lovely hotel in a great position, sadly marred by sluggish and unfriendly service. Staff on the check-in desk with particularly slow and unhelpful: the hotel needs to sort this out, as this complaint seems to arise again and again. Staff seem inexperienced, clueless and really not sure how to help. Same in the restaurants – just not trained up to an adequate standard for a hotel of this calibre. I had access to the 16th floor breakfast buffet, and the service was second-rate. On the plus side… Great position in the city, fantastic views from the higher floors, and the pool area is very pretty.

title: Great hotel - let down by minor issues
desc: We were on a Luxury Escapes package - that was not acknowledged on our arrival and the hotel staff claimed to know nothing about it. The couch in the room was well beyond good repair being very worn and close to tearing, The bath was stained to the point one would not want to use it. The filtered water tap constantly dripped. It also seemed at though air-conditioning was turned off late at night - early morning as the room become very warm. Location and most staff - amazing.

title: Disappointing pool staff member ruins pleasant stay
desc: My friends and I were at the pool and ordered from the pool menu for lunch. My friend ordered the club sandwich and ate only 1 slice out of the 4 slices and we decided to swim. Soon later, the pool attendant approached us and told us to leave immediately and informed that “you have to go out now” since we have crossed the 1hr time by 15min. I immediately told him it is not right to pick on a minority group and that he should be fair and should’ve told the same thing to the others who were there even before we arrived. Soon after this we left. But, he stopped us aggressively as we were leaving in the lift as the doors were closing to tell us that his manager will be in touch with us and that the rest of the sandwich will be sent to our room. Half an hour later, we went

title: Rest, Rejuvenation and Inspiration
desc: Parkroyal Pickering has been an amazing experience to help regain well being balance.  The entire staff have been incredibly, graciously helpful to arrange postage of more than seven large boxes from Singapore to Hong Kong.  The food and ambiance absolutely incredible.  There is a hidden talent, his name is Chef Michael.  Michael is located on the 16th floor in the Club area. Michael prepares amazing breakfast entries ehich are not (yet :)) on the menu. Each breakfast dish is incredibly delectable.  They remind me of my favourite breakfast dishes across exotic Asian beach destinations. The entire staff, concierge, reception, bookingvteams have been incredibly responsive from onset of booking and to helping me check out at 2:30 AM To catch my 6:00 am flight.  I  incredibly

title: Perfect stay at Parkroyal Pickering
desc: I just finished a three-week stay at the Park Royal Pickering, and it was superb in every respect. I picked the hotel because it has a great location close to Clark Quay and Chinatown, five minutes from the nearby esplanade that is convenient for running or a night time walk. My room choice was the middle "Lifestyle room" and it was spacious with a beautiful view of the city center. The room itself was modern, and amazing with a large TV, desk, couch, modern bath and shower, all kept very clean. The air conditioning system is smart, Green and environmentally friendly. The room also had a full array of tea, coffee, and water refreshed every day. The hotel's restaurant Lime is excellent and attractively designed, with a greet staff that recognized me by name and made me feel at

title: Wedding
desc: Fantastic location, food and most importantly banquet manager Jason was extremely helpful. Not only in ensuring that the banquet went smoothly, but prepping us on what to expect, tea ceremony even when my relatives were late and also spots to take photos. Food was served warm for my wife and I after the wedding banquet. Highly recommended for all couples to hold their wedding. Both conference rooms and ballroom are with high ceilings and no pillars blocking views of guests.

title: Great hospitality, wonderful staff!
desc: I enjoyed my stay very much! The staff took very good care of us and were very friendly, attending to all our needs, very good hospitality! The view was breathtaking, with lots of greenery all around. Very happy here!

title: Disappointing stay!
desc: Had a 3D2N stay with them which was booked by my friend. Everything was going well till we went to the pool (had a booking from 3-4pm), I ordered a sandwich but ate it 1 out of the 4 pieces - as we decided to swim. Soon after, a group of people came in & we were told to leave by the pool attendant (John). We didnt realise we exceeded by 15mins, but he shouted across the pool for us to leave and it was extremely humiliating for us to be shouted infront of other guests. There were other guests who were there even before we arrived but when questioned he mentioned it was because there were 3 of us & others were in smaller groups or on the sun-beds which didnt make any sense to us - he spoke extremely rudely to us & we did tell him let him know it was not right. But he kept denying

title: Birthday celebration stay
desc: I have actually stay at Park Royal Pickering for my birthday,actually along the way there was alot of hiccups. Some of the staffs(I believe they were part timer) weren't sure of certain property knowledge . On my 1st day upon check in,there was a mistake in my room pricing ober the reception,which result in some issue with my room charge when i orderd my In room dining and also for my massage session,the staff(one of the Chinese lady was quite rude ) . But nevertheless ,there is some staffs I would like to compliment ,they handle the issue with professionalism and good attitude, 1stly would be Ms Nicole from Lime restaurant, when her staff wasn't sure of the pricing for buffet,she actually assist them kindly and also tell me that it would be cheaper price for breakfast if i get

title: Great hotel great service
desc: My sister and I visited the Parkroyal Collection on Pickering for her birthday celebration. We booked the urban junior king suite , it was a fabulous stay and one of the staff especially, Selvam he was very attentive and always so helpful telling us where to visit for food and booking cabs for us. Breakfast is really good too. Overall a very pleasant stay. Will be back again.

title: Always happy to be back at PARKROYAL Pickering
desc: Always awesome stay at PARKROYAL Pickering. My previous stay was back in August 2021 and I revisit this month. It is always my pleasure to stay with them and they have many beautiful rooms. Both of my junior suite and signature suite are corner rooms, which also mean I have excellent views towards Hong Lim Park. Both rooms are spacious and have a very functional room and bathroom. Thumbs up for Mr Jon Yau for his excellent services from communication to arrangement for my birthday celebration. Also, I appreciate front desk speedy response and thanks to Jayelle who checked me in. All the staff at club lounge are lovely and you get to enjoy beautiful views over here too. I am going back next week!

title: Relaxing city stay
desc: The Suite Life Indulgence package was great! We enjoyed the room, club lounge and the pool which had great views. The service and location of the hotel was also good. Would have appreciated faster check-in and more explicit offering of the sparkling wine for breakfast, as well as faster room service clearing.

title: Excellent Birthday Staycation at ParkRoyal Pickering
desc: Staffs has rendered excellent service from the date we checked in until we checked out. Food selection in breakfast were all delicious and ala carte menu in Lime restaurant are amazing. It was a beautiful birthday staycation with close friends

title: Singapore service
desc: Seloam went above and beyond for us. He always had a smile & friendly manner. He was very helpful with booking us taxis and helping us navigate Singapore. He was so lovely and accomodating us on our honeymoon stay. We would definitely come back to the Park Royal Pickering again.

title: STAY HERE over the Marina Bay Sands.
desc: I stayed at Royal Park Pickering and MBS in April 22. I rated the club, staff and service over MBS with the current covid restrictions. We were welcomed and did everything according to SG law but we’re treated as people. We could have drinks by a pool when we liked. Not at dictated times. The club always offered us more food and drink. Breakfast is amazing. This hotel is so clean. Staff organise taxis if you need. Room service is pretty fast 30 mins. I cannot wait to stay here again. The room has all the power points you need.

title: Healing stay @ Pickering
desc: Stay was a healing space for people who have a tough work schedule. The greenery at the hotel helps to sooth myself after a long day. A great time spent for the long weekend. I would take this opportunity to commend on the exceptional services from the Front desk staff, such as Shane & 2 others, at helping out to send my luggage up before check in time in the morning since I had to be away for work. In additional, assisted with my requests timely during my stay, such as harder pillows, bottle openers & housekeeping at the right time so that my gf won't get disturbed from her beauty sleep as she was resting from her night shift. I would definitely go back again!

title: Love the full glass windows and panoramic city views
desc: Did a staycation here with my partner recently and was overall very satisfied with the room, dining, and facilities of the hotel. Booked a suite room that comes with separate living and sleeping area. Spacious, airy and bright was the first impression when I opened the door to the room. A clear unblock view to the Bugis area, high ceiling and full glass window allows every possible light to enter the room made the initial impression even better. Comfortable king size bed, environmental friendly bathroom amenities were welcomed. Love the bathtub which could sit 2 for romantic showers with your romantic half. We tried their in house spa. Service was good and the masseurs were attentive to our needs. Price is on the high side and I wouldn’t pay for it if it didn’t come as a

title: Oasis in a City
desc: I booked a 3D2N stay (25-27 Apr 2022) at one of my top favorite properties in town for a birthday staycation with my friends. I arrived earlier into the hotel and was given wonderful check-in experience by the FOM Jon Yau, who also upgraded our room to the next category as I have Discovery status. When I mentioned I was hearing impaired, he was patient in explaining to me the club benefits and also the While checking me in, I casually mentioned that we were here for a birthday celebration and he arranged for birthday amenities to be sent up into the room. We got a decadent chocolate cake and flutes of bubbles. Very nice touch indeed. It is always the little things that counts. Since my previous stay in 2019, I noticed that the hotel has increased their Eco-friend touchpoints

title: Excellent stay in Singapore
desc: As a Solo Traveller I stayed in an Urban Deluxe Room for 4 nights - 21-25 April 22 and felt very comfortable. The room has a size of 28-32 sqm so it is not spacious but ok for a Lead in room. A stocked mini bar was not provided at the time of my stay. This service could not be provided due to COVID restrictions. My package however included Soft drinks which were provided. Furthermore the package included Breakfast, Afternoon Tea & Pre-Dinner Drinks at the Collection Lounge which was wonderful. My Gluten free meal requirements were considered outstandingly by Chef Michael and Sylvia and Jenisah and Dong Hao provided excellent service every time I was at the Lounge. They made me feel extremely welcome. The same applies to the Lime Restaurant and the team - Chef Sashi, Aesa and

title: World class urban jungle hotel oasis
desc: Where do I begin - having stayed here for several times over long periods of time, Park Royal has delivered on an excellent experience. Special shoutout to Lounge team - Dong, Michael, Charice, Jaycelle, Jenisah for their attentive service during our stay here they always went above and beyond to make breakfast, evening drinks as enjoyable and comfortable as possible. Having stayed at other hotels in Singapore at similar qualities and price point, I'd pick Pickering over any other hotel because of location, if you're a tourist you're minutes away from the top hawker centres (Hong Lim - infamous chao kuey teow, Maxwell - hainanese chicken rice, Lau Pa Sat - tourist open air hawker centre), right across the street is a mall with a grocery store and everything in between. And also

title: Wedding at Parkroyal Pickering
desc: The service and support provided by Parkroyal collection staff has been amazing from the start of our wedding planning till the end. We want to thank Wei Yang, Jasline, Edmund and all banquet and AV personal for their great work. We had our wedding the William Pickering Ballroom and the high ceiling really made a difference to our wedding. An important detail which their ballroom had compared to what other hotels didnt have was windows. The light coming through the windows from late afternoon to sunset was amazing. Our guests commented about how they didnt realised the windows present would make the room less suffocating. Food during the wedding was amazing and every detail we discussed earlier was taken into account by the chef and his team. Our guests complimented on the

title: Beautiful hotel, great location and fantastic stay!
desc: Stayed for over 10 nights Hotel exceeded my expectations. Staff were helpful and attentive. Big shout to Dave at front desk and Steven, bellboy. Beds and pillows really comfy. Partition wooden doors that separate the room from the bathroom can be pulled to ensure privacy if required. We received personalised attention from Nigel, restaurant manager and Chef Shashi as my family member has multiple allergies and needs to be careful with seafood cross contamination. She was very well looked after. Food was delicious. Location of the hotel was excellent as it is situated in Chinatown that has many Bib Gourmand rated hawker stalls and near Chinatown mrt.

title: Visit to Lime Restaurant
desc: I came for high tea with my daughter. Mr Satieeish Bala provided excellent service. His pleasant demeanour and patience impressed us. I asked for a doggy bag and he gave us a cute box to bring our pastries home. Satieeish went the extra mile to elevate my concerns when I informed him that I would like to bring a physically disabled friend for high tea in future. He told me to look for him and said that he would help me wheel my friend from the carpark to the restaurant. Kudos to such a staff who makes customers like us feel so welcomed that we’ll be back again.🤗

title: Awesome hotel in heart of Singapore CBD
desc: Top quality hotel with 1st class service. Located in the middle of CDB with access to some the of the best restaurants and bars Singapore has. Rooms have a modern and resort style decor. Staff is willing go an extra mile to accommodate . Stayed there with 2 kids and highly recommend.

title: Great location & ambience!
desc: Loved the ambiance & location. In Chinatown, with lots of restaurant & bar choices within a block or two. Also few blocks from Clark Quay. The rooms are compact but well thought out. If you want a little bigger room there are reasonable upgrades. The lobby & restaurant have a good energy.

title: Vacation
desc: Everything is perfect, from the concierge, room, staff, food and the place itself. Will definitely book it again for the next vacation to Singapore. So far I don't think there's anything that needs to be comment.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Amazing hotel. The service is outstanding. I left a bag with all my documents at a bar. Next day with a help of Khai it was returned to me fully, nothing lost. The pool has amazing view, all amenities very clean. Breakfast is great, highly recommended.

title: Great family stay with lots of inclusions in our booked package
desc: My wife, son and family and myself had a great stay at the ParkRoyal Collection. Staff friendly and very helpful. Food, especially the Satays, excellent. The feel of the areas in the hotel, very classy. We travel a lot and this hotel is up there with the best. Special thanks to Jenisah, Dong Hao and chef Michael. Vern Schuppan AM Adelaide, Australia.

title: Loveliest hotel ! You must stay here!
desc: I loved our stay here and really didn’t want to leave! From the comfortable bed, to the most stunning hotel, great food, friendly staff! This all made our stay perfect! Located centrally very easy to get to!

title: PARKROYAL Pickering
desc: Went with my mum and we both felt it was an outstanding hotel. The setting is absolutely beautiful and the greenery and garden was spectacular with fantastic views. We would both start there again. We slept very well with feathered duvets and pillows. The AC is set at an eco friendly setting which was just right. The concierge in particular was so helpful - although elderly he refused to allow me to help put suitcases in the car. Very very happy with our stay.

title: Amazing stay at Park Royal
desc: My partner and I stayed at the Park Royal on the 14th floor with a stunning view. Not only was the room delightful but so were the people who cared for us. Particularly Alex who always ensured our room was as comfortable and beautiful as possible. I will definitely be coming back because of their service.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Had an excellent stay in the Signature Suite of PR Pickering. The entire stay as well as pre- arrival process was well coordinated by Front Office Manager Mr Jon Yau. In the Collection Club lounge, Mr Visnu took very good care of us. The suite was spacious and had high ceilings. The city view from the suite was also marvellous. We look forward to another stay here.

title: Absolute Singapore must do experience!!
desc: One of my best Singapore experiences yet is checking into the stunning ParkRoyal Collection on Pickering. The staff from the door to all the food outlets were outstanding The St Gregory day spa is fantastic and we visited a few times and loved the massage treatments The pool deck is seriously a Instagram moment! Epic Like Restraunt is very good, great service and really tasty selections of worldly foods. The Club lounge was a treat, very good service and became super personal after a few days, they knew our coffee order! We strongly recommend this property and will be staying again as the staff and management went out of their way over and above to help us enjoy and make the most of our time in Singapore. Special mentions to Jon and the f&b manager (who’s name escapes

title: excellent.service
desc: i.drop my credit card at card park. the staff find it for me in one min and bring to my room i will rebook if i come back next time the staff name is khai nice room, good location, i love this city and this hotel

title: Great Hotel Location; Excellent Customer Service
desc: Checked in and stayed during Easter holiday between 15th to 17th Apr in ParkRoyal Collection Pickering King with Club Lounge access. A stone thrown away from Chinatown and Clarke Quay. Enjoyed the stay very much with awesome customer service. Special kudos to Allanah who was very helpful in clarifing most of my queries and sharing information not informed on first day. As upon arrival we were only given room cards access after processing checkin. The club lounge access is fantastic with attentive service staff and of course the service excellence also extended to Lime restaurant staff. The chef himself personally helped attended to my food requests as there was queue lined up so to avoid me ending up with no food after breakfast cutoff. We also had drinks at the bar and had

title: Not too bad
desc: Great location for tourist, but we are local so we didn't really need it for the location but still, it was good that it was near a lot of places. You could walk from one of three EW MRT train stations (City Hall, Raffles Place, Outram Park) depending on what you want to view along the way (from City Hall for shopping along Firestation, Funan and Central, from Raffles Place to walk along Boat Quay and view of Parliament, from Outram Park to enjoy the fullness of Chinatown). Alternatively, Chinatown (DT and NE MRT line) and Clarke Quay (NE MRT line) are much nearer. Pool is located on the 5th floor and has a great view of the city skyline. Had a great bath with shades blocking out all external lights during the day.

title: Thanks for making our special day extra special
desc: Our experience with the hotel was more than perfect. We wanted to give a special shout out to the banquet team, led by the Banquet Manager, Edmund, who made our special day even more special. Really appreciate his attention to details (e.g. the birthday cake prepared for one of our guests as our wedding fell on his birthday) and his patience in making our last minute requests possible. We would also like to thank Josco, for coordinating the planning and arrangements leading up to the day of our wedding despite the changing COVID situation in Singapore.

title: Great stay
desc: We stayed at the Parkroyal Pickering and it was great. Location was ideal for us. Walking distance to all the major tourist attractions. The staff was friendly. Breakfast was fantastic. The infinity pool is amazing. The room needed an update but nothing terrible.

title: 1st Class Hotel....Parkroyal Collection.
desc: I stayed in 5 star hotels before ... but one that top it all is Parkroyal Collection. I'm really glad, i had selected this place for my stayvacation with my family. Its a remarkable hotel that provides execellent service; from the friendly and courteous staff to the breathtaking skyline from the pool it was simply magnificient. The food and beverages served were perfect with the pleasant and cooling ambience. The breakfas in the morning with the hot tea were at the exact right temp, can only come from a hotel that had put in much effort to ensure the guest are fully satisified with their stay . For me, I'm more than satistfied i was thrilled. I want to take this time to deeply thank all the staff a memorable stay we had. *PS : Very Special Thanks to Mr.Ravichandran for

title: Quiet peaceful environment to recharge
desc: I stayed here over the weekend and enjoyed my stay here. First of all, the location is easily accessible from Clarke Quay MRT. It is also next to Hong Lim Food Centre which is a perfect place to eat at before checking in. I arrived early and was able to check in early into the Lifestyle Suite (Room 1303). I like that the bedroom has view of the pool below. The living area is great for sitting to watch Netflix while having a meal. The only downside was that the HDMI connection between my device and the television was not great. I was impressed that in the toilet, you can find a filtered water tap. Very environmentally friendly, no bottled water is provided. The bathtub also seemed slightly larger than other bathtubs one may find at other hotels. I also liked the fact that they

title: Perfect hotel to enjoy Singapour
desc: The hotel is perfectly located in Singapour so you can enjoy the city! Also, the staff is amazing: really helpfully and nice! The ice on the cake is definitely the swimming pool: what a view! Concerning the room, the king bed what just perfect and the room was clean and nice!

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: Fabulous hotel in a great location. Excellent staff - friendly, polite and efficient. Great facilities, outstanding pool and big clean comfortable rooms. Our package included breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails which were all good

title: Outstanding service, great rooms, brilliant club room
desc: We just completed an outstanding 2 night stay here. From check in- service was exceptional. The room was well appointed- with high ceilings and lots of floor space. The room class entitled us to club room access on the top floor. This was a great perk with good breakfast, afternoon tea with scones and other snacks, and a free bar with cocktails from 6-8pm including such good snacks you could probably skip dinner The hotel has an incredible pool. Fantastic views from every room My only feedback would be- it was extremely hard to dry wet swimmers and gym gear. Our stay entitled is to two free laundry items per day, but turn around was too slow. A drying service would be a huge help. Otherwise faultless!

title: Refershing stay with wonderful service!
desc: Each of my stays at Park Royal have been wonderful! Check in is always a smooth process and the reception staff are happy to make sure I'm comfortable if I check in early (first time they advised me where I could work comfortably before the room was ready). I would like to give a special thank you to Leslie and Twinkle who always greeted me with a smile and ensured I was looked after at breakfast with my dietry requirements. Every interaction I had with them was authentic and genuine. The pool is wonderful and a great ambience. The beds get filled up very quickly though! The rooms are very well designed with perfect amenities. They are slighly on the small side but that is made up for with the design.

title: Our second lovely stay
desc: We enjoyed PR Pickering in february when it was quieter in hotel, but this time round in May it was still really nice staycation, despite the reopening of borders. The breakfast and Lime Restaurant waiting staff were the favorite parts of our stay both visits; peaceful in morning, friendly and understanding waiters, nice range of yummy brekkie. The signature room is perfect for family of 4, the rainshower in combination with the Appelles bath range gave us the rejuvenation we needed. Even though it was weekend, the infinity pool (with no reservation needed) gave us a cool respite from current ‘heatwave’. A next staycation with PR Pickering is definitely in our plans!

title: Parkroyal Pickering Collection, Singapore-a stand out!
desc: Although I changed my room, with an upgrade, on my second day to a room with a bath (as originally requested) and a 'green' outlook, I couldn't fault either room, even though the second room was much preferred by me. The staff were attentive, polite, friendly, helpful & very professional. The rooms have all the modern innovations you could desire: electric curtains for day & night usage (the night time block out ones really do block out the light-my room faced NE!, pod coffee maker with regular & decaffeinated pods, tea kettle with Twinings specialty tea bags & specialty coffee bags; mini bar 'fridge; great, consistent wi-fi; enough powerpoints to satisfy every gadget; etc. The bed is fantastically comfortable & the air-conditioning is effective & silent. Bath towels are

title: Perfect stay for work and leisure!
desc: I have stayed at Parkroyal Pickering many times for work. Enjoyed the hotel service and cleanliness. Healthy breakfast available. Convenient location. Across the road is a great hawker centre for local food. The pool is a great way to relax. Highly recommend.

title: Perfect stay in the City Centre
desc: It was a good experience with a very comfortable stay and a friendly team for any assistance. Probably what I missed was the food during the breakfast, which was always the same set menu. I hope there can be some variety I have witnessed in many other hotels.

title: Great central location
desc: Ideal location for City, Chinatown, Singapore river, Marian Bay, connection to East coast MRT. Clean, quiet & all staff very friendly. Ambience enhanced by lush vegetation in the foreground of most vistas, some rooms have garden planting directly outside so if this is your thing then I suggest requesting it during the booking process. Poolside area limited, but then this is a city hotel & staycations popular in Singapore, so expect weekends to be busy. Breakfast had limited fresh produce (fruit: Only melon available), which was a slight disappointment in the 'garden city' & the polar opposite of past experiences at other PanPac group hotels, however Chinatown is just round the corner where you can buy any fresh produce.

title: Amazing Stay and Lovely Staff
desc: I had an amazing stay with my family at Parkroyal Pickering. Love the hotel and the staff. During our check-in, we were assisted by Mun Hei who was lovely with engaging us during the check-in procedure. I had like to take this opportunity to give a shout out to the bellman, Jaap, who helped us in many ways over the duration of our stay. He has a strong memory of guests. My young kid had misplaced his wallet at the sofa opposite the front desk and we did not realise it until Jaap found the wallet and passed it to the security for a quick return to be made back to us. It is wonderful to see, that with many guests being in the hotel, Jaap had a strong memory to remember who the wallet could belong to as he had noticed my kids sitting at the sofa. Jaap has also helped me to

title: Most unique hotel to stay in Singapore!
desc: The hotel itself is beautiful!! Love the busting green and new/ modern facility. Hotel room (we stayed at Urban room) are quite small but very well design so it's still functional. Staffs are kind and helpful throughout our stay. The breakfast buffet are full of varieties from West to East. We tried out the spa and they did an amazing job. The infinity pool and the gym was a great bonus as well! The location is the best since it's close to subway, Chinatown but still in a very quite part of town. The only issue I have was the hallway with low railing which I think it might be dangerous for kids or people who afraid of height.

title: Just to unwind
desc: We just relax our day, for long days of work this place is the best to chilled 👍👍👍👍👍enjoy the views, the pool so awesome, its my 3rd time to visit in this, I liked to book again in this hotel thank you so much u feel me at home 🏩😊👍

Great location, heart of Chinatown walking distance to everywhere. Love the green vibes in the hotel, enjoyed walk around the garden and seeing all greens around. Friendly service very impressed with the receptionist Shane, very thoughtful and helpful. Really appreciated your help to let us stay further for few more hours to rest up for the upcoming midnight flight, offered free shower if needed. Thank you for accommodating us. Will definitely come back for next stay because of the friendly staff, and most importantly 10 steps to Hong lim food centre easy to have access local hawker food!

title: Ideal Location for Business Travel
desc: This hotel has great facilities and spacious rooms. Furthermore there is good dining and other amenities. We were at this hotel for a business meeting and had to arrange early check-in due to our flight timings. The hotel staff facilitated this and were welcoming and helpful. The location of the Hotel and the close proximity to many locations including the Airport and Marina Bay Sands was one major benefit for a business traveler. Hotel provides good Wifi connectivity

title: Location and service — full marks
desc: Love the hotel design incorporating greenery beautifully; love the service — attentive and always trying even if they don’t have the answers on hand; love the little touches in my room (3M filtered drinking water tap; Eco setting on aircon; clean lines in room design). The location rocks — it’s on the edge of Chinatown, and the CBD and even within a longer walk to Duxton.

title: Perfect location, excellent service
desc: Excellent hotel, great value in a prime location. Enjoyed our stay immensely and will be returning without question. Room met expectations. Hotel amenity was excellent. We enjoyed the pool everyday and the club lounge is a worthy add on. Enjoy!

title: Another great stay at Park Royal at Pickering
desc: My 2nd staycation at Park Royal at Pickering. Love their urban suite. The most comfortable bed and pillows. They have improved a lot on cleanliness and housekeeping standards since my last stay in March. Room for improvement are the service standards at the lime restaurant during breakfast hours and choices of food for buffet. Will opt for club lounge upgrade if possible. Overall still one of my favourite hotels in Singapore.

title: Long waiting time to check in
desc: Waited from 3pm to 4:30pm to check in. Was informed that it would take 30mins to 45mins as the occupancy rate was high. Turned out to be 1.5 hours. No apology from the hotel. Unprofessional customer service. Bad experience. Will not recommend this hotel to relatives and friends. Should be the last choice for anyone who may want to stay at this hotel.

title: Hits and misses
desc: My first time back to the hotel in 2 years after being a frequent traveller. Overall I still like this hotel, it has a nice feel to it, I think the rooms are better than good and the club lounge is worth the extra money. The real disappointment though is the staff in the club lounge who don’t have a service mentality at all. Gone are the days when as a guest you would be waited on, now you have to ask for everything assuming you can speak to them while they aren’t on their phones. It really did get frustrating however the shining light in the lounge is Sylvia, of all people the chef, who clearly understands customer service and for that reason and that alone I would come back.

title: As good as always. .
desc: I have been back to this hotel for staycation many times. My first experience here few years back was really bad , since then they have improved multiple fold. Everything was really good. Check in, room, location, service, etc. Only suggestion I have is to make the redemption of the DS$ easier without having to queue for checkout . The queue is usually long so to have the redemption done online will probably help manage the crowd too . Otherwise, fantastic stay.

title: First experience with Pickering.
desc: It was our first time stay with park royal Pickering. We had stayed previously at Park royal marina bay and the experience is better if we were to compare. We reached your site @ 3 pm or earlier. we were told that room is not ready and given access to club lounge till 430pm. when we reach our room, we realize the key is not working and we waited for Felicia to send us the key. Even Felicia couldn't get the door opening till we realize that the door was not closed properly in the first place. After all the Hassle, and we settle down, is already 5pm. Yes , we do appreciate your late check out till 3pm and the champagne, however we feel that it can be done better.

title: Disappointed
desc: We regularly stay at park royal hotels and was looking forward to staying at this location. We arrived at 6pm to find that one of the 2 rooms was not ready. We asked for one room to be a twin which was not setup. The rooms were small and way to small to have set up as twin singles , basically beds only 30cm apart. Both rooms did not have the mini bar stocked until we asked. The club room access service was slow and often orders incorrect. The following night we decided to have drinks at the lime bar after returning from dinner , we waited 15 min before I had to go up and ask where our drinks were. The bar was not busy and there were 2 staff on bar. We raised with the desk the following day the issues mentioned.

title: Immaculate service
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to commend jia ying, Emmanuel and Zovian for their exceptional service when I was here with my fiancé. Their service was immaculate and their hospitality was like no other. So to Parkroyal I say; Please hold them dearly. They are truly an asset to your team and I would definitely be referring more of my friends and clients here. Cheers!

title: Best hotel and services!
desc: One of the best service and cleanest hotel. Staff at club lounge(Jia Ying) should be recognised for her hardwork and best services. She has been very attentive and observant throughout my experience at club lounge. Also shout out to staff( Zovian and Emmanuel) provided good services at club lounge too! Staff at front desk name Felicia provided best service recovery when I was waiting for my room to be ready upon check in. Would definitely recommend to others for this best hotel and services! 👍🏻

title: Nice environment for a staycation
desc: The greenery aaround the hotel is great. Booked the Signature suite for family. Sofa bed was comfortable. Room was a good size. As we checked-in on a Friday, it was very smooth and quick. TV was a good size with bluetooth for music. Only downside the soundbar wasn't working. Club service was very good. As they don't allow kids into the lounge for evening cocktails, we could pack some snacks and drinks back to the room. I find this a nice gesture.

title: Hotel in a Garden
desc: This is my 4th returning stay as this hotel really takes me away from the hustle and bustle of city living with the beautiful greenery. The food at Lime has yet to disappoint me thus far and I always look forward to their hearty breakfast during every stay. Most of the staff are generally nice and friendly, and it was heartening to see that the management endeavours to improve their services when issues are been highlighted. Would like to specially commend Mr Jon Yau for his efforts during this stay and am hopeful that the subsequent stays will be equally if not more memorable.

title: Caring and amazing relaxing treatment with Siti she was fantastic and I would highly recommend her.thank you so much 🙏
desc: Service and massage was excellent! Siti was just caring and wonderful. My first time in having a full massage and it was relaxing and I walked out feeling 10 years younger. Thank You for helping me with the begging of my Singapore and European holiday. I will return on our way back from Europe in August. Tina

title: None
desc: Nice ambience both in public areas and room. Room layout is very nice and very well laid out for both work and rest. Location at edge of Chinatown and CBD was very good for access to broad range of F&B choices.

title: Amazing stay 👍🏻
desc: Check in and check out process was very smooth! Staff at front desk and lime restaurant was awesome. Special thanks to Vanessa & Wanqi for making our stay a comfortable one as they try their best to accommodate to our requests.

title: Passion for hospitality best in Singapore
desc: We have stayed on Raffles, Fullerton MBS and many other top hotels in Singapore, and after staying here I have decided this will be our preferred hotel for this city I had so many experiences of staff going way beyond the call of duty. They customer service exceeded my exacting standards continuously! Nothing is too much and their friendliness is amazing. I lived in Singapore for over a decade and watched this hotel being built from scratch. It always drew my interest . Architecturally it is brilliant and then they added the greenery!! It is an oasis in a bustling hot humid city. To come to your room and pass water features, vertical green walls is so soothing. You get an instant sense of relaxation. The food and service at Lime restaurant is exceptional. I bought

title: Great Stay & Service
desc: The facilities are really good. However, the bathtub looks like a coffin (really rectangular). The service staffs (Khin, Emmanuel, Cheryl) on level 16 club lounge are really friendly and helpful. It was quite an enjoyable experience for me and my partner. Thanks Sures for the fun mixology class and appreciate Wen Xi for the smooth checkout.

title: Lovely hotel - average service
desc: This is an absolutely beautiful hotel in Singapore. I arrived late on a Sunday night and wanted a glass of wine before bed. Ordered a glass of white wine, and checked on its status 20 mins later. Eventually got a glass of red wine 10 mins later. Room was beautifully serviced. On the following evening I realized I had left my phone charge at the office. Phoned reception and the only option at 11pm was to come down to reception to charge my phone there. Not something I wanted to do at that hour - but perhaps this is par for the course. Would have loved a charger to borrow.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: It was a perfect stay. Amazing location and hotel. It is green and eco friendly hotel. Very helpful and friendly staff. (Natasha and Daniel) - very helpful and kind. Rooms were spacious and amazing - with all the required amenities. breakfast was great with lots of options. Accessibility was good. Near to chinatown, boat quay. Amazing pool , great view and facilities. highly recommended :) will go there again for sure :)

title: 555 Star Review!
desc: Had a planned stay-cay for my wife’s 30th Birthday. Arranged with the reception for any special arrangement which could be done for her. Hotel offered a complimentary champagne, mini birthday cake and also late check out for us to enjoy the stay. Room and amenities were good and enjoyable. Bathtub was big enough for 2 and was clean! Buffet breakfast has extensive options from different cuisines. Receptionists were polite and helpful. Overall, really enjoyed the stay!

title: absolutely fantastic stay
desc: This was truly a wonderful trip. and while it was work-related, the ambiance of the hotel made me feel like I was on vacation. From the entrance to my room, the dining areas, EVERYWHERE. All staff members were thoughtful, respectful, and helpful. My all time favorite staff was Chef Shashi. When I asked for his name, he hesitated and made it clear that it was Chef Shashi and his Culinary Team. This impressed me greatly as rarely do I interact with a "boss" who recognizes and states that he is a team member and accomplishments are team efforts!

title: Staycation
desc: Good room size and wonderful service staff. Check-in was a walk in the park with the help of Dave. We had to rush off for dinner right after check-in and enquired about bathtub in the room. They immediately did a room change for us and we were assisted by Selvam with the luggages. Upon knowing that we were here for birthday celebration, Shane surprised us with a bottle of champagne sent to our room. Wish we could have a longer stay there.

title: LIME restaurant
desc: Good selection, great and friendly service, quality of food is good👍🏻 Celebrated my mum’s birthday, everything was great, has a complementary cake and staff was willing and happy to help surprise her. Will definitely come back again!

title: Dinner buffet at LIME
desc: First time visiting LIME for buffet dinner with family. The place and service is great but food varieties are limited. Food quality is acceptable. Stated as birthday celebrations when booking but no complimentary cake or chocolate provided for birthday girl. Look forward to have a better spread next time.

title: Perfect location, gorgeous hotel, friendly staff. Overall 10/10
desc: Absolutely stunning hotel. We stayed with a Luxury Escapes deal and it was perfect. Nothing to fault. Fantastic value with evening cocktails. Location is brilliant. Breakfast delicious. The rooms were modern and clean. The staff were all friendly and helpful.

title: Excellent hotel in great loacation.
desc: Outstanding room and service. Second stay here after 7 years and the standard has not dropped. We had a corner suite - beautifully appointed huge air-conditioned room with beautiful balcony garden (the hotel covered in fabulous gardens). King size bed and bedding were extremely comfortable. Separate lounge with secon TV was very comfortable. Bathroom was massive with two sinks and separate large bath and walkin rain shower/hand held combo and quality amenties. Separate toilet. Used large outdoor infinity pool every day of our 4 day stay - very relaxing. Had access to the Collection Club lounge as part of our booking and highly recommend choosing this option which includes al dya access for soft-drinks and for breakfast, afternon tea and pre-dinner cocktails/nibbles. Lime

title: Wedding Dinner Banquet!
desc: Superb service and post-event service. Events manager Jarlyn was very responsive and meticulous, super helpful despite last minute unforeseen changes. It really helped alleviate our stress from planning. A thoroughly pleasant experience and we have recommended her and the venue space to our friends who are looking to hold their wedding too. Even at the food tasting session, Edmund (banquet manager) was patient and even accommodated to our parents' request to try the wine.

title: Lovely hotel in great area
desc: This hotel has the wow factor, after long flight we were welcomed with a smile, lots of Information and a map - he (sorry I didn't get a name) took his time ro make sure we were OK. Welcome drink would have been nice though! We had a basic room which was good enough for us as we planned to be out and about. Breakfast was very good and the servers were always there to offer another cup of coffee and we didn't have to ask. The room was super clea n and comfortable, the bed was so lovely! a cake was waiting which was nice and some macaroons which unfortunately the ants got to first. Pool area was lovely and pool had great views, we found a sunbed no problem. Pool menu didn't have enough vegetarian options and neither did the restaurant for an evening meal which was

title: Refreshing stay that left me wanting for nothing
desc: The hotel has a great, eco feel - a sanctuary in busy Singapore. The room and hotel design, service and green theme really helped me to relax during my stay, and the standards were high - clean, professional and nothing lacking. Great experience

title: Nice and pleasant stay at Pickering
desc: Smooth and fast check in, gotten a room with nice view and I love the tub... Soak into the swimming pool, steam room.. Just next to Hong Lim Market and walking distance to Chinatown Point, The Central etc... Nice and pleasant stay with all the friendly staffs

title: Buffet at LIME restaurant
desc: Excellent service provided during the meal. Celebrated a family member’s birthday & a complimentary cake was gifted to celebrate the occasion. Variety of dishes was decent, could be better but overall still an enjoyable meal. Will definitely be back in future!

title: Overpriced hotel with small rooms and unreliable service especially during peak times.
desc: I was recommended this hotel by a friend for my first stay in Singapore. The room I reserved, an ‘urban deluxe’ or whatever it was, lacked a portable refrigerator usually provided in most basic hotels. The room was much smaller than I expected - the size of a college dormitory. It’s so small that the bathroom has no separate wall. Instead there are two sliding doors, one from the entrance and one from the bed area that must be pulled to meet together to seal off the bathroom for privacy. The bathroom sink has a small filtered water dispenser from which you get your drinking water - No bottles of mineral water provided like in normal motels! There’s no way to chill the water since there’s no refrigerator. You have to call the front desk to request an ice bucket. This shortcoming

title: Excellent service at a prime location hotel
desc: Stayed over at the Urban Room with my family. The room we got had a great view. The room was clean and well maintained. The pool was clean and the 'bird cage' was a place for you to relax and chit chat. Nice ambiance. Will definitely be back if there's a promo next time!

title: Excellent stay, modern, vibrant with lots of plants
desc: I had a great time staying at this hotel during my business trip to Singapore. Everything is excellent. I love the room, very smart design. I'm quite particular with cleanliness and comfort, quite extreme to some certain extent, but this hotel really makes me feel very relaxed. I've been to a number of 4 or 5-star hotels before, but so far, only this one makes me feel very pleased and content. Highly highly recommended. I know people are different, but I think 95% would agree with my review :D Next time in Singapore, if I can find a good rate (discount/promotion/...) , I would definitely try to afford to stay at this hotel :P

title: None
desc: Staff and service is amazing ! Very welcoming and courteous. I had some medical emergency and staff helped out, even sent breakfast to the room. Breakfast had a lot of options but not great. In room dining has limited options too.

title: Good service by Eileen Soo
desc: Eileen took good care of my special needs and helped me with my dinner. Very courteous and professional. The restaurant has a good spread and prompt service as well. Recommended for business professionals who want to stay close to the business hub

title: Great experience only
desc: I was staying for a night only since I had a very long layover and I really needed a good rest since all hotels in the transit area were full. I didn’t mind going downtown since this hotel is pretty close to the MRT, it takes around 50 mins from the airport using the MRT. I had a great stay nonetheless, the bed is very comfortable, the room is spacious and very clean. Not to mention, I really like the hospitality and the building’s design!

title: What a great place to stay
desc: A fantastic place to stay! The staff are sensational! I recommend that you purchase the package that gives you access to the 16th floor. Fantastic breakfast after noon tea and beer/wine/cocktails/spirits are included! The garden walk is also amazing

title: Business gathering Dinner
desc: I had a wonderful celebration at Lime restaurant. The atmosphere and setting was just right. Though the restaurant was very busy,but staffs was very attentive especially Eileen Soo.She really took the extra mile to ensure that all our drinks are filled up and even did a few recommendations on the dessert.Your dessert is one of the better class that I had recently since covid open. I will definitely recommend it to my business circles and ask them to come and try your lobster Laksa and all your wonderful dessert especially the Ondeh Ondeh cake and mini lemon tarts Simply irresistible. I almost want to ask for take away of that's possible.

title: Start of our Honeymoon in Singapore.
desc: Start of our Honeymoon.Well what a start it was fantastic from start to finish.I can't recommend to highly enough.The place is stunning and the attention to detail is class .The hotel goes out its way to help in any sharp or form we say in England. The food is excellent as well as the service.We did the upgrade with collection club,which is a 100% defo to do .Finally the hotel is in the centre of everything to would want and need .It's a must hotel to do when in Singapore.Thank you!! Till the next time x

title: Quality at its best!
desc: The rooms are nicely lit and the ambience screams 5 star. Breakfast was also excellent and there were no hassles checking in and out of the hotel. Plenty to do in one stay cay, wish we made full use of the facilities i.e. massage spa but the pool and gym were great!

title: Tropical Sustainable Hotel 10/10
desc: Thank you was an exceptional experience. The room was amazing , the staff were personable and helpful. The gardens and pool were beautiful. The sustainable principles were impressive. We will be back.

title: Staycation while everyone else is travelling out of the country
desc: The Staffs from the receptionists, staff who cleaned the rooms, room service were all very welcoming and friendly. The room we had which has been our usual room for the previous 4 stays, junior suite was great! It was also our first time trying the in-room dining as we did not manage to dine at the LIME restaurant and the food was terrific.

title: Happy with the stay
desc: It was a pleasant stay. The room and toilet areas are spacious. I'm happy with the cleanliness of the room and toilet. The bed is comfortable. The TV size is bigger than usual ones in other hotels. The overall experience is good and I will definitely return when there's a chance.

title: Quality as usual
desc: Booked 2 rooms, 2 nights each. From the service staffs to amenities and facilities.... I cannot express how impress I am with this hotel. No regrets staying here and will be back. Keep up the good work!

title: Always wanted to stay here and finally did it
desc: We’ve been visiting Singapore for many years. We love the place and have stayed in various places all over Singapore. I’ve been wanting to stay at Park Royal at Pickering for many years and we finally found a deal we could afford. It’s architecturally very impressive and has a lovely ambiance. The staff are just lovely and can’t do enough for you. Lime restaurant provides an impressive array of different foods and beverages for breakfast, some of those changing daily. The location is great with MRT access either side of the hotel. If you’re in to walking as I am, the river district in Clarke Quay is only a few blocks away, as is Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, and the city or downtown district. China Town is right next door. If we could afford it, we’d stay here

title: Short Staycay for R&R
desc: First stay since it was rebranded. Environment has a relaxing ambience. Rooms are neat. Facilities and food are of a great class. Thanks to Mr Ravi for accomodating. Will definitely make visit again!!

title: Steve & Mandy
desc: We had a great stay at the Parkroyal Collection Pickering. The hotel, location and staff are fantastic. We had use of the Club Lounge where all the staff were great but it was made an even better experience because of Leslie and Chef Sylvia. They were lovely hosts, very pleasant and helpful. Would stay here again

title: Anniversary Staycay
desc: Had a wonderful staycay at PARKROYAL Pickering. Was upgraded to Lifestyle Premier Room which comes with a bathtub. The room has a pleasant smell when we entered and we loved it. The hotel even gave us complimentary cake and macarons. We enjoyed very much and is looking forward to return 😀

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel. Rooms very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent and the staff always friendly and attentive. Great location as can get everywhere easily. Infinity pool location high up with good views over downtown was a nice bonus.

title: A fabulous stay in an amazing hotel
desc: The hotel is very practical yet beautiful, the club lounge was absolutely superb, all of the staff without exception was helpful, courteous and friendly. The swimming pool and gym are excellent too. Of all the places we’ve stayed in Singapore over many years, we would rate this Park Royal the best!

title: Hotel that is a home away from home.
desc: Had a great stay at the Parkroyal Pickering. The hotel is a modern hotel that is well maintained , with amazingly comfortable and clean rooms. The hotel bed was extremely comfortable and the walk in shower was a treat. The view from my room on Level 10 was a bonus further improved by the almost floor to ceiling height windows. Breakfast selection and service at the buffet was superb.

title: Brilliant
desc: We have stayed in many hotels in the Chinatown area in the many years we have been travelling to Singapore. This has been THE BEST hotel by far, in terms of the whole package: location, amenities, service, comfort and cleanliness. The pool area is fantastic and the view across Hong Lim Park and towards the Durian is spectacular at all times of the day. There are many, many lovely spaces dotted throughout the hotel. The lobby, seating areas on Level 6, the Garden Walk, the passageways with wide ledges affording a seat with brilliant views. Our room included Collection Club Lounge, which was also in a great position and service was excellent. The views from the Lounge (on 16th floor) were again fantastic. Housekeeping did a great job of keeping our room clean and tidy

title: Room with tropical garden view
desc: I loved my room on the 6th floor with a view to the roof terrace/garden and the infinity pool on the 5th floor. The breakfast was nice, the design of the hotel is great with all the hanging "gardens", lots of green everywhere!

title: Fantastic location and amazing looking hotel
desc: We stayed here for 4 nights and booked through Luxury Escapes which gave us access to the club room. And I’m so thankful we had this as my husband was unwell at times so we would eat and drink at the Club lounge where we met a fun couple and the head bus boy Phil 😉. The staff and food was delicious. The location of the hotel is perfect. Easy to walk to Clarke Quay, and Chinatown is 2 minutes walk away. The pool is pretty special, especially at night with all the city lights. During the day there is a lovely garden walk on the pool level. Our room was lovely and had everything we needed with a garden outside our window and residential pigeon. They were happy to look after our bags until our flight after we checked out. Great hotel and looks beautiful from the outside.

title: Not worth the money! Stay away!
desc: Rooms Are nice but dirty and dusty. That wasnt changed although they tried to clean it again. Dust on the shelfs, under the bed and in all corners of the bathroom. Houskeeping took over an hour to bring us a second blanket. Staff at breakfast very very unfriendly. Can‘t wish a good morning just come up to you and say:“Coffee?“ And them throw almost the cup on your table. At Check In the staff told us that we booked room including breakfast and at Check out they wanted to charge us the breakfast. So redicolus!

title: Brilliant architect, Correct location, full of joy.
desc: Brilliant architect. Correct location. Comfy room for family. It's really a wonderful hotel I ever had in life. The staffs are the real professional. The location is right for everything you imagine for, dining, shopping and more. Don't think, choose to stay with them.

title: Hotel going above and beyond
desc: I stayed at ParkRoyal last week - my check-out was 12pm but my flight was later that evening. The front desk staff were very helpful and told me I could use the shower facilities later that day and change clothes before I went to the airport. This meant I could relax and spend some time around the city in the Singapore heat, knowing that I could freshen up before my flight. I didn't get the names of the people on the desk, but they were all very friendly and helpful.

title: Spectacular stay
desc: Incredible hotel in every aspect. Unique building and a truly dedicated staff. One of the best hotel experiences I’ve had in decades of traveling. Everyone was friendly and helpful and the location is close to the marina and great food markets.

title: Love our stay in this eco conscious hotel
desc: Great experience from the moment we arrived till when we left. Although, it is a busy hotel, we felt looked after by the staff from the concierge, reservation and dinning staff including pool attendants. Not to forget the cleaning staff. I hesitated to give a ten mainly because of the breakfast offerings which appeared a bit disappointing only because there is little variety especially in the Asian dishes. Much as I loved Nasi Lemak, it would be great to have curry chicken or rendang with it. Also, fruit salad comprising of pineapples and mangoes would be such a treat. It would also be great to be able to make fresh juices. 10 out of 10 for practising sustainabile tourism.

title: Loved staying here
desc: Great hotel in a great location in Singapore. Breakfast was excellent. Funky bar in the evening, although not well used. Our room had great views. Pool area was excellent although all sunbeds taken after breakfast. The walk around the deck area was a lovely touch. Really well thought out. Luxurious. Comfortable bed.

title: None
desc: an excellent stay thank you. The rooms were spacious and the executive lounge quiet and comfortable. I enjoyed the food and drinks on offer and all were reasonably priced. The location being next to chinatown makes for an interesting diversion and it is well worth the visit.

title: Thank you note
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to thank Mr Jaap Singh who was very kind and supporting during my stay. My special appreciation for him. He was very much helpful in guiding me throughout my stay.

title: 16th floor rocks!
desc: I was pleased with the service and delectable treats served during my 5day trip. Looked forward to breakfast, mid day tea, and dinner. All offered excellent options with daily changes in offerings. Both Jenisah, honorable server, and Sylvia, the cook, were always helpful and welcoming. Although I call them out, all the cooks and servers were wonderful.

title: Incredible Stay
desc: This was our second stay at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering. We absolutely love this hotel. We recommend it to everyone we know when they visit Singapore. Amazing service and facilities. The pool has epic views of the city skyline and Lime restaurant offers a delicious breakfast buffet. There’s also a lovely garden walk around the hotel where you can see local flora and fauna growing right from the hotel architecture. The staff were wonderful with our 1.5 year old too. Highly recommend!

title: Beautiful architecture, great location for Chinatown
desc: We enjoyed our stay here (just one night), the trees and greenery and creative architecture are fantastic. The location is good for chinatown, and we also walked easily to Raffles and Boat Quay, plus it's near the metro station too. Great breakfast too. Pool is a little cold for my liking, but nice to have it available.

title: Great business hotel but only if you upgrade!
