desc: The good: The staff were all great, the suite we upgraded to was excellent, large. The club room team, reception and concierge team were really helpful, friendly and professional. It’s located right next to Chinatown so if you want street food, that’s a plus! The bad: Standard rooms are very small. If you’re there for a week and having to work from your room - you will need to upgrade either to a club room ( and work from the club lounge) or get a larger suite room. Avoid rooms on the open air landings, or overlooking the back of the hotel. Chinatown is a long way from all of the other hotels, shops, business areas - so expect to spend a few dollars on Grab ( Local Uber alternative ) as the advertised shuttle service isn’t in operation. The ugly: All of the gym equipment was

title: Ms Nam
desc: Amy is the awesome staff in the lime restaurant. The hotel is great to stay The swimming pool is very special to enjoy with the comfort and quiet area. Food is nice. All of the staffs are very friendly.

title: We loved our stay!
desc: My husband and I stayed for 4 nights here in July. The location was perfect being close to Chinatown and we also walked to Marina Bay easily. The room we had was stunning with ceiling to floor windows over looking the city. The shower was a rainfall shower that came out of the light. Breakfast was fresh and a good variety. Our favourite area was the pool which always had a breeze and we chilled in the cabanas every day.

title: Excellent architecture and landscape design. Nice facility. Average problem solving. Poor services
desc: Chemical painting polluted in-room environment as there are maintenance area(wall painting) just right next to our room(1014). Hotel does help solve this problem by setting up air purifying within the room. However, this is not problem that should by expected for 5stars hotel and also without any apologies from any hotel staff. (Chemical does actually wake us up from late morning sleep and stay throughout the day until I address the problem). Such a nice facility with unfortunately a poorly services.

title: None
desc: The hotel has excellent facilities and the facade is environmentally friendly. The staff was also very attentive and responsive to our needs. The location is great, with many F&B outlets within the vicinity.

title: Excellent hotel, very comfortable.
desc: Many things that are excellent about this hotel - rooms (we had two) are clean with the right amount of space, the beds are very comfortable and we all had good night’s sleep, all staff were professional, friendly and courteous, the hotel architecture is amazing and in a really good location in Chinatown and near two MRT stations. We would definitely stay here again if returning to Singapore.

title: Great stay. 10/10 experience
desc: Had an amazing stay at Parkroyal. The staff were exceptional. Vanessa, Jaap and James did an amazing job at making us feel welcome. The location is perfect, there were so many food options (highly recommend checking out Clarke Quay) and shops nearby. The hotel environment provided a much needed break from such a busy city at the end of a day. I love my food and must say the buffet breakfast at the line restaurant was awesome, there were many options and the staff there were very friendly and funny. The pool and spa were also a key feature that we used a lot during our stay. Would highly recommend this hotel, we will be booking through here again.

title: Well worth a visit
desc: This is my second stay at this beautiful and well designed hotel. The rooms are stylish and eco friendly. Very comfortable bed and spotlessly clean. Breakfast was included in my booking and had a wonderful array of fresh and varied items. The pool is clean- if a little cool but very welcome on a hot sultry day. The pool closes at 8pm which I felt was a little early but we were still able to sit out regardless. Would definitely recommend this hotel and will be back.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Very pleasant stay. Great room, great mattress, great service. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Aloysius provided great help. Our room Collection Club Lifestyle King. WOW! we are very grateful and will come back again!

title: A special thank you to Selvam (Bellman)
desc: I want to write a special “thank you” to Selvam for his extremely courteous and efficient assistance during both check in and check out. He stands head and shoulders above the rest of the hotel staff, and he was the highlight of an otherwise forgettable stay at Parkroyal Collection Pickering (a botched check-in had us waiting without explanation or apology for three hours before we got our rooms).

title: Can’t Fault Perfection
desc: I have been coming to this hotel for over 5 years and continually makes any stay special - this time my first from covid I had the privilege of an upgrade and access to the lounge on 16th floor - simply fabulous place, experience, staff and rooms - no better central city hotel

title: Mr and Mr Hague
desc: The hotel interior is amazing! There are some short of manpower at the entrance to help incoming guests to their luggage but security team are very helpful! Level 16 lounge staff are very accommodating and will make you feel at home! Ms Leslie and Ms JY are amazing staff! Will deffo stay again here! Warm regards, J Hague

title: Excellent hotel and package was value for money
desc: Our package was excellent value, which included level 16 club access which included breakfast in tranquil setting with spectacular views, high tea at 3pm and cocktails at 6pm and laundry service for 2 items per day (which we did not need to use). I loved everything about this hotel including being able to rest in a Cabanas by the pool considering we were jet lagged coming from London. The service was excellent and the room room was modern chic, spacious, air con etc was good for sleeping. We were on level 14 with a great view over Chinatown. The hotel is handy for the MRT. I found this great package offer through Luxuryescapes.com and I presume the offer was so good because it was at the time when Singapore was opening up after Covid. Perhaps I will not be able to get such a

title: Luxurious stopover in SG
desc: This is our third stay at this fabulous hotel. We arrived at around 11am but were allowed an early check in. The room was lovely but it’s aspect was less than ideal, so Dave on reception very kindly found us another room. Selvam the porter helped us move. More generally, Dave was very helpful on a range of requests. Our room on the 15th floor was great: well-appointed, comfortable bed, good size shower, tea- and coffee-making facilities and (as it was a Club room) complimentary laundry service. We were also able to use the Club Lounge on the 16th floor, where we took breakfast, high tea and evening cocktails with food. Terrific views from the Lounge. Staff there were charming and helpful, especially Leslie, Jenisah and Emmanuel. There’s a pool, gym, spa and sun deck on the

title: None
desc: The quality of hotel was outstanding. Some of the staff could have been a little more friendly as this is a very big asset for the hotel. The gym gear is tired and lacking a complete range of weights etc..

title: One of a kind building and stay to match
desc: Stayed at the Park Royal Pickering on 10 day business trip - their ‘Club Lounge’ room deal was a similar price to usual company hotel. Building is remarkable from the outside, and room, pool and breakfast were excellent. Service was fantastic throughout, and may have become too used to the 16th floor ‘Club Lounge’ with it’s ‘business class’ attention to detail. To be balanced, should point out one frustration - they’ve an ad playing on 30s loop in their lifts based on a 90s rap track I’ve now heard about 50 times… and I still can’t remember the original.. (snoop?)

title: Staff impressions
desc: Can't speak more highly of the efficiency, effectiveness, courtesy, and genuine care for the guests that the staff have demonstrated thus far. In particular, Leslie from the Collections Club went the extra mile to provide advice and helpful suggestions that assisted us in resolving an issue of concern. Her genuine care and concern for us was very much appreciated and assisted emencely in a timely manner.

title: Outstanding hotel
desc: A fantastic stay from start to finish. My wife and I stayed here for two weeks, and would thoroughly recommend! The staff were friendly and helpful, room very clean and well furnished, fantastic views, and an outstanding pool.

title: Top hôtel
desc: Amazing hotel with the best location. Very good staff and friendly and the best breakfast from long time. Great experience near the Chinese village. I recommend this hotel it’s a perfect place. Hope to come back soon, just please I never understood how to put my Netflix account on your tv.

title: Great location and 5 star accommodation
desc: Beautiful hotel, eco friendly,staff and amenities first rate. Breakfast buffet plentiful,pool,gym and wellness centre of a high standard. Reception available to answer any questions and to book your taxi service when required. Visually the hotel is beautiful to look at with gardens draping the building which also gives a calming view from your room window.

title: Sweet staycation
desc: Have always been attracted by the eyecatching ' urban forest' facade of this hotel, so decided to stay a night here. The architecture is really a marvel, and the plants do 'make' the hotel! The wood terraces complement the greenery, and you feel like you're in a resort even though you're in the middle of the CBD! Had the privilege of utilising the Club Lounge where we were served by Jenisah and Edmund. Always warm and welcoming, they made it a great place to relax, fill up and chill out! Particularly impressed also by the provision of a dedicated drinking water tap in our room, doing away with the need for bottled water, and the attendant waste, that we see in other hotels. Our room overlooked Hong Lim Park, and gave us a fantastic view of the Singapore river and heritage

title: Great location, friendly and accommodating staff!
desc: Located in Chinatown, which made it very easy to get around. Close to the bay, river and public transport. Stayed on level 9 in a corner room. Massive high ceilings with floor to ceiling windows. View was fantastic. Pool area was great with the infinity pool looking out over Singapore. We spent most afternoons having drinks by the pool. Staff are accommodating and friendly.

title: Highly recommend Park Royal Pickering
desc: Our stay at Park Royal Pickering, Singapore was amazing! The hotel room was not only comfortable and cozy but the hotel staffs were also friendly and helpful. Not forgetting the location was great too! My husband dropped his wallet at the hotel lobby and thanks to the security staff, James who was on duty, he saw and picked it up. We were worried when we realised the wallet was missing because there was a lump sum of cash in it. After verifying our details, James returned the wallet to us with nothing missing in it. We truly appreciate his honesty and kind gesture. We will definitely go back again the next time we visit Singapore!

title: Fantastic Hotel - Great location
desc: Staff were amazing and helpful and the location was perfect near China town and MRT. Nothing was too much for staff to organise - like a minivan taxi as we were a group of 6. Club room floor was great - good food, service and view if Singapore.

title: Fantastic staff and location
desc: Stayed at park royal pickering with my children and have been well looked after by the staff at the collection club - caixia, jenisah, cherise and the wonderful chef yongzhi! Our travelling party reduced and we requested for some late changes in our accommodation. Aloyius (I got his name spelt wrong I think!) was so accommodating and upgraded us to a wonderful suite! We got married here 3 years ago and vowed to stay here every time we come to Singapore; the hospitality never fails to wow us. Thank you park royal Pickering 🧡

title: Good place for a few days in Singapore
desc: I chose this hotel for its convenient location close to the buzzing restaurants and shops in chinatown. Check in was smooth and the room was perfectly fine for our stay. We booked an Urban Kingsize room (?) I believe. The bed was absolutely huge and took over the entire room, which we did not mind. What I loved the most about this hotel was the view framed by the plants and trees which the hotel is known for. The pool area was calm and had a great view. We were in Singapore purely for pleasure and it served all our needs, however the business "feel" was very much present and the cool and minimalist atmosphere was not per se what we were looking for, but I assume it is still a great alternative to other hotels. I would definitely recommend it, especially if you are looking for

title: A must stay!
desc: 5/5- amazing accommodation, food and staff! Had an amazing view from our room during the day and night. Loved the bath which also had a great view and felt like I was in the middle of a tropical forest. Great location to catch the underground railway system. Highly recommended to stay for a night or two.

title: Personalised Service and Hotel with a Heart!
desc: It was a wonderful experience for my family. Felicia and Darrell at the check in counter were an absolute delight. Very personal service. My sis got champagne and cake in the room as it was her birthday month. I got a champagne in my room too! And I particularly like that the hotel provide job opportunities for older workers. Thank you!

title: None
desc: Everything was wonderful about this hotel. The staff, rooms, pool area, restaurant and ambience. The architecture was beautiful with all the greenery on and surrounding the building. The location was also fantastic as we were right in Chinatown.

title: Great visit
desc: An excellent stay and worth being a loyalty member: I was very kindly upgraded to a larger room - very well designed with lots of surfaces. The facilities and pool are chic, the housekeeping was truly excellent - probably the best I’ve had - and all the staff professional and friendly. 10/10 would stay again.

title: 5 Star top notch beautiful hotel ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
desc: Just ended a 1 night staycation at this beautiful hotel. Service was great from pre arrival until departure. The pre arrival process were handled by Mr Jon Yau and Ms Judy Wu in a swift and professional manner. Upon our arrival, our signature suite required final checks and we were seated at the Collection Club Lounge for coffee. Within 20 mins, the front desk staff personally delivered our key card to the lounge 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Food quality and variety were excellent in the club lounge. The service provided by the staff (Ding Hao and team if i rmb correctly) during afternoon tea and evening cocktail hour was warm and excellent. The chefs on site were extremely patient and proactively delivered the peking duck from the live station to our seat as well. They also described

title: Beautiful Hotel - Great Location
desc: Beautiful Hotel This hotel is an oasis of peace in the heart of Singapore. The design with all the vegetation on the outside is wonderful. The rooms are spotless with filtered drinking water an added bonus, food is great, bed comfortable, staff so helpful. Very close to MRT and Chinatown . Would definitely recommend!

title: A perfect stay
desc: My husband and I stayed for three nights, breaking a trip from Brisbane to London. We had a beautiful Club Room on the 15th floor, and enjoyed the excellent catering in the Club Lounge provided by chefs Sylvia and Yong Chee. All the staff were friendly and helpful, and nothing was too much trouble. Leslie and Win Win were particularly helpful. We also spent time relaxing round the gorgeous infinity pool, and were very well looked after by Wei Hao. An altogether perfect way to break up a long journey, as well as being an ideal base from which to explore the delights of Singapore.

title: Ruby Wedding dream trip
desc: From the moment we arrived at reception through our instruction to the club room staff, housekeeping and a team working so hard in the lime bar, everybody worked so hard to make a holiday I wonderful experience. Our particular thanks to the following people who made our Holiday a special one All the reception and concierge and Raja for helping with our taxi on last night Club room - Dong Hao (exceptional) Jenisah, Leslie, chef Michael Lime Bar - Suren was outstanding well supported by Satieeish and the third whose name I cannot recall The wonderful housekeeping staff who looked after room 1316

title: Singapore Sling in the heart of the Quays
desc: Absolutely loved our stay at this hotel. We stayed a total of 5 nights during Singapore's Independence Day. Both China Town and Clarke Quay MRT station are a stone throw away making it super easy to get around the city on the local MRT. Taxi are easily booked for you through the hotel and a flat $20 from the airport. In Room dining ( I ordered a sirloin steak) was delicious, cooked to perfection, delivered with care and was quick. Staff where always friendly. Would love some music around the pool area however do understand it is next to the SPA so may not be possible. The pool is cold in the afternoon so be sure to jump in before 2pm hits when the pool is shaded. Will absolutely be back. Thank you for a pleasant stay. =)

title: A stay to remember!
desc: A hotel that’s situated in an amazing location! You are surrounded by greenery & takes you away from the ‘city feel’ the staff where SO helpful & friendly. They couldn’t help enough when my fiancé had left her GHD Straighteners in the hotel, they done everything to get them in a safe place & sorted as we where luckily coming back after travelling Bali. The Buffet style breakfast was so good & your spoilt for choice. The Pool area takes the top spot amazing views & open late too, couldn’t recommend this hotel enough! Rooms so clean & really spacious with smart TV’s. Located right next to china-town, lovely restaurants & bars & you need to make sure you visit the local hawker centres you can eat for £5-£10 & it’s local flavoursome food (some even Michelin star) & 15-20 mins walk

title: A Wonderful Birthday Retreat
desc: We got an unexpected upgrade and the room was wonderfully spacious. The views were beautiful and the bath was particularly comfortable. The provided bath salts were really nice, they made the soak extra relaxing! Also, a surprise birthday cake was sent up to our room because it was my birthday. It really made my day (the cake was great, by the way). Definitely recommended!

title: Beautiful hotel in great location
desc: Our Signature King Room was in a corner on the 7th floor with beautiful city views out towards the Singapore Flyer. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom and shower much more spacious than usual, with plenty of room for 2 sets of toiletries and a separate toilet ( which is rare). The room was larger than many on offer from other hotels. The location was very convenient near Chinatown and many authentic food hall choices such as People's Park for a quick lunch ( although cash was required!). Breakfast was included in our package and was excellent, with any special coffee also included. To access the bar area from the foyer, we had to walk through the busy dining area which was unusual and took some finding but was a pleasant space and the prices very reasonable compared

title: Lovely Stay in a Great Location
desc: Just wanted to start off by saying it’s a lovely hotel, with great views and escape to local shops/malls. Not a long drive from the Changi Aiport, Marina Bay or Gardens By The Bay. Shout out to Jetrix who really helped us when checking in and throughout our stay. The whole team were always around and helpful when anything was needed, from taxis to room service. The rooms were in great condition and clean. The infinity pool boasts some great views. When we return to Singapore, we’ll be back here!

title: Fab stay at the ParkRoyal, location brilliant
desc: Brilliant location next to China town, close to lots of bars and restaurants (Clark quay a 5 min walk). pool area shaded and pool long enough for lengths which was good for us. Room was a good size and the hotel had a lot of personality with a lot of plants and trees everywhere you look

title: Great location
desc: Our overall experience at the ParkRoyal Pickering was amazing. From the moment we checked in for our three nights the service in the restaurant, breakfast room and check out was first class. Beautiful pool Easy walk to MRT and Chinatown and Singapore river.

title: Discriminatory staff
desc: Had a night booked here wanting to host a wedding event but the staff declined my request citing "restrictions". They had no reason to refuse me service. Instead, my dollars went to Marina Bay Sands, Shangri-La, and W Sentosa Cove. Honestly why would anybody stay at a hotel that would allow its staff to treat you like a second-class citizen?

title: Amazing stay
desc: Iconic hotel, simply perfect in everything: location, rooms, staff, details, etc. We chose the Parkroyal Pickering for our first stay in Singapore, in early August, and confirmed our preference with a second stay at the end of the same month, as the closing of a beautiful trip. Availability and kindness distinguish the entire staff, while attention to detail and unique design distinguish the building ... a perfect combination for an unforgettable holiday!

title: Great Stay, Great Location!
desc: We stayed for 6 nights in a Collection Club room in August 2022 via a Luxury Escape booking. This was a great hotel for our trip. The room was well equipped, the bed was comfortable and the extras provided (lounge access, breakfast, afternoon tea) were well received. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. The large gym was well equipped with new Technogym equipment. Hotel location was in Chinatown with access to 2 MRT stations and close proximity to a lot of good food places. Even though it rained a couple of days, it was mostly a covered walk to the train stations. We enjoyed our stay at this hotel and would consider it again on our next visit to Singapore.

title: A good stay as always!
desc: Its been a while since I returned to this property. I decided and spent a relaxing weekend. Hotel was busy but I was greeting with professional and friendly staff Felicia who checked me in professionally. My staff was made more enjoyable when we visited the Executive Lounge on the 16/F and was greeting by the friendly staff Leslie and team. A very good spread of afternoon tea and snacks and we later returned and enjoyed the evening cocktails till 8pm. The chef signature noodles was a must have and their own concocted mocktails! Surprisingly, the lounge was fully run by ladies! The breakfast was sumptuous as usual and the blue pea nasi lemak is a must try! Check out was very smooth with Nasha at the Reception and we will definitely return again very soon!

title: Amazing building in great location
desc: Everything with our stay was perfect, from the staff to the facilities. The breakfast had plenty of choice and great quality. The building itself is iconic, with so much green around that we feel like not being in a city at all. The staff was super helpful, even when we were already on our way to airport and notice a ring missing, they went ahead looking for it and sent it to our next destination. Definitely recommend it.

title: Star of Singapore.
desc: Wonderful staff, great location. We stayed for 3 nights to break our trip from London to Australia. Unfortunately jet lagged ruined what should have been a terrific stay! Good food in both the Lime restaurant and the 16th floor Club lounge. Will definately stay again.

title: Excellent experience in Singapore
desc: Really nice stay in Parkroyal Collection Pickering Hotel. The room at the 10th floor was terrific and amazing. The breakfast was really good. It was really nice to have the possibility to have a shower just before our flight.

title: Splendid Stay
desc: In terms of helpful, thoughtful, fantastic staff, design, welcoming it is hard to imagine a better stay in town. Quiet service, delicious meals, tea or drinks on 16th floor wrap it up! Laundry service, concierge service: Everything indeed perfect. Remarkable architecture and interior. Highly recommended!

title: All perfect
desc: Stayed for 4 nights, cozy rooms, very comfortable mattresses and pillows, excellent room ergonomics, many thoughtful details, a very clean, unusual hotel design, an excellent restaurant, and a swimming pool. Great breakfasts, lunch, and dinner! Great location

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: We recently had a 4 night stay for a girls trip away. I could not fault this hotel. The room was clean and well appointed. The bed and extra large pillows were super comfy. The service from all staff from the concierge and front of house to the crew in the collection club to the pool guys was as I referred to above , faultless. The infinity pool, cabanas and surrounds provide a wonderfully relaxing vibe with great views over the city. The hotel is conveniently located close to both Clarke Quay and Chinatown MRT. Overall this is a beautiful hotel in a great location but the staff are what makes this place great. I would not hesitate to stay here when visiting Singapore again.

title: Excellent Place
desc: 1. 極佳的綠色環境、功能設計完善的房間、周到的整體服務 We were enjoyed in this excellent place with green environment, perfectly designed room and very considerate services. 2. 位置也頗佳，附近有地鐵車站、唐城、商場以及新加坡河邊的餐飲觀光區 Very nice location near MRT station and accessible to several shopping malls, China Town, Raffles City and Clarke Quay Central. 3. 唯一挑惕之處是一樓餐廳的服務 The only one that could be improved is the service in the restaurant LIME where the staff seems busy on other in-relevant matters. 4. 極力推薦的好地方Highly recommended.

title: Lime restaurant
desc: Genevieve at the lime restaurant was an extraordinary server. She was attentive and gave really fast service despite her age! I came for my birthday and she really made my experience a fantastic one! Thank you Genevieve and the entire LIME restaurant wait staff for the amazing meal.

title: Amazing
desc: The hotel staff couldn’t do more for us, especially Jaap who went above and beyond for us, we cannot thank him enough. All the staff were very attentive and made the trip even more enjoyable. The breakfast was also amazing and had a great range of choice. Would 100% recommend this hotel for your stay in Singapore.

title: If you like plants over service
desc: Good for plants, and ikea finishing. Don’t expect any level of service. And the food in the main restaurant is average at 5 star prices… Kept knocking on the door when trying to settle the kids, then called the in-room phone twice…. Good for insta, not for client care.

title: Excellent and memorable dining experience at the Lime restaurant
desc: Visited the Lime Restaurant on 17 Aug 2022 evening for the Lobsterfest buffet . The lobster food selections were incredible and very well executed despite the large crowds of dining patrons. Special appreciation and thanks to Assistant F&B Manager - Nigel and his staff - Satieeish for making it an extra wonderful day experience . We felt so much at home and well taken care of. Thanks for everything again and will definitely recommend our friends to come back to the Lime restaurant again !

title: Good service
desc: It was my first visit to Park Hotel Clarky and I was very satisfied with the amazing service besides the good room and good view. In particular, I remember traveling very comfortably from check-in to check-out, thanks to JETRIX manager's response I'd like to thank our manager and look forward to our next visit

title: Amazing Hotel!
desc: What an amazing hotel! The location, the staff, the ambience - everything is just excellent. Short walk to MRT and large shopping centre. Staff are always friendly and willing to help. Will definitely be staying here again if we go to Singapore

title: Parkroyal perfection!
desc: The Parkroyal on Pickering has it all! Great hotel, location & the staff really are wonderful! Also ecologically thoughtful and rooms are lovely! Would rate it as one of my top 3 in the world!! Phil Smith the general manager took the time to introduce himself and Shirley Wang went out of her way to support and book a future visit! Donna and everyone in the club were amazing!!

title: An amazing stay
desc: It was a great stay overall. Got a complimentary snack pack with fruits and macaroons considering it was a proposal stay. One downside is that the room didn't have a chromecast feature which would be great to have so that guest could watch their desired shows with any device they have. Other than that it was a very pleasant stay.

title: Staff goes above and beyond
desc: My stay at the Park Royal has been great. I was coming to visit my son who was about to undergo surgery and was very anxious. Jetrix from the front desk was very helpful in getting my room ready quickly so I could rush to the hospital. Post surgery, he made sure to check in with me to ask about how I was doing and if I needed any assistance for my son. He helped us get a wheelchair and made sure our room was comfortable enough for his recovery. Park Royal has great accommodations, but what made the stay memorable was the support we got from the staff. Thanks Jetrix for helping us during this difficult time.

title: One of the most iconic hotels in Singapore!
desc: We stayed in this hotel for the last two nights of our holiday. It was exceptional!!! An amazing architectural oasis in the heart of Singapore. Everything in this hotel was brilliant. The staff, the room, the amenities…THE POOL! By all means we will be returning. Thank you for making our holiday special!

title: Stop over on our way to our honeymoon in Bali
desc: We chose this hotel because of the swimming pool, location and the green layers to the outside of the building which I visually liked. The only time we ate at the hotel was for breakfast as we wanted to experience Singapore by eating at Lau Pa Sat and Satay on the Bay (Lau Pa Sat was only a few minute away) The breakfast choice was huge and catered for all tastes and nationalities. The only aspects they could improve on was the speed of the check in and providing guest with information on how to travel around the city using the Tourist Pass, local places of interest and a map.

title: 8 years later and still great
desc: Love this hotel, great staff and and the greenness of it. An oasis in the city. Central to everything and pool area is exceptional. We were only in Singapore for 24 hrs this time 8 years ago we spent a week in this hotel and it has dated very well. Doesn’t look old and tired. We arrived late and bar was still open friendly staff and great club sandwich. Room was small but adequate. Great use of space. Breakfast had a huge selection and very good. Porters were happy to do anything for you. We had a late check out the following day but had a 9pm flight and so were able to still use the pool gym and spa facilities and enjoy a good shower before getting our flight back to sydney. Totally recommend for a short or long stay.

title: Great experience
desc: We stayed almost 14 days in this great place. It is a great starting point to explore Singapore, located near Chinatown. Great design and relaxing style. For breakfast, we could choose between the big Lime restaurant located on the ground floor and the Collection Club in the 16th floor, with a restricted but still very nice selection of options, also including some live cooking. Special thanks to Chef Michael for creating bis special version of poached eggs for me - sooo delicious! Besides that the Collection Club options for afternoon tea and drinks and a very nice small buffet in the evening are just great options for the guests. Especially the staff in the 16th floor is nice and gives the guests a good experience.

title: Awesome Hotel at Pickering Street, Singapore
desc: PARKROYAL Collection Pickering is one of the best hotels in Singapore. This hotel location is very strategic (near bus stations, MRT Chinatown station and People’s market) All staffs also very pleasent and helpful. I encourage all readers to visit and stay at least 2 Nights! Thank you!

title: Good service and food at the Lime restaurant
desc: We were at the hotel to view the function room for an upcoming event and decided to stay for dinner at the Lime restaurant. We were well served by service staff at the restaurant with a special mention of Alice who was very attentive and hospitable, making us feel very welcome. Satieeish was friendly and patiently explained to us the benefits of being a Pan Pacific loyalty member. The restaurant serves delicious food with good portion at reasonable price. We shall certainly visit again.

title: Allocates room not suitable for couples
desc: We were allocated a room with a glass door / wall for the toilet. Not good for a couple of their anniversary for personal privacy. We changed rooms to a room with a door on the toilet - which was a lot cheaper but they would not refund the difference. Then our final invoice was $350 more than quoted - no one has replied to my email questioning why. Hotel looks pretty - and suited to a business trip. Avoid if you’re a couple

title: None
desc: Food quality very average. Seafood tasteless of bad taste(oysters) Rooms offering poor amenities (no bottle of mineral water, just a tap filtered water, no drinks, no snacks...) Other the location and architecture which are great, a very average hotel in SG, with no atmosphere. Can find much better in SG for same of lower price.

title: Excellent choice
desc: We stayed at Park Royal collection pickering for my son’s 10th birthday last September 15-19. The experience was superb, location is awesome and the ambiance was amazing. If you are looking to relax after touring SG this is the place to be. Customer service is FANTASTIC! 10/10 everyone is excellent! Shout out to Jetrix, he is a gem! He made us feel like we are home and made sure everything is perfect during our stay! Definitely we will come back and will share this wonderful experience with friends and family.

title: For me the best Hotel in Singapore
desc: Here you got it all: Stunning architecture in and outside - unmatched in Singapore! Great rooms with best view on all floors, great location. And all this with a very welcoming and warm team to take care about all your needs!! If possible, book a room with lounge access - views, f+b and service are top! Best possibility to impress your guests also.

title: Quality green space in Singapore
desc: Thoughtful use of abundant green space. Nice affinity pool with a view of the city. Good buffet breakfast. Staff nice and efficient. Rooms could use a bit of tlc and updating. Smoking area is out on the sidewalk ext to a trash can. Concierge could be helpful in restaurant selection. Overall a good choice for the money. Near Chinatown and other wonderful parts of the city.

title: Wonderful stay exceptional hotel
desc: We enjoyed our stay in this innovative hotel. Stunning architecture and exceptional reception staff and concierge. Always so helpful and solved major issues with our Airport transfer pre booked company. Avoid Hanz Trans company at all costs. Thank you to staff at an exceptional hotel

title: The greenery outside every window is stunning
desc: As always a lovely hotel, particularly the greenery outside every window. The food in the marketplace restaurant was magnificent. The bed was very comfortable and the room layout well done. All expensive, but I guess you get what you pay for.

title: Good location, good staff, nice room
desc: With the metro station of Chinatown less than 5 minutes away, one can reach all city areas easily. Lots of good affordable food options nearby. Hotel is clean, staff is overall helpful and available. Housekeeping very good but speaks almost no english.. Breakfast (at club lounge) is ok, nothing exceptional but staff is very nice. Room (1016) was all we needed for a short stay of 4 days but lacked of space for clothes (a lot!). Pool is beautiful but shows fatigue as well as the furniture there. Water is cold as hotel is ecological friendly and does not heat it, pity... Not all perfect but quite good.

title: None
desc: The hotel was a truly beautiful place to stay. Very clean and a lovely space with lots of greenery. The staff were all wonderful - particularly in the Club Lounge. The pool was fantastic, though quite cold - but the view more than made up for this. We would not hesitate to stay here again, nor to recommend to others. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: Stay
desc: Everything is really fantastic with wonderful personnel. Extremely flexible by all means. Clean and environmental friendly. Location could not be better between China town and the business district. Recommend highly

title: I was not impressed
desc: This is a so-called instragram-hotel. Everything looks nice, but underneath there is a lot of problems and things to be approved. First I would say that the service felt rushed and lacked friendliness thruout the hotel. Even at club lounge you had to ask things several times before delivered. Pool are full of dirty towels all day. The room had plenty of issues, stained carpets, no shampoo, leaking pipes. Everything that looks wood, it’s actually plastic (everywhere in the hotel). Also the electric curtains made a lot of sound, so you would wake up every morning if your neighbours would move the curtains. Pool are very small for this size of s hotel. For the price paid, you can find a lot better options in Singapore. If you want to take nice photos for Instragram and listen

title: Good hotel. Would recommend for business or pleasure.
desc: Terrific hotel all round. Super location on the edge of Chinatown, convenient for major attractions and transport links. Excellent breakfast. Room well equipped and a good size for an Asian capital. Friendly, helpful staff. Pool looks good, although didn't have time to get in it.

title: Beautiful hotel in a prime location!
desc: Had a great honeymoon trip to Singapore from the US. We stayed at Parkroyral in Pickering and it was a perfect location to walk to many of the local sights and hawker markets - walking distance from Chinatown (and Food Center), Maxwell Food Center, Clark Quay, Boat Quay, etc. Beautiful property with very well cared for amenities. The lobby is a nice sneak peek into what the rooms are like - also very well maintained and clean, manicured. We liked how they tried their best to be eco friendly w/ a filtered water tap in each room as well sheets changed on request. We had drinks at the Mint bar which were tasty (although a bit watered down). Jetrix was our front desk staff member who checked us in - he was excellent, professional, detail oriented, and even offered a warm "happy

title: Beautiful hotel, perfect location
desc: The moment you enter the hotel, you will feel as if you are on an island getaway. The staff were so friendly and helpful, and we love the greenery peeking out from everywhere. The hotel is also located at one of the most convenient areas in Singapore. The rooms are a tad smaller than some of the other hotels we've stated at previously, but overly it was a comfortable experience. If it's convenience and comfort you are looking for, I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent Stay & Outstanding Hotel
desc: Parkroyal Pickering always exceeding our expectation. This is our third times staying in this hotel and the staff is consistently delivering their best in class hospitality as compared to other 5 stars hotels and other pan pacific hotels in Singapore. Special thanks to Ms. Judy Wu, Ms. Felicia and room manager who did extra miles which make our stay very memorable. The room was extremely clean and well maintained. The team is very thoughtful and consumer centric by providing more than what we requested. knowing we came with baby, they provided the nice crib, small tube and amenities for the small one - without asked. Overall we are really glad that my daughter who has skin allergy can enjoy and fully rest during the stay. Thank you very much for the Parkroyal Pickering Team.

title: Hotel Staycation & Marriage Event
desc: Great and smooth wedding event hosted in this facility. Shout to excellent coordinators Jarlyn and Vasu for all the smooth and detailed planning. Ensuring that my partner and I can have a stress-free event, from the planning to the actual event happening!! Kudos. Food is remarkable. The suite is very classy and modern, tip-top condition. Everyone is very friendly and cheery. Highly recommend for anyone who wants to host an event

title: Highly recommend!
desc: I visited this hotel with my mom and because of our schedule, I arrived before noon which is too early. Thankfully, Jetrix helped us to find a room and we were able to take a rest a bit before starting the travel. I used to live in SG and also travel several times to this country, and Jetrix was one of the memorable staff that I met here who is helpful and very kind. The room we stayed wasn't able to open the window, and no bathtub, so it seems to be better for the business trip than traveling with family. However, love the garden walk at 5th floor and the view from the swimming pool. And you know, this building itself is very unique with the plants. So worth visit!

title: Beyond Expectations - Lime @ Park royal Pickering
desc: It was my wife birthday, we received a warm and surprise by Chef Alfirin. A place not just for it food but also the people tat make a diff experience. Nice food everywhere, nice people only in good place Will come next year again.

title: Green 5 Star Hotel located in the heart of Singapore 🇸🇬
desc: We had an amazing time at the ParkRoyal on Pickering. Can’t wait to return in the near future. The staff were welcoming and helpful, making our stay relaxing 😌 The pool area is amazing also and working out on the gym is easy with that view.

title: Look for jetrix! Best service ever.
desc: Went to Singapore For leisure. So we decided to Checked in at your hotel. Served by a receptionist named mr. Jetrix and all I can say he is superb! I felt like we’re VIPs! From answering our queries and recommendations! Kudos from ParkRoyal Pickering. Please take good care of jetrix. He’s a gem. And About the exterior and interior of your hotel, it was really 10/10 an eco friendly hotel which I really admired! Anyway it was perfect 10 for me. Thank you once again jetrix. And thank you ParkRoyal Pickering. Super amazing stay!

title: Park Royal on Pickering
desc: Excellent hotel highly recommended. Can’t wait to visit again. Welcoming and friendly staff. Love the greenery. Great central location. Great pool/gym facilities and spa. Restaurant food amazing quality. Something for everyone’s taste

title: Superb
desc: I would like to acknowledge Mr. Jetrix for assisting us for all the help we need. He accommodate us until our last day. He also give us complementary snacks, sweet and fruits very day. He full filled our expectations. I rate him 101% on our stay at Parkroyal Collection by Pickering. 🙌🏻 Also the location is good and easy to communicate to any part of Singapore by MRT taxi or bus, nice and comfortable room, excellent breakfast with a good selection of nice food and generous happy hour, nice staff and good service. 🙌🏻

title: Parkroyal collection hotel
desc: Parkroyal collection hotel great location close to everything shopping, restaurants etc.. Food exceptional & Gym facilities meet our needs. Great views from the rooms. Highly recommended will be back next year.

title: 25th Wedding Anniversary Stay
desc: Beautiful hotel with excellent facilities and the most helpful and friendly staff. Every request responded to with the utmost enthusiasm and dedication. A bench mark for other to follow or try to achieve.

title: amazing experience!!
desc: It was amazing experience staying at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering with my friend. We are amazed for unExpected warm welcome from the receptionist Jetrix. Thank you so much Jetrix! If you guys looking for the best service, Kindly look for Jeztrix! He is very happy to serve you what’s its best! Expect us to stay here again for our next Singapore Trip. Best Regards Shirley Torrefiel

title: cool hotel with great location
desc: hotel staff and service were amazing! the total aesthetics of this hotel was also very interesting and on par with the "green" concept. perfect location as it was across from a MRT station and within walking distance to chinatown and Clarke Quay. I had requested a room with a view which I had of the Singapore flyer. overall, amazing stay!

title: Wonderful Staycation at Parkroyal Pickering
desc: Parkroyal Pickering has always been one of the nicest place to stay in. Rooms are modern and comfy, food are well prepared and most importantly hotel staffs are really nice too. Would like to give a shoutout to the front office Manager Darrel and Vanessa for always being very polite, courteous and helpful and providing excellence hospitality service to the guests. That is also why this hotel is one of my preferred choice to stay in. The ambience in the Club Lounge is simply great with great panaromic views. Highly recommend this hotel for your future reservation if you haven been here before.

title: A wonderful place to stay
desc: We returned to Singapore after a brief stopover a couple of years ago to spend some time exploring. Staff very friendly and accommodating, especially Leslie in the 16th floor Club Lounge. Accommodation comfortable - need more hanging space for wet things like towels, bathing suits, etc. Plenty of choice for dining and lots of lovely cocktails. Would definitely recommend and would love to stay here again.

title: I will miss staying there!
desc: I just loved everything. Best experience in my life! Oh! The breakfast!!! Sooooo good! Then the staff gave me an excellent treatment and they were very helpful. Even on Sunday evening the concierge did all he could to help me finding a car to rent. I’m very grateful to him.

title: More than just beautiful
desc: The extraordinary design of this hotel is only the beginning. It is as functional as it is beautiful. From the sliding doors, to the disappearing window shades (day and night), to the electrical sockets that take a variety of international plug types, to the pull-out drawer with the hairdryer (and a socket for the plug), everything has been thought through. Add to that excellent service and a wide variety of beautiful, delicious food, along with super-comfortable beds with quality linen, all in a convenient location (Chinatown MRT just around the corner). What more could you ask for?

title: Great staycation with Amazing hotel staff
desc: We were having a staycation of 2 nights in the Signature Suite. During Check-in, we had Natasha, who did a very comprehensive check-in and explained all details very carefully. Our stay included benefits of the Club Lounge, which have very welcoming Staff who remember your names and the needs you have. All in all, every staff deserves a shoutout for their amazing hospitality. Other front office staff who deserve a shoutout are the Guest Services Manager Ivena and Shane.

title: Outstanding hotel
desc: We had an amazing time. The hotel is in a great location, and is a nice new unique building with lots of greenery. It has well designed rooms with everything you need, and helpful staff who go above and beyond! We will be back next time we are in Singapore.

title: 5 night stay review - One of the best hotel in SG! 🙌
desc: Location is excellent with two mrts within reach (chinatown and clark quay - 3 min walk) and cbd is walking distance as well. Room is extremley clean and cozy feels like home. Has excellent AC and Hot shower. Room has a nice clear view of the city (13th floor) Kudos to the hotel manager(s) all staffs are kind and well trained. Their customer service is truly outstanding. Special shout out to one of their standup staff Jetrix who was super friendly and went beyond to assist us when I lost my access card. If you are filipino and booking here, look for him! Only wish their toilets have built-in bidets. Other than that its a 5 star experience ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. 10/10 Highly recommended and would go back again!

title: Average to good. 3.5 points from us.
desc: This hotel is advertised as 5* however it does not meet 5* service standards. The hotel feels like a business hotel which makes sense as it lies within the financial district. The decor and reference to nature and environmental issues is wonderful. We arrived and had no help with our luggage from the awaiting member of staff. We are happy and able to move our own belongings but it was not the 5* service. Checking in was no problem. The room is good and we had a lifestyle Premier room. The pool and gym facilities are good. The bar man in Limes bar was hugely influential for us and gave us some great recommendations. Breakfast is varied and overall good. However the fruit juice does not taste fresh and we suspect is from a carton. The egg station offers a good variety

title: Nice design but low quality service
desc: When I tried to check in at 1330, our room was not ready.It’s okay. But I came back and tried to check in at 1400, our room hadn’t been ready. The receptionist gave us a free drink tickets for the inconvenience. We went to the bar to use the free tickets, but there was no bartender, and other hole staff didn’t come to hear our order. So totally service are low quality. 総じて、サービスの質が悪いです。待たされて入った部屋のソファには目立つところに髪が数本落ちており、それも残念でした。

title: Green life in a city made my holiday exceptional
desc: Very good location; excellent greening concept; friendly staff everywhere; spacious and charming room with garden view; thick doors did not allow any noise coming from outside. Very quiet! Breakfast offered variety of food for everyone

title: Recommend
desc: Came here to eat alone in Lime. Had a really wonderful dining experience. Food was exceptional. Ordered the Cesar Salad, and Chicken Satay. Thank you to Li Xuan, Derick and Ryan for making me feel very welcome. Wonderful evening

title: Another awesome stay!
desc: Another excellent stay at Parkroyal Pickering. They really deserves their Green Hotel title. It is always my pleasure to revisit them for staycations. I also recommend them to my families and friends when they are visiting Singapore. Great location, great rooms and so much food around the hotel. Thanks again to Jon & Judy for their hard work and effort made to have such a great team. Thanks to Shane who checked me in. Also, the hardworking housekeeping Mr Shen Jian for keeping my rooms clean and tidy. I am looking forward to my next stay in December.

title: Park Royal Collection, Pickering
desc: Love the greenery of the hotel. Very good location, just next to Chinatown MRT station. Easy to find food as the Chinatown Point shopping centre I just next door. Pricey but excellent service. I appreciate that after checking out we can still refresh ourselves at the hotel before our late flight.

title: Convenient
desc: A hotel of convenience. You are literally steps away from 2 MRT Stations, China Town and tons of food! Good choices of food during Breakfast at Lime. Gym was 24 hours which is plus for me and I love how filtered water was provided rather than bottles of mineral water.

title: Excellent service
desc: I spent a week at parkroyal pickering and it was fantastic. From the personal laundry service to the excellent food at breakfast, tea and dinner. Jenisah, Chet and Michael were the hosts for breakfast and they were pleasant and attentive which led to a wonderful week of breakfast. Ana and Leslie were just as wonderful for my tea and dinner experience. This hotel is centrally located and I will be back on my next visit.

title: A fantastic stay
desc: One of the highlights of our stay was definitely the service. Rhenelee and Diane were simultaneously diligent and personable serving us with great care over breakfast. Mr Wong at the concierge showed us to the right direction and gave suggestions on where we could eat. He and Jetrix were the first friendly faces we encountered in Park Royal--a fantastic first impression. We'll definitely recommend this hotel to all our friends and we're keen to come back here for more.

title: Lime Bar
desc: I'm love love love!!!! this lime bar, very cosy and the waiters are very friendly especially Jame, always return visit for his margarita cocktail. It's good to come in to have a glass of their cocktail and relax, you will enjoy for sure. Cheers!!!

title: Generally Good but pricey
desc: Services is good and comfy level of hotel were generally better other relevant hotel chain. Nevertheless, for the price paid for the overall experience seems a little pricey. Can consider having offer for repeated customer and member for regular stay customer

title: A walk in the garden
desc: Great tour in the garden in fifth floor. Guided of a great memmber of the staff named Tetrix. He told me a litt bit of the garden and let have a card for the elevator so I could go the garden. Worth seeing and arcetecture is as well. The green concrite building.

title: Comfortable, beautiful hotel
desc: I was very impressed by the suites we were staying in and service for my business offsite event at the boardroom. It was a really comfortable and enjoyable stay for my team members. Special shoutout to Lin Hussein, Jarlyn and Gina Low for making it an enjoyable stay for my group.

title: Beauty and location
desc: Perfect location close to two underground stations, easy 10 minute walk to river restaurants and right on Chinatown. Wonderful venue with a great pool, food and friendly staff. Loved it here. Will stay again.

title: Happy holidays at the Park Royal on Pickering Hotel.
desc: I was happy honeymoon because of the healing hotel atmosphere and friendly staff. The hotel had good access to tourism, and the hotel's check-out luggage storage service was satisfactory. Thanks for your service.

title: Beautiful place to stay!
desc: Excellent and very different experience. Hotel has a park on the fifth floor! Room is space and nice, food excellent, location is very central just a few steps from the Chinatown. Hotel staff is friendly and very attentive.

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Just spent 2 nights at this beautiful hotel. Greenery surrounds the rooms which are fresh, clean, comfortable and peaceful. A bed you don’t want to get out of it’s so comfortable and a great rain shower. Fantastic check in experience, with friendly service and then a warm greeting by the guest relations manager Judy Wu recognising gha discovery loyalty and explaining the hotel facilities to us. The pool area is again surrounded by greenery, with pods you can chill in and a view from the pool. The lounge experience was one of the best I’ve experienced, efficient staff and a relaxing environment. Chefs in the lounge to provide freshly cooked food, Sylvia on the first night was lovely to chat to. Unfortunately didn’t make a note of the names of the other staff there but

title: Great hotel
desc: It wa an extremely pleasant sty. Room decor was very modern, very clean. Service was exceptional. Breakfast and club lounge were very nice, although food choices seems limited at the club lounge, and generally breakfast food choices were repetitive. The pool was nice, but I found the water a bit too cold in the evening.

title: Very comfortable and relaxing stay in Singapore.
desc: We loved our stay at this hotel. It is located in a very convenient location, in chinatown with so many food options close by. Also multiple MRT stops nearby. Loved being in the pool and seeing the garden foliage above. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. Would love to stay here again.

title: An exceptional and beautifully foliaged hotel in a very good location. Staff and facilities make this a special place.
desc: Beautifully appointed hotel with lush gardens and hanging foliage. We stayed in a lifestyle junior suite with access to the Collection Lounge. The room was extremely comfortable and very well maintained with a range of extras as part of our Luxury Escapes package. The staff in the Collection Lounge were exceptional and provided a welcoming and friendly environment and service. Thank you particularly to Leslie for her attentive and highly personable approach, an excellent representative for the hotel. Ana also for very friendly attention and a lovely smile. Chef Yong chee for the quality and variety of the great choice of food items. Particular appreciation also to Michelle for assisting us with sorting our check out. Thank you all so much!

title: Fantastic luxury hotel, in good location.
desc: Had a really lovely stay here in this beautiful hotel, with its tumbling greenery over the outside. It’s close to the MCT at Chinatown and also a short walk to the nightlife and restaurants at Boat Quay. Staff all very helpful and polite. Fabulous breakfast buffet with lots of gluten-free options for my coeliac wife. Room was relatively small but very modern, stylish and comfortable. Good shower and useful filtered water tap for drinking water. I imagine the pool deck could get very crowded when the hotel was busy (loungers were hard to come by and it was pretty quiet). The pool water was also f-f—freezing cold: perhaps it had just been changed? Btw, the changing rooms at the pool/spa have very good steam rooms that you can use for free.

title: GArden concept, excellent
desc: great hotel hotel, good breakfast spread. the staff were veryful Special mention to Syahir for execellent recommendations and taking extra care that we had a good time. always happy and smiling staff . the only negative is the the house keeping was very poor. on day one came to clean the room at 945 in the morning and from then was all over the place. also missing 1-2 days. had to be reminded of it. Also room service was poor and took more than 30-45 mintutes (tea bags and ordered room service on arrival day). rest the stay and the serive was excellent. the pool area was great . excellent property and garden hotel is a great concept. keep it up. highly recommended.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: We stayed here with our son and daughter-in-law for a couple of nights before going on to New Zealand. On arrival we were given a free upgrade to rooms on the tenth floor. Our rooms were bright and airy and we loved the greenery everywhere. Outside the rooms was a pool with fountains and the whole thing was just so relaxing. Our travel agent had recommended the hotel, saying that we would need a good one after a lengthy flight form London. All the staff we met were friendly and helpful. We had breakfast in the restaurant each day and were impressed with the wide selection available. We also enjoyed some good wine in the bar. We spent a few hours at the pool one afternoon and thoroughly enjoyed it. No, it isn't very big but it wasn't crowded when we went. The pool area was very

title: Mr
desc: By far the best hotel I’ve stayed at in Singapore. Top class service. Very friendly. Excellent room and fitness facilities. Perfect for a work trip. Great food options and location. Will only use the Parkroyal hotel for here on. Great value for money, and even better product.

title: Pleasant Surprise!
desc: I came here to celebrate my birthday and wedding anniversary with my Husband. Our first visit to the hotel and definitely will not be the last one. Everything and every staff is perfect from the start of the check-in to check-out. They had arranged a birthday cake for me in my room. The bed and pillows are comfortable. The spread of the breakfast buffet was really fantastic. I don't remember I can finish a piece of pastry during breakfast in other hotels, yes because usually the pastry is so so, but I can definitely finish more than one pastry here. Their pastries are simply so tasty! A walk in the garden, a swim in the pool ans a massage in the spa, we did them all! Next time we will back again. :)

title: Beautiful place to stay
desc: Excellent place and location. Very friendly staff. Close to different attractions, for example, Chinatown. Very good breakfast, a lot of variety. Large and clean room . Beautiful park on the fifth floor. Very professional massage master.

title: Autumn jaunt
desc: Meant to go to HK on way to Cambodia but given covid uncertainty agent suggested Singapore and this hotel. Good advice. Enjoyed Singapore and really liked this hotel. Very green. Great location. We had room on 10th floor. Superbly fitted out-quality woodwork! Great breakfasts with choice of European hot or cold or Chinese orientated food. My wife very happy to get congee. On edge of China town but not too far from Canning Park, gardens at waterfront or eating and drinking venues on river. Really enjoyed it.

title: An amazing hotel experience in the heart of Singapore.
desc: Thanks to all of you that made our 7 day break unforgettable. The staff at the hotel were so attentive and friendly, the room was perfect and nothing was too much bother. Breakfasts were great, lots of excellent food offerings. Head to Lime bar in the evenings and you will love the staff which were again amazing. The hotel itself is exceptionally clean and modern. The infinity pool was great and right in the middle of the gardens. I can't recommend this hotel enough. I looked at other higher end pricing resorts but I am so glad I picked Park Royal. It was excellent and really closely located on the edge of Chinatown.

title: Excellent hotel a great location - wouldn't stay anywhere else when visiting Singapore
desc: Great customer service from check-in to check-out. Our room was large and well appointed, the bed was extremely comfortable. Breakfast was excellent, as were all the wait staff and chefs. Loved the pool and gym Location was perfect.

title: An oasis of calm on Pickering...
desc: A spectacular architectural harmony between the glorious hotel within and its entire exterior of green living walls.. Met by Sateesh after checking in and he laid on a glorious afternoon tea. The attention to detail and service he showed us was the beginning of a marvelous overnight stay at The Park Royal. The main frontage Hotel room with superb with bed linen and mattress nirvana. Ultra comfy. You know what I mean... Room gave us panoramic views over the city. The terraced landscapes and the 5th floor relax and chill just leaves you energised and wholly rested. The breakfast was an emporium of choice for all travellers from around the world. A stunning reception and dining room room that is both an architectural gem and space to eat incredible food and once again after a

title: Service that goes that one step better.
desc: Great location backed up by excellent service throughout the hotel. All aspects of our visit surpassed all of our expectations. From check in to check out we were made to feel very welcome by the personable service provided throughout the hotel. Easy access to the metro and buses, a great location as a base for a Singapore adventure.

title: Best sofa bed in all hotels
desc: Foods are superb! What I love most is their sofa bed, it’s really comfortable to sit and sleep there. The only thing that their rooms doesn’t have is the “bidet”. But we were satisfied with the good service of JETRiX one of their crews in the lobby. He really extend his kindness and very accommodating. Unlike the oldies from the restaurant and the lady supervisor I think they need to be more kind and patient.

title: Hotel Stay
desc: My friends and I had a great stay at ParkRoyal Pickering. The proximity to fantastic food markets, shops and the F1 track made it worthwhile. We could walk to most things or it was a short 10 min taxi drive. Breakfast buffet was a bonus with our stay and our rooms were extremely comfortable. Would recommend and stay again.

title: Birthday dinner
desc: Awesome service by Derick, Janice and rest of Lime restaurant staffs 😊 We had an amazing birthday dinner. Foods are good and the restaurant is spacious and relaxing. I can recommend friends to come visit here.

title: Parkroyal Pickering
desc: Came for the F1 event as well as the Porsche record setting event to commemorate their 70th anniversay, stayed at Parkroyal Pickering great facilities and service especially the club floor at 16th floor. Leslie, Lijun and the rest of the team provided fantastic service throuhout very attentive service. Will definitely come back again.

title: Great place to stay
desc: We had a great stay at the park royal. The hotel is quite new, has fantastic amenities and really helpful staff. The location is great being near Chinatown and the train line. We were able to explore Singapore and see all its beauty. We had a luxury escapes package which was great value and would highly recommend staying at the park royal Pickering

title: Perfect hotel with helpful staff
desc: Overall are perfect, staff is very friendly and nice. Housemaid was so lovely and manage my complimentary fruits as requested. Room was great and I got upgrade to get Urban King room type. Facilities were well-prepared and I am really happy to stay here and want to come and visit again. The first time at Park Royal Collection made my birthday vacation are good-memorable.

title: Quality stay
desc: We spent 3 nights here on the way home to Australia from Europe. The hotel and staff were fantastic and the building is wonderful. The pool and deck area on level 5 were a great place to relax, read, swin and take in the view over Singapore.

title: None
desc: Your hotel is all about design, poorly maintained and shabby looking, the pool floor is dangerously slippery, there is nothing to hold on to when exiting the pool - only design cages that are rotten, rusty and dirty. The pool furniture is very dirty and the pool very cold. The room lacks a bidet shower or Asian toilet, lacks a lounge chair, and the rooms are extremely small. Your hotel is only a design, 5 stars is an exaggerated ambition.

title: Event & Stay at Parkroyal Collection @ Pickering
desc: Had yet another wonderful and perfect event and stay at Parkroyal Collection @ Pickering. Enjoyed the occasion with great experiences. Not our first retreat with the hotel but the experiences is always exceptional!

title: Great green hotel.
desc: Great location, pleasant and efficient staff. minor issues in room (sfa' door lock) that were fixed almost to full statisfaction. Rooms are large, beds are great. Rooms were clean and serviced regularly as you would expect.

title: Treat yourself. Zero regrets.
desc: Awesome experience. Stunning architectural building. Collection club on level 16 is brilliant. Staff (Ana, Donna and Sylvia) went above and beyond in their service. The overall stay for three nights was just fantastic. Treat yourself if you get a chance. Close to MRT so easy access to everything, Chinatown just a short stroll. Love it. Thanks for having us.

title: Spectacular well positioned hotel
desc: The room was fantastic the service superb and the hotel quite spectacular. The bed was very good. The concierge was really helpful and went out of his way to assist us on a number of occassions. Everything was brilliant. The only negative was the wifi being slow at times.

title: Pleasant Surprise
desc: Architecturally a stunning looking building, the planting is nothing short of spectacular. Welcoming entry to hotel with efficient, polite check in staff. Hotel dining area, room and pool area all extremely well presented, clean and tidy. Comfortable room everything you need. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, will definitely return

title: Not recommend this hotel due to the poor facilities
desc: Porter named Roya (Raya?) was really helpful and assisted me with great hospitality. However I had a bathroom issue and there was a big hole on bath towel, so the price is too high considering this facilities

title: Comfortable hotel near China town
desc: Gut location near China town and the hotel is comfortable. Nearby has many interesting restaurants and bars. You won’t get hungry and bold. It’s also close to river side. Metro station just in front of the door. But we still can walk to many places which helped us to digest the good food. We were very happy that we choose this hotel.

title: Just perfect
desc: Beautiful architecture; attentive, professional and respectful staff; quality rooms with comfortable beds and modern amenities; a thoughtful hotel layout that promotes privacy and a relaxing holiday vibe; and in a great central location with an excellent hawker food centre (cheap!), shopping malls and the Chinatown MRT right next door. We spent the first 6 nights of our holiday there, and could not fault it. We finished our holiday with 2 nights at the MBS...with some regret. The whole family agreed that whilst the MBS was an essential 'bucket lister', the touristy hustle, bustle and pomp of it was definitely not our style...and all a bit overrated.

title: A great hotel!
desc: This hotel is fantastic! Our lifestyle room was superb! Their team are friendly and very passionate. They make a guest feel very special. We would stay here again! Great location, very close to Chinatown and easy walks to main Singapore attractions.

title: Excellent hotel in a good location for getting around
desc: Beautiful building. Lovely room and bathroom. Toiletries were nice (dispenser bottles), beverage tray was good - the coffee bags were delicious. Bathrobes were hilarious- I think they’d fit a doll. Do make sure you download the MyICA app from the Singapore Govt before you arrive in Singapore. Immigration forms are now done online and you’ll be fined a substantial amount of money if you haven’t filled it in online. Otherwise, allow 20mins or so to download it at the airport and fill in before you go through to immigration.

title: Excellent club lounge, worth paying for, great staff and food.
desc: I booked a room with access to the executive club lounge and it was definitely worth it. I was here on business and location to the CBD meant I could walk to a fair number of my meetings. Although I did not use the executive club for breakfast as the choice is better in the main restaurant the other food and drink on offer was excellent. Firstly though the staff at the club lounge were brilliant, great service, chatty and friendly and always attentive to whatever I wished for. The afternoon tea and drinks and canapes I thought were delicous, espeically the sushi and sashimi on offer each evening. I would say the canapes were more like a full meal, with choice of hot and cold food, desserts and I found myself not needing to go our for dinner as I had eaten too much. Again I

title: Lush green facade, excellent service.
desc: My wife and I enjoyed a wonderful 3 days at this hotel which was recommended by our travel agent. It was a superb experience from arrival to departure. All of the staff are friendly and polite and try their upmost to help you. Hakim, the concierge was especially helpful and polite. The hotel is clean and adorned with lush green balconies which gives it a beautiful fresh feel in the midst of the concrete and glass city.

title: Iconic hotel, situated near Chinatown and Clarke Quay.
desc: Impeccable deluxe hotel. Won a ‘Green Award’ for the fantastic design & planting - to resemble rice fields. Spotlessly clean, open & airy rooms. The Lime Restaurant has attentive focused staff, everyone is cheerful. The spa/pool area offers a relaxing shady environment to unwind.

title: Great Business Location
desc: beautiful place, nice staff, great food. My only complaints would be the privacy of the room. I would like to keep blinds up and don't necessarily like flashing other visitors on the other side of the hotel. and the room size itself for the room I booked was pretty small. I think the 35-45m2 room size is pretty standard for Singapore but a bit too small for my comfort you have to be creative with fitting in facilities. oh and the lights in the toilet were super low for some reason. I had a good stay but just some small issues because they tried to fit a nice room into a tiny space.

title: Greenery is just the beginnning
desc: I loved this hotel, it was well located, well priced and was overall a great experience. We didn't want to leave when it came time to check out. While no bottled water was provided, there was a water filter on the bathroom sink for drinking water which I thought was a great eco-friendly alternative to bottled water, and allows you to refill your bottles as many times as you like. The staff were super friendly and always helpful when required! This hotel felt like a little escape in the middle of a big city. This would definitely be our choice of hotel when we return to Singapore!

title: Parkroyal on Pickering
desc: Our room always clean and tidy. Mini bar was turned on by request but didn't chill anything, it was checked twice but still no good. Suggest the rooms have a fridge. Bar Lime staff excellent Thank-you Satieeish,James.Suren and Allan. Lime restaurant breakfast excellent. Close to all public transport,bars,restaurants and Chinatown.

title: Poor Cleanliness
desc: The room (the toilet board and the desk) did not clean. The LIME restaurant and bar was average. I had drinks and snacks at the bar which were good. I reported issues of cleanliness and my booking but the follow-up service was disappointing and far from a 5-satr hotel.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Beautiful and special hotel. The staff sevice is great, the rooms are comfortable, the breakfast and the lounge dinner were delicious and well served, the location is awesome. We will definitely come back. Thank you

title: My experience in Singapore
desc: One of the great work trips, mainly because of the hotel. The facilities are brand new, the room gives you a warm feeling. The attitude of the hotel staff was beyond my expectations they were so kind and gave you the feeling that you are really wellcome there

title: Good for business
desc: Clean and efficient with clean and spacious rooms. Having only one choice of restaurant in a hotel this size is unusual. There's plenty of choice in the buffet but that is all there is, which just feels a bit odd. Mind you there's about 500 eateries within walking distance so it's not a major problem.

title: Great Location
desc: Excellent location, close to Chinatown, MRT station, room was terrific, staff were very helpful and friendly. The whole complex has hanging gardens ( inside and outside) and is rated as on of the most environmentally efficient and friendly hotels in the world

title: Great experience
desc: Amazing stay. Stayed from 26th-27th. Thank you valerie and rafael from frontdesk and stella from reservations. What an amazing hotel experience. Service was top notch and room was beautiful and soundproof. Bathroom sink even has filtered drinking water which was amazing for this eco-hotel as we don’t have to request for bottled water. I don’t have one bad thing to say about the experience. LIME was also great. The COLLECTION lounge also had a huge selection and variety of options.

title: Great place to stay and relax in Singapore. Convinence location
desc: This is a great place to stay and enjoy. However, breakfast needs to be added more choices to the menu. Other than that, I love everything that is provided. The room is clean, very nice service, very polite people there, very professional. Very close to China town with plenty of food and close to MRT. Great place overall.

title: Comfortable hotel in central business district
desc: This is a green hotel in the CBD. If you are looking to stay in a downtown business area ,then this hotel is very well suited for your requirements. There are plenty of food joints and connectivity is not an issue..The rooms are large and there is greenery done by planting trees at the hotel terrace and other areas. The hotel is comfortable and I enjoyed my stay. Thank you to the staff for their hard work.

title: None
desc: The hotel facilities and restaurant where fantastic, the staff so friendly and willing to make sure all were attended to. My Wife suffers many allergies and is often too scared to eat out, your staff attended to her every requirement and went far beyond to see that she was well looked after. We are truly grateful for the professionalism in which your staff shown us during our stay and we would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel based on our experience, The restaurant and staff should be commended for the efforts, and ability to support those with dietary requirements. The hotel facilities where very clean and comfortable and the location very central to all surrounding attractions, a fantastic hotel and we will certainly be staying there again

title: Work Trip
desc: The PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering, is in my opinion, one of the best hotels you can stay if you are in Singapore - the design and build of the hotel is simply breathtaking. I stayed here for a week on a work trip and had impeccable service for the entire stay all the way through. The rooms are a good size and feel very spacious and bright. The restaurant was amazing with a wide variety of global cuisines although queue were very long at weekend (this was apparently due to the volume of weddings the hotel host at this time of year). The pool is on the smaller side but offers great views and the skywalk is a hidden gem. We were unable to access the Club Lounge on level 16 which was a shame as Ive heard the views are stunning.

title: The Hanging Gardens of Singapore
desc: This is a truly inspiring hotel in a great location who care deeply about their green credentials and about providing an outstanding customer experience. There is simply no way you can be disappointed. I enjoyed access to the Club Lounge on the 16th floor and was totally blown away by the oasis of calmness and quality in everything from the food and drink available from breakfast through to the evening. A special mention to Ms. Ana who was an outstanding hostess and looked after our group perfectly. Thank you Ana.

title: Jungle within city within jungle?
desc: Very nice and semi-luxurious as well as very contemporary design cues everywhere. The exterior and 5F has vegetations that kinda makes you believe you are within tropical jungle. Grab a beer from the lobby cafe and take up one of the high back chairs overlooking Japanese inspired water garden for some zen coolness. Or one of those birdcages on the 5F

title: Great hotel and stay
desc: Absolutely brilliant hotel very clean and friendly and helpful staff would highly recommend this hotel to anyone breakfast was great so much choice great location near to China Town and bus stop for hop on hop off just across road lovely green plants and flowers up the side of building

title: Parkroyal Collection, Pickering, Singapore
desc: Everything was exceptional, the hotel is amazing with its eco-friendly garden which is well maintained add to that the location which is right next door to Chinatown. The only complaint I had was that the pool was a bit cold for my liking. 👍

title: Excellent hotel. Good location.
desc: A very good hotel. We enjoyed our 3 night stay. The only slight issue was the fact that due to the location of the room, our window was facing the walkway outside and we had to have the curtains drawn at all times and so unable to enjoy the view, but we didn't spend much time in the room.
