Very good location.

title: Perfect Choice Hotel for Corporate Meeting/Events with Fantastic Staff!
desc: We had an event from 7-9NOV 2022 and it was a success with the support of the team from Corporate Meeting. Angie and Jonathan did an exceptionally good job by paying attention to details and being there when we needed their assistance. Both went an extra mile in making our meeting a pleasant hassle free one. The coffee/tea break selection was yummy and I must say one of the best compared to 5 Star Hotel. Rooms were very clean and very comfortable. Club Floor services was perfect for meeting clients and catching up with emails. Great place for team to sit together for briefing prior to our event. Coach and car transfer to our outdoor events organised is a plus as we do not need to worry if the car or coaches will be on time to pick us up…everything was taken care and driver

title: Club lounge
desc: Leslie and Sylvia from the club lounge where absolutely amazing. The quote of food that is being offered is of very high standard. The staff in the club lounge were very helpful especially Leslie who offered us with a lot of knowledge of the local area. Would recommend staying at this hotel and taking up the club lounge benefit.

title: Excellent service and quality.
desc: - Service was excellent (concierge, reception, restaurant, room service). - Room was well designed. - Architecture was unique – lots of greenery too. - Had many eco-friendly considerations. - Only minor criticisms in that pool and lobby were not as large as some other 5-star alternatives (consideration for holiday trip), though very good service and quality more than made up for this. - Restaurant menu itself does not have many dietary considerations, though staff are more than happy to accomodate a custom meal.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: It was the first time I stayed at the Parkroyal Collection Pickering but definitely not the last time. Warm wellcome and great service throughout my stay there. Concierge did a wonderfull job in booking some restaurants for me.

title: Pampered like family in a a beautiful hotel
desc: My husband and I had a wonderful stay in a collection Lifestyle Room with access to the Collection lounge and facilities. The building is beautiful with tropical foliage cascading over the building. There is a sense of calm throughout the hotel. The room was well appointed with incredible City views. The bed was very comfortable and the ammenities were well appointed. The only improvement I can suggest is more wardrobe space and drawers for clothes for longer stays. The Collection Lounge was a real treat. The friendly staff of Ana, Donna, Leslie, Zovian, Yads and chef Sylvia provided a plentiful supply of drinks and food throughout the day. The service was warm, personal and very friendly. We felt very welcome and valued as guests. The hotel is well located close to

title: Outstanding quality and service
desc: I have stayed in this hotel about 5 times for the time from 2 weeks to a month each time during 2021-2022. I can say it is my most favorite place by far both on the hotel stay and the restaurant quality and service. This is very authentic place with good a accent on seafood, asian and Singaporean cuisine, still well balanced with western taste. I personally enjoyed both main ground floor restaurant and 16th floor club where I have breakfasts daily. Special thanks to Jenisah, Dong, and chef Michael for the great experience I enjoy here daily!

title: Incredible hotel, highly recommend
desc: Parkroyal Pickering is an amazing hotel and we will definitely be returning. The combination of architecture and greenery is stunning; the pool and spa area is fantastic; the breakfast buffet is delicous; the rooms were roomy and comfortable; and the staff went above and beyond. For less than half the price of MBS you can get a much better value. Being so close to the Chinatown MRT station made getting around the city a breeze.

title: This hotel is just AMAZING!!!
desc: I was on the business trip and this was the best hotel I ever stayed at. Rooms and the entire property were spotless clean, and I am not telling this lightly because I worked in hospitality for 8 years, so it is very hard to impress me especially when it comes to cleanliness. Everyone at the hotel is very professional, helpful and super nice from the front desk, concierge and restaurant staff who pretty much knew us by names. Every morning I was informed where I can find my team during breakfast :) My entire team from Amazon absolutely LOVED this hotel!!! I would recommend this hotel to everyone. Thank you for making this stay so wonderful!!!

title: Great hotel with sustainability at its core
desc: A fantastic hotel & location to access all the great sights of Singapore. Right next-door is a mall for any of your travel needs - great coffee, pharmacy, market, etc. We loved the efficiency of our room & the view of the garden. The hotel is committed to sustainability & this is evident throughout. The pool area is amazing with a great gym!

title: Beautiful looking hotel from outside.
desc: The room is very comfortable with good view of the marina area. Location is very good for exploring Chinatown, old City Centre & Clark Quay. The Lime Bar is a good place to chill at night especially when sitting outside.

title: Surprised by how much I liked this hotel
desc: Really great hotel and surprising value. Room was very comfortable and Club Lounge was wonderful. Exceptional service team and enjoyed many breakfasts and cocktails there. Great gym and pool area. Highly recommended and will be my hotel in Singapore for future visits.

title: Great hotel in fantastic location
desc: Right in the middle of it near Chinatown and close access to many MRT stations. Convenient for pretty much everything that Singapore has to offer. We went for a room with club access, choose this if you can, lounge is on the 16th floor and you can have champagne breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails all in the room rate. Infinity pool and insta worthy private pods. Exceptional service throughout our stay although the lounge was relocated for two days due to a private event which was a pity as the Lime bar is not as quite as the 16th floor.

title: Business trip@PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering
desc: It is an impressive hotel in which modernity and nature come together in perfect harmony. It gives a feeling of being energized yet comfortable. Traveling is convenient. Close to tourist attractions and MRT Clarke Quay, a place for after-work socializing. It is suitable for business trip.

title: A great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Definitely a great place to stay, whether with family or friends. Located at the centre of China town, very convenient to visit almost all must-visit place of interest in the areas. Hotel service staff are friendly and helpful. Hotel with great facilities, and very interesting room design for the room I stayed.

title: Very happy with our stay!
desc: This is our second time staying at Parkroyal Pickering. This time we were given a free upgrade to a suite due to our Platinum status. My family, especially my kids, super loved the relaxing feel of the room and the bathroom. We were also very impressed with the cleanliness of the room and the service given from check in, housekeeping, in room dining all the way until check out. Jetrix, who checked us in, was very friendly and he made sure that we got the room earlier than expected since he knew my son had to take a nap.

title: Great stay at Park Royal Collection Pickering
desc: Great stay overall - great and warm hospitality from check-in all the way to the end! Club collection hospitality staff were very attentive and warm - making an effort to remember the guests and our orders. Club collection lounge was great, both in terms of ambience and food offerings for the evening cocktail! Room was very spacious, and also appreciate the small touches like the turn-down service. All in all, a great stay, and one that I would be happy to recommend to others and will be back myself!

title: My 30th Wedding Anniversary
desc: This is our first time to stay in Parkroyal Pickering Hotel. Our receptionist Jetrix is very helpful and generous. He gave us many good suggestions for local eating and touring. Once he knew that it was our 30th wedding anniversary, he gave us a very nice room with beautiful scenery. The room is cleaned and modernized. We appreciated his kind arrangement. My wife and I will sure have a wonderful stay for the coming days. I will highly recommend Parkroyal Hotel to my friends and relatives for their future visit to Singapore. 真的很感謝Jetrix, 他對待客人親切有禮貌，因為疫情，已有三年沒有出外旅行，今年第一次通關，我們就揀了星加坡你們的酒店，希望今次旅遊會帶比我們難忘的回憶，再加上我同我太太30周年結婚周紀念，對我們來說是有雙重的意義。

title: Soooooo good
desc: This is such a fantastic hotel, it is beautiful inside and out with kind, generous and beautiful staff who care about your stay. We arrived on Christmas morning after a 14 hr flight and received a warm and friendly welcome from the reception staff, we where shown to our room by the guest relations manager who highlighted the features of the room and the facilities of the club lounge. We took breakfast immediately and the food choice was great and quality in the lounge. Over the last few days the staff in the lounge have become like friends understanding our needs at breakfast with is sparkling wine, afternoon tea and drinks and canapés in the evening, all of which are part of the club collection package. We must point out the excellent service from Leslie, Jiaying Yonchee and

title: Great hotel
desc: Great room with amazing view from the 10th floor. Nice ambiance. Large king bed for our family. Perfect location near the Chinatown MRT station. Last hut not least, thanks for the room make up by Song.. felt fresh every time we enter the room. Well done PARKROYAL COLLECTION PICKERING

title: This hotel is the best example of Tourism with Environmental Protection
desc: As an avid Environmentalist I have been a fan of biophilic design. In India, this concept is not as popular or we can say is still developing, but the architecture of developed countries has now shifted towards biophilic designs. In the design environmental protection is kept as a central element in the structure of the building, and at the same time greenery is given an important place in the design of the building, the greenery that can do production and be beneficial to some extent. So that the oxygen level in the location remains the best and an ecosystem is also created around the building. When I was researching about the world's best biophilic designs, it occurred to me that Singapore's Park Royal Collection Pickering Hotel is one of the finest examples in the entire

title: Very good.
desc: We were only using the hotel for the day as we had a late flight in the evening. Check in was fast, easy and friendly. Room was lovely - not a great view but then again we were only staying 7 hours so did not require a view. Good location of hotel. Room was clean, bed was comfortable, good channels on the tv. Shower was good. Pool was FREEZING. So freezing that I did not go in. We picked this hotel as we liked the look of the pool (again we were only there for the day) and whilst it is nice, it doesnt get much sun, perhaps a bit of heating would be good? My daughter was the brave one to go in the pool and only lasted for about 5 mins before she was shivering! Hotel is gorgeous, great location.

title: Beautiful hotel with superb services
desc: I have great experiences with the services. I love the ambience, the design, the characters of this hotel. No wonder it has won many awards as eco-friendly and green hotel. The restaurant served delicious meals. I also want to thank the staff (sorry I forgot his name) who helped my son when he got lost & cried at the hotel.

title: Superior hotel in every way
desc: First visit to Singapore staying with this chain of hotels (recommended by my friend- a frequent visitor ..She advised we join the members club ri(free) and we thus obtained a significant discount on our stay .In addition we had kcomplimentary access to club facilities(15tb floor ) and Health Club /Gym/Pool and cabanas … Rooms were clean well equipped and organized and provided quality bar /refreshment status facilities .Appreciated the sustainability ethos and comfort .Quality toiletries , good design and good water pressure in showers as well as excellent quality mattress and pillow ensured a good sleep had by all Option of Asian breakfast appreciated (and cook available (loved the chilli omelette every morning and Mimosas !!)Full western breakfast provided and variety and

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel with very interesting building and architecture. Walking distance from Marina and China town. Very helpful concierge service by Aziff Bell who recommended and booked really nice dinner for us. Will definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Perfect Pickering Parkroyal
desc: Our whole family of 19 stayed here for a week for a special birthday post pandemic! it was incredible! the rooms were lovely and the breakfast vast! the pool is special and the staff amazing! the location is perfect it seems for every venue in Singapore. The breakfast staff gave me hot lemon every morning at 6.15 am before they opened so I could do my walk as the sun rose! such special treatment from everyone made this my favourite hotel in the whole world!

title: Excellent all round service + action on sustainability by not serving water in plastic bottles
desc: Our family enjoyed a wonderful experience from a total service point of view. We were welcomed by a friendly and efficient reception, enjoyed one of the hotel's well designed rooms, and we were consistently graced with attentive service at the lounge. What I appreciated personally most is that the hotel does not serve bottled water and instead there is a filter tap in the room. This saves a lot of plastic per hotel per year. Compliments to the entire team!

title: Beautiful inside and out
desc: Truly truly cannot explain how amazing this place is. For the record they do not provide bottle water but that is for good reasoning. As this hotel is very eco friendly and has a water filter. The room I stayed in was the urban deluxe king room and fit me well. The hotel's location is in the heart of everything and you can walk around to a lot of places if you choose to. Besides a nice view from my room, the most spectacular is from the pool. I'm sure people have seen it online but nothing matches in person. The staff there was great, (shout out Jun and John) they're very helpful and honest when it comes to recommendations for activities and things to check out. Also, the gym is just as great with provided alkaline water. Overall comfortable bed, although you're

title: Amazing
desc: Gorgeous hotel, the swimming pool and garden area are stunning. The room was big, clean, very comfortable with a great view on the plants and the city. The staff was kind, proactive and helpful. The location is perfect, near Chinatown and various hawkers centers, business district, Boat Quay and Clarke Quay. We would absolutely come back.

title: Eco meets luxury
desc: Amazing experience of an eco hotel meeting luxury. A must stay in Singapore. Spa, pool and walkway was amazing and all staff so friendly with very good English. Suren the bartender was a great source of local tips and great drinks! Even seeing the hotel is a must when visiting Singapore and the breakfast was out of this world

title: Complement to Amy Abas @Lime Restaurant
desc: I would like to give complement to your staff, Amy. She attended to us when we approached her for some assistance. She is friendly and joyous. You can easily spotted her joy when she served and her professionalism is what I admired the most. She has made my lunch a memorable one. She is definitely the reason for me to return to the restaurant again. Jean (Mrs)

title: Best location for a city trip
desc: We chose the hotel for our city trip to Singapore. The hotel convinces with its optimal location to the metro (Chinatown). From here all sights can be easily reached. Our room (Lifestyle Premier) was large and bright. Also the breakfast was very good. We can recommend the hotel again at any time.

title: Pricey but an awesome place to stay!
desc: Stayed in the hotel from the 6th to the 10th… amazing hotel fantastic location, awesome food at Lime restaurant and if you need a food court it is walking distance from the property! The staff is very courteous and helpful… while I did get my room quite late but I guess they did their best to keep me informed! The house keeping staff specifically Hein who cleaned my room did a brilliant job! So far it has been a brilliant stay… looking forward to the rest of the stay! Best regards Karun

title: The most beautiful hotel in the Heart of Town
desc: The most beautiful hotel in the Heart of Chinatown. Not only are the rooms clean, and the services provided by the staff are exceptional. The building is also remarkably eco-friendly and uniquely clad in soft forested greenery. Stayed for a duration of 4 days & 3 nights. Received phenomenal help from their Office of Guest Relations (Ms. Judy Wu & Concierge Staff) with the reservation of services (Express Laundry, Booking of Spa, lounge, and Restaurant time slots, etc.), to being blessed with a free room upgrade! Please don’t forget to visit the Club Lounge at level 16 if you have access! The views are so stunning my wife decided to take some of our Wedding photos there. I highly recommend this hotel for a quick getaway! Thank you once again PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering for

title: None
desc: We had a birthday staycation with my daughter, and she loved it very much with the experience we had with the hotel! They treated her very special on her birthday, and the staff very friendly and supportive! Thank you!

title: Will definitely come back!
desc: Service, facilities & staffs were impeccable. You exceeded our expectations. Starting from check-in to the complimentary lounge access while waiting for our room. My family enjoyed your faculties & food served in Lime. Will be coming back again to experience. Thanks again ParkRoyal Collection Pickering.

title: Memorable Stay
desc: We had a lovely experience while staying here for a night. The hotel is a eco friendly hotel. We like it the way the use the plants to cover the surrounding of the hotel and the view is lovely from the room.

title: Best looking hotel in Singapore
desc: One of the best hotels in Singapore If you want gorgeous future-facing design met with a conscious approach to sustainability then this is the place. The food is fab especially the Angus burger in the Lime bar and the Lion and the Beast mock tail made with cherries and lychees (I personally loved it). My room was cleaned daily by Hou and colleagues and they did an amazing job. They were also so polite and helpful at all times. The pool area and gum area is excellent and spa also very nice. So yes I’ll be staying here again.

title: Daycation
desc: We stayed there for a daycation. The hotel is modern, rooms are spacious by Singapore standards and service is prompt and courteous. The pool is a bit small but we didn't use it so didn't matter. The Lime restaurant has a decent menu, reasonably priced and food quality is quite good.

title: Great Team at Parkroyal Pickering Club Lounge
desc: Was wonderful - took the club collection package. The team really made our stay pleasurable and I think it would not have been that special if it was not for the warmth of the staff - Chef included in the Club lounge!. Fadrul in concierge was most helpful as well - helping us organise a restaurant booking several times. We came to Singapore for a 3-day trip - 3 friends. The Parkroyal location was great in being able to walk through the financial district and Chinatown easily. We took the club package and must say, really glad we did - food and service amazing. On the Sunday, there was a typical tropical storm so we stayed indoors, indulged in a spa package and just simply enjoyed staying at the hotel -watching the rain from sitting in the pool and being in the steam

title: Singapore
desc: We stayed at the Parkroyal on Pickering in Singapore, suggested by our travel agent. We chose it because of its excellent location, close to everything. This hotel is exceptional - beautiful interiors and very welcoming and helpful staff. The restaurant, Lime, is very good. The food and presentation are amazing and the price is very good.

title: Staycation with Worldcup Finals !
desc: I had quite a good stay in this hotel ! Birthday treats and free breakfast were a great add on ! Hotel staffs are very attentive to my requests and enquiries ( extra pillow etc ) Missed on the perfect due to : - The water pressure is pretty low (room 1128) even at non-peak hour (4am watched Worldcup finals at MBS and returned to shower, water pressure is still low) - Swimming pool was super cold !

title: Great workcation deals.
desc: 11-hour practical deal for the workcation package. The room is cozy, clean, and its design is done with elegance. The hotel staff are all friendly. The train provides easy access to the accommodation. Will definitely return again.

title: Park Royal Buffet was AM(y)AZING
desc: I recently came with my family to the Park Royal Lime Buffet at Chinatown. It was a pleasant meal, but what made it more memorable was Amy, one of the staff who assisted us and served our table. She was such enjoyable company and really elevated our experience. She was swift in service, eloquent and entertaining. Shoutout to Amy Abas! Your excellet service will forever be fresh in my memory whenever I think of buffets.

title: Great service & caring Nature
desc: We have just arrived this morning in Singapore, our stop over going to New Zealand. I wasn’t feeling great generally today , combination of tiredness & jet lag ( not Covid) as we had some test done before leaving UK yesterday. My husband went to the restaurant for dinner alone & ordered me a simple stay to take to the room . The hotel staff made a lovely gesture by sending get well card & some Sweets . I was so touch by the caring nature of the staff here in Pickering Singapore . I don’t normally do review till we check out but I think they deserve an early review . Thank you

title: 4 nights in Singapore
desc: Good location near to China Town ,excellent Garden room very comfortable peaceful, a business hotel ,so therefore busy with people coming and going ,good breakfast but not an experience,bar disappoints for a five star dominated by the World Cup screen! Which obviously lots of business men watching it again it was not a relaxing go to bar in the hotel again it was not an experience just a loud bar in any business hotel ! Shame was hoping for more

title: More than a 5 star service
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to thank front desk/ reception Mr Raphael for his great help and initiative to help solve the misunderstanding on the Trip.com app. In the app it showed that upon booking of a lifestyle room, guest would be able to access the executive lounge. However the actual fact was only when you booked a Collection lifestyle room you would then be able to get access to it. However Mr Raphael allowed me to do so without hesitation, thus giving me a great impression on how well trained the staffs were when dealing with this scenario. Kudos to the team. As I had stayed at this hotel for quite a few times, the gym equipment were also newly upgraded and opens 24hrs. Food served at the lounge as well as the staffs were outstanding as well. Once again, thank

title: Parkroyal
desc: A spectacular hotel in all respects, the service providers, the room facilities, privacy, the beauty of the hotel and the rooms, the breakfast was also great. We were on our honeymoon and they upgraded our room and sent us a cake with greetings, we were really excited from this gesture. Thank you for an excellent stay in an excellent hotel.

title: Fantastic staff and facilities
desc: I absolutely love this hotel, five out of five the staff was incredibly helpful. The facilities were beautiful, updated clean. They were constantly people maintaining the facilities. The pool, although really cold was beautiful beautiful view the plant surrounding the area were very well-maintained, and had good labeling so when you what we were even walking through the gardens . Housekeeping was also fantastic. We had an incident where a glass broke and they came in and make sure we were OK before anything. Then they cleaned up the glass and brought us and you want and made sure everything was ok. Syhir the concierge got us into the best New Year’s parties the best New Year’s reservations for dinner as we had an amazing meal, he found us a place because he wanted Peking duck.

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: The most amazing experience I’ve ever had anywhere in the room. Raphael greeted us with a smile and the best service attitude imaginable upon our entrance, and was so polite, accommodating, pleasant and professional. We are so happy to have chosen this place for our anniversary, and the Urban Suites room waaay surpassed anything in our imaginations - the facilities are wonderful, the room is huge and spacious, very clean and well maintained. And in room service is delicious as well. I would give this place a 1000/10 stars if I could!!

title: Reliable, comfortable
desc: Great location, fantastic design, nature focussed yet in the city centre. Walking distance to Chinatown, business district, well known hawker centres, mrt stations. Breakfast buffet tad pricey but could fill you up for the day, tho better to go to nearby eateries for local delights.

title: Signature Executive King Room
desc: Lobby staff is very friendly and helpful. The bedroom is almost perfect. Hotel decoration is beautiful. There is no bathtub. Love the water filter in the room. Swimming pool water is very cold. Difficult to order food from the pool bar. Staff often not in place, probably to collect food, and took very long time for the food to be ready. In room dining also took very long time to be ready.

title: Amazing !
desc: Perfect location for MRT stations . fab hotel , good rooms with plenty of space . Bars and restaurants busy but not noticeably , attention to detail was superb . The club rooms and bars were excellent , great attention to detail

title: Lovely experience - beautiful hotel
desc: Wonderful hotel with well appointed rooms and attractive greenery throughout. Staff in the club lounge were friendly and professional and ensured we felt looked after. Easy enough to walk to Clarke Quay, Raffles, and the Merlion although also very close to Chinatown MRT and numerous bus lines.

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Great facility and great service by the team. Pool area is stunning. Dine in meal very delicious. Very good location close to MRT. Walking distance to Clarke Quay Mall and Chinatown. Hawker stalls walking distance too.

title: Best Staycay Ever!
desc: This is by far the best staycation experience I have ever had. From Raphael at the front desk, to the friendly staff at the lounge (Donna, Leslie, Ana, chefs, cleaner, etc) as well as the PRC cleaner at the pool. I was travelling with 3 seniors and the all the staff were so accomodating and helpful. Thank you so much!

title: Magnificent hotel
desc: We upgraded to some kind of corner suite, the teenager had a nice bed made up in the lounge room. Lovely hotel, a green oasis right next to Chinatown. Great breakfast (bottomless bubbles!) Had a little query of the bill when I got back to Australia and they no fuss arranged a refund pretty much straight away. A very impressive establishment.

title: All fine but nothing spectacular.
desc: We booked the lowest rate room for 300 Euro/night. The hotel looks fantastic from the outside, our room was cozy, the view great, staff was friendly, and late night room service food delicious. We perceived the fitness room and pool to be quite small in comparison to the size of the hotel and therefore, our expectation. We were satisfied, yet we would still try out another hotel if we were coming back to Singapore.

title: Great Eco friendly hotel
desc: This is my first and greatest stay experiences at PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering. The room is well prepared and really love the 3M water filter which placed in the room! Of course if the hotel can provide a bottle / tumblr (even it’s a paid item) will be better since the weather in SG is a bit hot. Especially thanks to Jetrix and his team, the lounge service is fantastic and unexpected high standard.

title: Good choice for staying in Singapore
desc: The hotel is near to the Chinatown. It is convenient for guest to visit Sands, Orchard and Sentosa. The hotel itself is covered by greenery, which is an attractive designing in the city. However, the hotel facilities and decoration are a little bit outdated. The exhaust fan in the toilet is not strong enough, so the room has a little humidity.

title: Bad experience at park royal pickering
desc: Issues with check-in stuff who kept insisting that my room type doesn't have club lounge , despite the terms-and-conditions stating that it is included. staff and duty manager was extremely reluctant to adhere to the terms and rejected what I said when I showed them the terms and conditions simply claiming my room type doesn't have lounge access. Eventually allowed me usage of the lounge, but the receptionist rudely re-emphasize that my room type wasn't supposed to have lounge, almost as though she wanted to drive home the pt and they were doing me a favour. Final remark was uncalled for. Like hello your tnc said lounge included what do you mean wasn't supposed to have. Room had a leaky shower which was replaced, but the temperature from the resulting shower was unstable.

title: A great stay. We were very satisfied and happy!
desc: First of all, thank you to the whole team at the Parkroyal Pickering for the attentive and friendly service. We love the unusual architecture of the hotel. We had a suite and access to the Club Lounge. The view from our room was amazing, the facilities were very comfortable and we liked the sustainable concept!!!! We loved that the hotel is very centrally located in Chinatown. Many places are within walking distance from here. We allways had breakfast in the lounge. It was very relaxing and comfortable. We would like to say a special thank you to Jetrix and Donna from the Club Lounge team. They were very accommodating and always friendly and made us feel like a very special guest. As well as Aziff at the entrance and the houskeeping who also did a great job and made us feel

title: Luxury hotel in excellent and convenient location
desc: Excellent hotel in a very convenient location. Nice room , good facilities, nice restaurant and bar , gym and pool . Very friendly , efficient and helpful staff . Would stay here again and would highly recommend

title: Amazing service, one of the best club lounges in SG.
desc: Firstly, the soft product is top notch. Service staff were friendly and helpful during our 2D1N stay. Khai from front of house went above and beyond when we faced some challenges with our access cards at the elevator. He even escorted us to our room to ensure that the cards were working well. Donna and Dennis at the lounge were very welcoming, friendly and willing to share. While we were given our privacy and space, conversations with them were fun and insightful. While the selection of food and beverages aren't wide, the quality (especially the cocktails) is pretty good, in comparison to other club lounges in Singapore. Prosecco was also served during breakfast. The team took note of our preferences and it's the details that wow-ed me. Vanessa at front desk was prompt in

title: Pay for club level if you can!
desc: The hotel is architecturally stunning and the rooms are clean, comfortable and well appointed. Right on the edge of Chinatown and the CBD, it’s well positioned for business and pleasure. Shopping and restaurants are in easy walking distance, Hop on Hop off Big Bus stop is across the street, and taxis are readily available. But the real treat is at the club level! The top floor features a lounge serving breakfast, tea and dinner each day. The food is excellent, and the service is incomparable. Leslie, Donna and Ana made us feel welcomed and comfortable and took care of things we didn’t even know we needed. They called a concierge up to visit with us on our first day and he was a magician. He brought a map, helped us plan our days and nights and made reservations for us at

title: None
desc: It was an excellent stay . Great Staff, excellent facilities and good connectivity to nearby outlets. and great food. The food options are good. This is my 3rd visit to the hotel and look forward to coming back .

title: None
desc: We booked the Signature Suite and we got the one in the 14th floor. Due to the special design we had the feeling to be on the ground flor with palmtrees outside our bed- and bathroom. The view was perfekt. Just the check-in procedure was a little bit "short". Guiding me 5 meters towards the elevator telling me it is in additional 5 meters on the right does not make any sense... Either guide me to the elevator, or tell me where it is. Special thanks to the team from the Collection Club (Ana, Les..., Sylvia - hope I got the names correct). Very supportive, friendly.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: A really enjoyable stay - for a city hotel, it just has a relaxed feel. After a hot day out walking back into the hotel, it felt like returning to an oasis. The staff were always pleasant and helpful. We booked a Club Room, and utilised the Club Lounge everyday. The breakfast was advised as limited but I found it suited us. Not a big pool but the surrounding area is cool and plenty of lounge options. The one gripe I have is their coffee, I didn’t see a barista only a coffee machine and the coffee was never HOT! But I definitely would stay again

title: Overpriced
desc: The advertising makes you think you will be living amid a lush metropolitan jungle. Therefor we were willing to spend more than usual for the experience. In reality the hotel is much like any other hotel. Nothing special and therefor in our eyes overpriced. Carlton city down the road was almost 1/2 the price and had a better view, a rooftop bar and a warmer pool that you could actually swim in.

title: Simply the best
desc: I have stayed at this hotel so many times over the past 10 years. Last couple of times I thought it had lost its mojo, the rooms were still great, the location excellent but the club lounge had lost a little. Having just stayed three nights Im so happy that it’s back on track and our experience was brilliant. I still love the rooms, the look and feel and the hotel has great access to the MRT and a supermarket but the lounge is so much better. Still a little work to do but no one would be disappointed. Have already booked my next two trips and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: Fabulous stay
desc: Absolutely amazing hotel, nice location and great service! We were treated amazingly from the first step in untill the walk out, check in, advices, concierge, helpful pool and spa staff, even the breakfast staff offered us amazing table by the window with a view. It's hard to describe, but you feel as individual despite the big hotel. Every single staff member made our stay memorable. Definitely a place to come back!

title: Wonderful amenities and best location
desc: My only choice of hotel when in Singapore. Wonderful amenities and perfect location. Although staff are friendly, on this stay, I did feel I was just a number as it is a large hotel with many guests coming and going. It would be nice to have some sun over the pool area so I didn't spend as much time as I would have liked here but did use almost every day of my 6 day stay. It would be better if the fitness room was a little larger with possibly some more floor space as it was very crowded at times. The bathroom basin light wasn't working but was immediately fixed when I informed staff.

title: Parkroyal at Pickering
desc: I don’t have enough words to express how I was so delighted to have stayed at Parkroyal Collection at Pickering. You have gone above my expectations in terms of service. Your have been so attentive and caring all through out. Special shout out and biggest thank you to Donna and Sylvia of Collection Lounge, and Nurul of Reception. To Manager Jonathan thank you for all your attention and for having your Team top class. I have been to other luxurious hotels, but it is your service at Parkroyal Pickering which I rank best of all. I will see you again.

title: Park royal pickering
desc: Nice. Very cozy, location is great,very accesible, food are great, got local and western options (less halal options though) but i am not muslim. So it does not matter, just that some malay food are nice and was searching for it haha overall are good!!

title: A hotel with style - highly recommended
desc: Great hotel with amazing architecture. Very friendly staff and courteous at the same time. The hotel is within walking distance to Chinatown. Otherwise, you can get a cab organized by the friendly concierge within a few minutes. The pool, spa and fitness area is very nice in 5th floor. The breakfast is plentiful and certainly something for everyone, as both Asian, European and more can be eaten..

title: Great hotel
desc: Location of hotel was excellent great atmosphere and lovely feel about the hotel.. staff were so helpful and pleasant and made for a most enjoyable stay would recommend this hotel breakfast buffet was fantastic and everything really fresh and tasty

title: A beautiful hotel to return to
desc: We have stayed many times at the Parkroyal on Pickering, each time we encounter exceptional service and kind and considerate staff members at every turn. The location is perfect for eating drinking and exploring with everything at your doorstep if you choose to leave the hotel. We will continue to stay here as we love our moments as soon as we enter the glass doors.

title: Modern and very green hotel
desc: ROOMS: spacious and bright, good view. Normal size bathroom with a shower. There is special tap with drinking water in every room LOCATION: 3min walking distance to Chinatown metro station, 15min to Marina Bay by feet. There is shopping center with grocery store and cafes nearby. FOOD: Lime restaurant is available for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Room service works 24h FACILITIES: pool and gym with a view, parking STAFF: polite and smiling. There is concierge service on site

title: Perfect Spot and Lovely Staff
desc: This was a beautiful hotel to stay in, surrounded by gorgeous greenery and situated in the ideal spot. A 10 minute walk to Chinatown and a 5 minute walk to the MRT which can take you all around Singapore. The staff were incredibly friendly and always willing to help. Highly recommend!

title: Love their services
desc: Best hotel ever. Comfortable, sustainable environment, great design, best services and best location. This hotel’s location is located nearby Singapore river and China town. We got Arvino to take of our room which he did very best job for us, caring and organizing our to be really comfortable and nice all time. Thanks him so much!

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: Excellent service and nothing was a problem gor them. My wife had a fall when we were out and about and there was a wheelchair provided and they had no problem in contacting Changi airport and Singapore airlines and we had assistance as required all the way back to London. Great Service and a Great place to stay. We will be back.

title: great customer service
desc: Aziff Bell gave us great recommendations on local food places. He was very helpful to me and my wife. Highly recommend coming to Park Royal. Lots of things to do in the area. From clubs to food and scenic views.

title: Simply the best
desc: Just the best place to stay in Singapore. The amenities, location, service. The room size for the King deluxe is excellent - generous in space, the infinity pool and gym are just divine and the buffet breakfast selections are superb. A must experience

title: Looked after . . .
desc: . . . here to settle our son into NUS, National University of Singapore. A 10 day stay and I was truly looked after and cared for. Professional, warm and welcoming with nothing being too much trouble. After very busy days, the Park Royal was our sanctuary; Suren in the Lime Bar was professional and trustworthy; he was a huge support to me when on my own. I will never forget his hand of friendship, and will seek him when I next return. The Concierge were also extremely attentive and kind; Nava was always pleased to see me and made sure I was safe and knew where I was going as I was often overwhelmed! My twin room was beautifully serviced by Pooja; what a delight to return to 'crisp' beds and fresh towels and attention to detail, a true home from home. I had the time of my

title: Very good service.. breakfast...
desc: I'm checkout on Friday, Jan 20 2023. I stayed here for 5 days with friendly service, beutiful view of the hotel.. everything was great. This hotel will remain a great memory of my first trip of Singapore. I am planning to stay here again when I visit Singapore again someday. I'd like to say THANKS all of the staff at this hotel. :) Thank you. MR. MOON and Ms. RYU

title: Great start to long awaited holiday
desc: Excellent room and staff all very helpful and friendly Lovely views from our room on the 15th floor Infinity pool lovely Good range of food for all meals Well located for the attractions of Singapore and the MRT

title: NYE
desc: Love the location. Nearby to eateries/pubs and bars. Accesible for a couple like us. 2ndly love the aesthetics to the room design/decor. Natural light from beautiful window with a view of the city. Not forgetting the bathtub as well next tot her window. So calming and surreal. Everything is perfect. Could have even be much better if u had a bidet. That would be bonus.

title: An absolute gem of a hotel
desc: What a lovely hotel. Everyone we met was professional and helpful going above and beyond expectations. In particular Aziff and Wong at concierge were brilliant helping us to find various locations in the city. The buffet breakfast is exceptional and JayRex in the restaurant was delightful and her friendly and helpful attitude helped us feel relaxed and welcome. An absolute gem of an employee.

title: A brilliant stay in Singapore
desc: Lovely hotel and rooms. The only down for my husband was that the room was very dusty which aggravated his allergies. If you put a light across the back of the toilet shelf you could see the level of dust. Also getting into the swimming pool was very slippery and my husband had a nasty fall and grazed himself quite badly. Everything else was absolutely superb.

title: Great staycation experience!
desc: We were thoroughly impressed with the entire stay and service. The whole stay was seamless - from the check in, to the dinner, room service to massage and check out. Everyone was friendly, very helpful and professional. The team was very thoughtful and surprised my partner with an advanced birthday cake + card! It is greatly appreciated! It has been one of the best staycation experience we had so far. Everyone we came in contact with was amazing. We would also like to specially mention the massage we had at the St. Gregory Spa. It was fantastic! The masseuse was really skilled and professional!

title: Wonderful experience at lobby bar
desc: I came to meet some friends and drop by at the lobby bar. While waiting, I had a lovely chat with the service staff, Li Xuan, and enjoyed the earl grey cake and drinks. Would love to come back again! Thank you!

title: Great quality hotel in superb location
desc: A very good quality hotel with an overall great experience. Not the cheapest, but the extra price was worth it for the quality and space in the room. Excellent service from friendly staff. Breakfast was top quality every day. The location is superb with loads of places within walking distance.

title: Nice
desc: Generally is nice and comfortable. The service is fine. Rooms are clean. The breakfast is good and people are nice and friendly. The rooms are good. The toilet has no water which is a poor point. I like the toilet with water for washing.

title: Fabulous
desc: The moment stepping in the hotel, I was awed by the great service; firstly Concierge staff Wong and then Front Desk Staff Shane. I felt so welcomed by them and explained why they are in the hospitality's industry. Not forgetting the Front Office Manager; Jon and Guest Services Manager Judy who made the necessary arrangement and personally brought the amenities to the room which I felt honored Also specially mention and applaud the following staff in the Club Lounge which enhanced my stay. They were friendly, accommodating, attending to details and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organization. They are Dong Hao, Donna, Anna, Leslie, Pei Wen and Chef Edmund =, Sylvia and Yong Chee Pool Attendant : John and Wei Hao One touch service : Norizah I was

title: Thank You! Brent and Mr. Wong
desc: This was our first visit to Singapore and staying at The Parkroyal, Pickering will remain one of our most pleasant memories of the visit. The location, the staff, the accommodation and the breakfast were all above expectation. Special thank you to Brent and Mr. Wong at the concierge desk for all the help on navigating the city and finding places to eat and shop. Hope to visit again.

title: Lovely stay
desc: We had a lovely stay at the hotel, the room was lovely. The choice at breakfast was huge and really nice. An easy walk to marina bay sands to watch the evening fountain and lights show. Pool was lovely and the staff were very attentive, would stay again.

title: Great hotel on the surface but issues behind the scenes.
desc: From the outset this hotel is stunning with the architecture and general appearance superb however this may underlie issues with service that we experienced during our stay. We arrived after a 14 hour flight early morning to be told no we couldn’t check in no rooms were ready and we’d have to wait .I appreciate that check in wasn’t til 3pm but we were given no options to freshen up or to get something to eat basically leave your bags and off you go come back later. Apparently there were issues with the system for room bookings and this was still going on 3 days later when we checked out.. when we did check in we were given no info about the room just here’s your key it’s room number … The room itself was ok the bed comfy and bathroom nicely equipped but not sure about the glass

title: Treated very poorly because payed with debit card
desc: We’re are doctors from Australia. We payed by debit card because it saves a lot on international bank fees when travelling overseas. Because of the debit card we were forced to pay for the whole stay up front, and the minibar was emptied and locked. This demonstrated a complete lack of respect or trust, and seems to assume that we were trying to steal from the hotel. Will not be coming back.

title: Great stay!
desc: The stay was a weekend getaway and my first visit to the property. The team in the executive lounge was attentive and welcoming to the guests enjoying the premise. Kudos to Donna, Leslie, Anna, Dennis, Wan Hao and the team for the great hospitality, also to the 2 chefs on duty daily. I am pleasantly surprised at the well-managed club lounge on weekends. I have witnessed many other executive lounges struggling to meet the expectations of guests on over-crowding weekends. Great job at PR Collection Pickering!!

title: Stay over before Oz
desc: The hotel location and facilities were excellent. The room was clean, quite and very comfortable. Restaurant and bar service and options were outstanding. Would definitely stay again and would recommend to others. Enjoyed faculties and even did the garden walk which was a nice surprise

title: Amazing hotel
desc: If you are passing through Singapore or looking for a staycation this is the ideal place. The architecture and layout is incredible which set the tone for our stay. Location is perfect in Chinatown and walking distance to downtown and subways nearby. Not far from the heritage district around the gallery and Duxton or Clarke quay/river valley. Spoilt for options in the evening. The staff are really friendly, very professional and know what they are doing. Food was great and breakfast had a wide selection. Room was bright and spacious with everything modern that you want. Pity we couldn't stay longer but we will be back!

title: Welcome cosy suprise of a hotel
desc: We loved the feel of the hotel as soon as we walked in, inviting, warm decor and the architecture incorporsting the plants. The rooms were crisp, well designed with a Scandinavian feel. Everything was modern. I appreciated that the rooms were not over heated at night (having stayed at a well know hotel in Singapore on a previous visit where rooms were over heated). The fresh fruit bowl in toom was a welcomed surprise. All the staff we interacted with from reception through to the dining room & bar were friendly and nothing was too much trouble. The location was perfect, close walk to 3 MRTs, the quays, downtown and of course Chinatown. The faviliwere great including the infity pool, sitting in the airy lobby to read and overlook the planting and the street.We stayed for 3

title: Excellent
desc: The hotel’s green credentials are clearly on display. The architecture includes tropical planting everywhere, including a garden retreat on the 5th floor with great views over Singapore. The staff are very friendly and can not do enough for you. Location wise it is very central within 5 minutes walk of two MRT stations. Would certainly stay there again.

title: Great experience
desc: We had a very nice stay. We stayed in a room where we had access to the club lounge(16th floor) and I can really recommend. The staff on 16th floor was super nice and the view is great, especially at night. The food was amazing too. There was teatime every day, where you can have all kinds of drinks (non alcoholic) and cakes, macarons and fruit etc. The only thing that we didn't like was the air conditioner. It was a bit too cool for us, so we always wore long clothes when going to breakfast and to the lounge. But overall great experience. Definitely worth a stay when you are in Singapore

title: Amazing city hotel - quality and cleanliness
desc: We had a great stay here. Everything was amazing - room, food, pool and sun deck area, staff and the spacious evergreen feel of the whole place. Very central with easy access to Chinatown and other attractions. Very clean and overall a great quality hotel. Overall an amazing place to stay - highly recommended.

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Excellent location in the heart of Singapore. Service from all staff exceptional. Particularly the staff in club lounge. Chef Sylvia produces amazing food for afternoon tea (3 till 5 pm) and cocktail time (6 till 8 pm) Staff Donna, Leslie and Jetrix are on hand to deliver cocktails and various drinks. Stunning views across the city. Spacious rooms, well maintained. Spa and terrace. Vast array of food available in Lines restaurant.

title: Superbly designed hotel in great location
desc: Definitely one of the best designed hotels I have stayed in. Architecturally a marvel with greenery and water feature providing a comfortable and relaxing atmosphere. Front of house service and housekeeping are excellent. Special mention to the concierge team outside the main lobby who are super friendly and efficient. Room amenity and design itself is great. Appreciate the filtered water tap in the room, with comfortable bed and pillow. Breakfast is of good quality with pretty standard Asian and Western fares. Pool and gym facilities are adequate with steam room in the changing room. Some minor point for improvements: - Lighting in room can be a tad brighter as I find it still quite dim at night even when all lights are switched on. - Blackout curtain is slightly

title: Hands down best place to stay!!!
desc: My husband and I have traveled extensively thru the globe and the rooms and breakfast at the ParkRoyal Pickering is second to NONE. We did have a suite and access to the club floor so that definitely helped. The daily breakfast on the club level was extensive and super tasty. Definitely a meal that could carry you long beyond lunch. Also each evening from 6-8 they have a cocktail hour again with extensive dining and drink options that I have never experienced on any other club level floor that we have visited in the past. I was able to try a Singapore Sling here and that was tasty! I would most definitely stay here again and again. It was such a decadent and relaxing experience!

title: A Refreshing Staycation
desc: The hotel is an award winning eco-friendly concept hotel. It is located in Chinatown, next to Chinatown Point and near the Chinatown MRT station. The hotel is within walking distance from Hong Lim Food Centre, which housed many food stalls selling local favourites which are delicious and wallet friendly. The Urban Deluxe room is clean and I like the rustic and stylish feel of the room and the refreshing amenities. The bed and pillows are comfortable. The room has a great view overlooking the Hong Lim Park. Definitely a great place for a short staycation! Had a pleasant surprise when Room Service presented me with a slice of birthday cake, a fruit platter and a birthday card to celebrate my birthday in advance! The selection and quality of food at the Lime Restaurant are

title: A good hotel & manager
desc: When I made a reservation, I recorded that it was my 24th wedding anniversary trip, but I experienced the careful consideration of celebrating it without missing it. It was a pleasant experience. Thank for wine, small cake and celebrating card. Manager Raphael.예약시 결혼 24주년 기념여행임을 기록했는데 이것을 놓치지 않고 축하해주는 세심한 배려를 경험했습니다. 기분 좋은 경험이었습니다. raphael 매니저님 감사합니다.

title: A truly wonderful five-star Singapore experience!
desc: I traveled to Parkroyal Pickering, Singapore on a seven-day business trip... What an incredible experience! From the luxurious, spacious, private rooms (your floor is only accessible by tapping your room card in the elevator), to the wonderful views of Singapore from the various spaces around the hotel (fifth floor has the pool and hidden Garden Walk, which is well worth the visit), I hope to stay in another Parkroyal property very soon. Not to mention, there were wonderful business-class bonuses such as complimentary laundry service and the Club Lounge located on the 16th floor (see pictures). I'd like to draw special attention to Jenisah and Dong, who work in the Lounge. They cared for my group's every need and diligently made every breakfast, tea and cocktail hour a unique,

title: Good
desc: Good service, especially from concierge / baggage service - Aziff Bell Nice room and all facilities were good. Breakfast good but could do better Muslei. Nothing else to add but review won’t post unless I type 200 words!

title: What a waste....
desc: A very beautiful hotel with stunning interals. I would love to give this hotel a 5 stars rating if not for the bad service. Booked in for a Sunday daycation and decided to try out their buffet breakfast. Food selection and restaurant atmosphere is good. However we were brought to our table by a very grouchy lady who seems to be in a hurry to settle us down with our drinks order. When my family member went to the buffet line to show me to one of my favourite food item, the buffet staff suddenly shut the lid of the item in a very abrupt and unwelcoming manner..... When we ask about an empty food item to be refilled, the same staff just gave us a very stern look and said they were all very busy and replied us "can't you wait?" This has totally spoilt our day in the beginning

title: Stunning!
desc: Everything about our stay was fabulous! After a long flight from the UK, the quick and efficient check in was much appreciated. We headed to our large comfortable room and our bags were delivered shortly afterwards. Our room and the whole hotel could not have been more spotless. Loved the environment friendly ethos. Most memorable for me were the stunning plants everywhere. We booked on a recommendation from a friend and we will be recommending to anyone we know heading to Singapore and we look forward to returning.

title: Great food, thoughtful and flavourful
desc: Being a preferred vegetarian while traveling in South East Asia can sometimes be a challenge, especially on an extended business trip. So touched by the chefs at the ParkRoyal Pickering Lime restaurant - both Alfred and Shashi came to my table personally to understand my food preferences. Delighted with the mains they put together each evening, above and beyond the usual stuff on the menu - riot of flavours in fresh food. Great coffee in the room. Pillows can be softer!

title: Event at ParkRoyal Collection Pickering
desc: During roadshow in early year 2022, we were served by Valent (sales director) and after signing the package, we were assigned to Josco (wedding coordinator), we experienced a hard time communicating with them. There are a lot of discrepancies between Valent and Josco words. It seemed to us that the hotel do not have a standardised rules and regulation. Whatever Valent promised and agreed wasn't conveyed to Josco. At that point of time, we felt unfairly treated because it seemed to us that Valent is only doing his job as a salesperson and nothing more, when the sales is "closed", he simply "throw" everything to Josco and did not relay the agreement to Josco. On the other hand, Josco was strictly by the book and made us felt uncomfortable. We felt like a ball getting kicked

title: Great Hotel
desc: Great Hotel. Good value for money. Loved the room and the Club house. The staff were very professional and ex5tremenly helpful. Great staff all-round. I will happily stay her again on my next visit to Singapore.

title: A pleasant and relaxing stay at Park Royal Pickering
desc: We are very happy with our stay there, it is truly environmental friendly, they have water filter in the room which they do not provide bottle water - say no to single use plastics. They have recycle bin in the room. And the entire hotel is decorated with live plants. Besides, the quality of the food and the room service is excellent. The staff and the counter and concierge is very helpful and friendly. And there are lot of good and affordable eatery places just walking distance from the Hotel.

title: Fantastic Hotel and Staff
desc: Due to unexpected circumstances we have just finished a lengthy stay at the fantastic Park Royal Pickering. The hotel is architecturally stunning and features plants and water displays throughout, giving it a calm and relaxing atmosphere. The rooms are stylishly designed with neutral colours and have really comfortable beds. There is a pool and gardens overlooking the city. Food and beverages are excellent, especially the buffets and afternoon teas, which are enjoyed by locals and guests alike. If these are not good enough reasons to visit, then do so to meet and engage with the staff...without exception they are wonderful! They supported me from my first late night return from hospital, through some challenging days and then onto our Singapore adventure. I thank all of you, for

title: Excellent
desc: Staff, room, breakfast etc all excellent. A notable 5 star for the bar staff, who were superb with our 10 year old, entertaining him with cocktail making. Only a few notable downsides…….. Medium downside……The pool was uncomfortably cold, enough that you shivered if not moving around. Minor downside…….The daytime menu at restaurant, burger meal was below average, melted cheese and ham sandwich had mustard in it, which wasn’t stated on menu. All in all, have recommended hotel to everyone, and would love to stay at hotel again

title: Singapore Sing Stop-Over
desc: A first class, ecological hotel, that is very modern but still offers a personalise service. Loved the initiative of filter tap water for drinking, rather than offering complimentary water in plastic bottles! The rooms offer luxurios products, sumptuous pillows & bedding and great city views with terraces of planting all around, just be careful not to have your blinds up, when the gardeners are attending to the plants..the electric blinds will hide your modesty! The pool area was small, for a hotel if it’s size, and it would have been nicer for the terrace to have dining services, rather than eat on our laps, but also to make the most of the city views. All the staff are very friendly and helpful, the most engaging are the bar staff at The Limes Bar, who offer great

title: Beauty, location and solid value
desc: My 14 year old and I stayed at the ParkRoyal Collection Pickering for 3 nights on our first trip to Singapore as a stopover before heading to Vietnam and Cambodia. Although we were on vacation, I upgraded to a Club room for the convenience of breakfast at the hotel. Yes, I know Singapore is known for its affordable hawkers and variety of food, but since we were coming from the US West coast, I wanted to ease our jetlag and make our time in Singapore as enjoyable as possible. This hotel is more beautiful in person than the pictures depict. We were delighted with all the living walls and plants throughout the building. I understand this is a requirement in new buildings in Singapore, but the design and esthetics of this hotel truly provide a "garden of eden" experience. Our room

title: A great stay in Singapore
desc: We stayed at the PARKROYAL during a 3-day visit to Singapore. The hotel is beautiful and well maintained, with excellent service to match. The Club Lounge was excellent both for breakfast and the evening canapés. Our room was clean, well designed and well maintained, with a comfortable bed. My only complaint would be that the pool was far too cold to swim in. It was still a pleasant area to sit around looking out over the city.

title: Perfect location for exploring and beautiful hotel
desc: I really enjoyed my stay at this fabulous hotel. The staff did their best to ensure we had a good experience. I felt the location of hotel was excellent; ideal for exploring, as it is so close to Clarke Quay and ChinaTown, and the MRT is just outside. The breakfast was very good - lots of choice, and service was very good. My only reservations were: 1. The room was very small 2. Storage in the room was limited. I think the room would benefit from some drawers for 2 people to store clothes such as t-shirts, underwear etc. 3. The lighting in our room was quite dark at night which made reading difficult 4. We were woken up by workmen outside and 1 night we were woken up by someone vaccuuming and cleaning in another room 5. The lobby bar was OK but only served 1 draught beer, as

title: Great hotel, great staff.
desc: A fantastic hotel to stay at if you are visiting Singapore for the first time. Interesting architecturally and covered in lush vegetation, you can even do your daily walk around the outside of the fifth floor sheltered from the sun by tropical plants. However the highlight of the hotel for us were the staff. From front of house to housekeeping, customer relations to food and beverage everyone was so helpful and a pleasure to engage with.

title: A master peice
desc: We did not stay here but came to visit the hotel as it is a marvel it self. The green spots at the exterior of the hotel are just breath taking and just lovely. So if you are not even saying here do check it out as it is quite a piece of architecture.

title: Parkroyal Collection Stay
desc: Parkroyal Collection was a dream hotel! From the lush garden surrounding the whole perimeter to the professionalism of their staff. My sister and I came to SG for a quick vacation to see the country and our stay in Parkroyal far exceeded our expectations. Rooms were extremely clean, staff were very courteous and helpful. I remember a day that was raining and staff from reception sent an umbrella for us to use. But I wanted to especially commend Brent (from bellboy service), he was very attentive and very respectful and professional as he helped us with our luggages on check out. He even offered help with booking us a taxi to the airport for my Grab app was giving me troubles. Parkroyal is lucky to have Brent as part of their team. Thank you Brent, thank you Parkroyal Collection

title: Holiday
desc: Excellent hotel . Prime location , courteous staff, wonderful breakfast . Rooms are roomy clean and extremely well stocked . Would highly recommend. We stayed two nights on way to New Zealand and two nights on way back . Both stays were excellent cannot fault this hotel . Their commitment to climate issues and the wonderful planting were an example to all

title: None
desc: Beauty environment. Good service The rooms themselves are spacious, comfortable, and beautifully decorated, with all the amenities you could want for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. The beds are plush and comfortable, and the bathrooms are well-appointed with high-quality toiletries and luxurious rain showers.

title: Thank you Simon, Vasu and Parkroyal Pickering Hotel!
desc: This is my first review for a hotel and it’s fitting for me to write it for Parkroyal Pickering because I have had the absolute best experience in this hotel with my wife. We book this hotel to host our wedding banquet in March 2023 and the entire banquet planning was smooth and enjoyable for us. Overall, I am extremely pleased with the entire experience and will definitely recommend parkroyal Pickering for couples looking to tie the knot. Special shout out to Simon & Vasu, who were our primary account manager and banquet in charge. Both of you made an impact to our lives and we will always remember it and you can consider my spouse and I lifetime customers of this hotel.

title: My stay in the hotel was comfortable and nice. Thanks!
desc: I got to the hotel at around 9:40 in the morning on Feb, 6 . There were many people here. I was waiting in the line to do check-in about half an hour. During check-in the receptionist told me that I should give 500 S$ deposit and I can get the key-card to the room from 15:00. It was a surprise for me because in all my previous trips (a lot) I almost always got the room keys as soon as possible and earlier than the official check-in hour. I had 2 flights, both at night, so I didn’t sleep enough and I was very tired. I didn’t have a choice and sat on the sofa in the lobby trying to sleep until 14:30. At 14:30 I waited in the line to the reception again and finally at exactly 15:00 I entered into my room. I ordered Collection Club Lifestyle King room and I asked for a bathtub. I

title: Sustainable style with substance
desc: I’d read about the property in magazines given its eco credentials so when the opportunity to stay came, I was keen to explore. Not only is the sustainability present but the service was friendly and knowledgeable. The team at the lounge (inc Jenisah, Donna, Dang, Terry and chef Michael) all greeted me with warmth and looked after me well. I can also recommend the spa treatments (Jasmine). Looking forward to visiting again.

title: Holidays
desc: Services was great, Brent really great servicing guests, he's been non stop accommodating tourist from giving city info navigation to little room services treats. Location was perfect to get into different towns with just a few minutes walk to mrt , bus stops and big bus infront. Highly recommended. Lovely place.

title: Singapore stay
desc: Excellent place to stay. Very clean and daily housekeeping is observed. Staff are professional and very accommodating especially Mr Brent. He always greets us with a big smile and provides recommendations when asked. Also, Mr David [ Front Desk ] assisted in keeping our family in close proximity with each other.

title: Singapore recovery
desc: A wonderful atmosphere, great rooms, friendly and professional personnel, well located. Would recommend to anyone. We had the benefit of the Club floor which was wonderful. We will certainly stay again when next in Singapore. Competitively priced and luxurious facilities.

title: Average experience
desc: not worth the price when you get a room which doesn't meet your reservation request. no city view as announced on the site big hotel, you feel anonymous very good breakfast offer pool is nice but very busy and water is cold

title: Excellent Location
desc: Loved the hotel and thought the location was excellent for getting around the city. Enjoyed the greenery at the hotel and relaxing pool. Issue with refrigerator was dealt with quickly. Thanks for a great stay!

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: We LOVED our stay. Staff was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. The food was fantastic! The room had a great view of the city. It was clean and bright. We had such a great time in Singapore and our hotel stay was a major part of that. The location was so close to the MRT, restaurants and shopping. Their service went above and beyond My husband forgot his phone in the lobby as we left for the airport. Everyone was so incredible about helping him retrieve it!

title: 10/10 stay at this beautiful hotel
desc: The hotel is in a great location, easy walking distance from nearby stations, shops, restaurants and the river/city. The hotel setting/architecture and amenities are fantastic and the staff/service was exceptional. We highly recommend Parkroyal as a place to stay and would love to stay again.

title: TWO NIGHT STAY
desc: What a lovely experience we had in this first class hotel The staff are so professional and friendly Food was excellent in the Lime Restaurant. Only went to the Garden on 5th floor on the morning of our check out. Never seen anything like it was great. Definitely recommend this hotel

title: Birthday stay
desc: Super service for a memorable birthday stay. Despite a computer system breakdown, the staff were clearly trying their best and gave alternatives even at greater effort to themselves! Check in was prompt, rooms and furnishings were clean, food and drink was superb.

title: Great hotel, great staff.
desc: We really enjoyed our stay. Wonderful hotel, with a great staff. Our only complaint is with the restaurant management. We had dinner twice and breakfast twice. We don't like buffets, so we were ala carte diners, which apparently made us second-class citizens in the eyes of the hosts. Each time they tried to seat us in the back even after we asked for a window table, of which plenty were available. We would stay there again, but we would avoid the restaurant. We didn't feel we were treated very well by the hosts, though the waitstaff were fine. Service was slow, as well, though we were advised that might be the case and we chose to stay anyway.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Overall very good experience. Hotel is beautiful without too much fuss. Rooms are big, neatly organised and clean. Bedding of very quality. Breakfast with a large choice of quality food. Staff is friendly and helpful.

title: Spectacular green views all around
desc: This hotel is spectacular. You are surrounded by greenery everywhere. The pool/gym area is peaceful and absolutely amazing. The suite has the best views of the contoured gardens. The buffet breakfast is delicious. Staff are friendly. Judy, the guest relations and loyalty manager is extremely resourceful and professional. She went beyond and above to make us feel valued. We truly enjoyed our stay and can’t wait to be back in the near future.

title: NoBeautiful Hotel centrally located
desc: Staff excellent - always smiling and helpful. Loved spending time in the pool and Spa. Food in Club Lounge excellent - afternoon tea, evening cocktails and snacks. Spa treatment was amazing. Room facilities excellent.

title: Lovely hotel in Singapore
desc: An excellent hotel, so well run and the staff are so friendly and helpful. Rooms are very spacious and clean, the bed was so comfortable. The breakfast selection is truly amazing and certianly spoilt for choice. We went in February and returned in March, both stays were superb.

title: Absolutely beautiful hotel!
desc: Absolutely beautiful hotel. Inside and outside. Rooms were very nice and spacious and offer a great view! Breakfast was delicious with a wide variety of choices. Dinner was a bit exepnsive. Room service menu had limited choices for kids. Swimming pool is an absolute must do while staying here. The view and the design are amaing to see. Staff always friendly and helpful recommending best was to get around in the city.

title: Happy experience !!
desc: I was comfortable and grateful during my stay. The staff was friendly and the garden was relaxing. I want to stay at this hotel when I visit Singapore to attend my graduation ceremony in May. Thanks!! I look forward to seeing you again!!

title: Cosy place
desc: Very good service, come for the second time .. love the club lounge food especially the satay and laksa during my first stay .. unfortunately my second visit they don’t serve the laksa .. hope to have it as permanent dish … a cosy place to relax and Love the cocktail as well !!

title: Unforgettable and Memorable Birthday Staycation 2023
desc: I recently stayed at Park Royal Collection Pickering Singapore and had an absolutely fantastic experience thanks to the amazing staff. Jetrix, Shirley, Dennis, and Jonathan went above and beyond to make my stay memorable and enjoyable. During my stay with my bestie and we went to the the lounge, they surprised me with a birthday cake and a lovely song, which was a thoughtful gesture that made my day even more special. They truly went out of their way to make me feel welcome and cared for. Overall, the hotel itself was beautiful and luxurious, with stunning architecture and a serene atmosphere. The rooms were spacious, comfortable, and clean, with all the amenities I needed for a relaxing stay. But what really stood out to me was the exceptional service provided by the staff,

title: Beautiful eco hotel with friendly Singaporean team
desc: A besutiful hotel, Clever eco features Delightful, friendly staff team Delicious variety of food excellent rooms - large, clean, and great views Great location Excellent venue for personal and/or business trip.

title: Lovely stay, great service, great concierge
desc: What a fantastic hotel - plastic free, wonderful service, beautiful facilities and rooms and especially the concierge Mr. Nizman... he arranged my tour of the city, gave me local advice on where to get the best satay sauce and couldn't do enough for me. I will definitely stay here again when next in Singapore.

title: Great stay for our family
desc: This hotel was amazing. We would rate it as the best we have stayed in. The Hotel has excellent amenities and is in a prime location, being close to Chinatown, MRT and local shops. Unfortunately on paying our final bill we realised that we were not paying the rate we were quoted, but more. We were disappointed in this as we had 3 rooms booked and paid for, staying for 7 nights, and so as you can imagine it was quite a large amount of money. We also were GHA members, but did not receive the discount.

title: Great Location Near Chinatown and MRT
desc: The ParkRoyal Pickering came highly recommended and did not disappoint. We upgraded to a suite on the 13th floor and it was perfect! Great view of the city skyscape and the buildings vegetation. Large spacious and aesthetically stunning; all the suite spaces were spacious; really great night blinds and comfortable bed and pillows with plenty of plugs and all the required amenities, although a few more USB plugs would have been useful. Suites also came with two for pieces of laundry each day; in by 10am and they were always back the same day. Water filter tap saves on the need for plastic water bottles! We loved the club lounge and enjoyed our breakfasts, afternoon tea and cocktails each day in there. Enough selection and it varied each day. Staff were very attentive.

title: Friendly 5 star
desc: Such a friendly hotel, the staff were very welcoming - particularly Nizman on the concierge desk. It is also a top quality place to stay and the bed was so comfortable. Loved all the greenery, so refreshing in a City location.

title: Looking forward to visiting again!
desc: Great hotel and great people! I would definitely recommend it! Extraordinary architecture! Great service! Also the Lime restaurant was an excellent choice for having dinner! Overall I am really satisfied and would definitely return

title: A top class Singapore Hotel
desc: We had a wonderful stay at this centrally located hotel. The garden design is amazing and the rooms are spacious and comfortable. The staff were welcoming and helpful and the dining facilities are excellent. Everyone went the extra mile to ensure that we enjoyed our stay in Singapore and we highly recommend.

title: My go-to for business trips
desc: My go-to for business trips: The hotel is conveniently located, the beds are comfy, the food is decent and the amenities are good too. The staff is also helpful from check in all the way to checkout. Easy to recommend

title: Exceptional service
desc: Great hotel - exceptional service. The restaurant was very good and the pool a great spot out of the heat. The breakfast buffet was amazing as was dinner. The bar staff were friendly but professional

title: Would stay again and highly recommend
desc: Beautiful building, comfortable, clean, with excellent facilities. The staff are very nice and helpful. Excellent location with easy walking access to the best Singapore had to offer. Overall, I had an amazing time there. Will stay again and will recommend to others.

title: Book this Amazing Hotel!
desc: My husband and I traveled to Singapore from the United States, and we wanted to stay in a luxury hotel. ParkRoyal was a perfect fit for us. We arrived earlier than the 3pm check-in time, but the hotel was able to get our room ready by 12pm (thank you!!!). The Pickering location was perfect for us, since it’s right by a metro station and located in/near Chinatown. We were collection club guests and we found it was worth it. Breakfast had a lot of options and it was delicious food. The outdoor pool, garden areas, and enclosed gym were very nice to be in and we used them each morning. We have been out-on-the-town each day so far, so we haven’t had a chance to participate in tea time or the complimentary cocktails in the evening. Having the complimentary 2-item laundry option has

title: Nice and friendly staff
desc: Nice hotel. Especially the greens exterior, makes it one of the most Instagramable hotel in SG. Our room was ok, nothing to complaints. But another highlight was the club lounge that serving free flow snacks and booze every afternoon, definitely worth to try. Not to mention, the staff were very friendly and accommodating, one of them was Brent. He helped me to get my Grab before i left the hotel, and we had a nice conversation in front of the lobby

title: Amazing service
