desc: The staff here are amazing! So friendly and thoughtful. The facilities are great - the whole place was beautiful! I was on a business trip during my birthday, and I got back to my room after work to a lovely birthday cake. So thoughtful.

title: Hotel quite spectacular with all the layers of planting - A Green Oasis in the CBD.
desc: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel in Singapore. We both enjoyed our stay and found it restful especially after a long flight. The breakfast was first class with great selection. The room was very comfortable. The overall hotel layout was spacious and modern and the planting fabulous. The pool area so restful surrounded by the city buzz.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Beautiful hotel in a great location in Chinatown. The room was modern, spacious and very clean. Concierge was extremely helpful and assisted with any questions we had. The pool area was gorgeous, although I did not actually go into the water. I would definitely stay here again if travelling back to Singapore.

title: Hotel in the middle of Chinatown
desc: Fantastic hotel in a great location right next to Chinatown Mall with easy access to two MRT lines. The hotel staff were very friendly and welcoming when we arrived and this was the "norm" for the whole of our stay. I would like to especially thank Brent from the Concierge/Bellboy desk for all his help in the week we were there. The rooms are comfortable and well appointed, the beds are very comfortable and we had a great night sleep each night. The hotel itself is beautiful with lush green zones.

title: Special
desc: I don't do reviews. So something special has to happen for me to break that habit. And something special did. Or rather, someone did. He is called Aziff Bell. And he made our day. We've had a tricky few weeks. He doesn't know how much his effort meant to us Respect. Ian

title: Magical stay
desc: Magical stay, all too short due to it only being for one night. The hotel’s design and garden walk is a destination unto itself. At checkin, we were taken care of by Samuel, who noted our honeymoon and made an exception to allow for a late checkout and some other goodies. Our room had an amazing view of Singapore’s skyline toward the east and packed with little features like a double access bathroom and automatic blinds. Breakfast was solid but a bit hectic. Location is unbeatable with easy access to a number of bus lines.

title: None
desc: Beautiful hotel, love the architecture and easier access to malls and food eatery. The pool has fantastic view and rooms are suitable space. With early arrival at the hotel, we were able to checked in early and left our luggage in the reception area and do some sightseeing while rooms are getting ready. Our luggage was in our room as soon as we came back. Highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Singapore.

title: Excellent concierge
desc: The concierge was excellent, especially Brent. He’s always cheerful, polite, very helpful and assisted us with getting the maxi cab for my parents which are on wheelchairs. There’s a slide at both entrance of the hotel for wheelchairs. The facility is also nice with a great swimming pool and a state of the art 24 hour gym.

title: only one word, exceptional.
desc: It is a fantastic Hotel, we were for 4 nights, the best place for whom like to take professional photos, when we are there many brides and grooms come to take their photos. It was my birthday and they surprised me by preparing a chocolate cake with a greeting card in our room.

title: Nice hotel with a central location
desc: We had a room at the 14th floor with views towards the park and the plantations on the terrace. Overall experience very satisfying, incl beds, bathroom, breakfast and the fact that the hotel is very quiet despite its central location. Perhaps nothing really stands out though, given the price point.

title: Short stop over in Singapore, loved the hotel and services. Rooms good size and great views of the green outdoor.
desc: Great location, within walking distance to Chinatown and Marina. The rooms are spacious and great decor. A pleasant and relaxing stay sraff at the reception very helpful. The pool looked inviting but we did have no time to spend in the water.

title: Parkroyal Collection Pickering
desc: We came in past 7 o’clock in the evening from our international flight to check in at Parkroyal Collection Pickering. Shane at the front desk was very understanding and caring; she was very professional all the way and showed excellent customer care. She made sure our stay was extraordinary and to date, this is the most memorable and best Singapore stay for our family. We are also telling everyone we know about our stay at Parkroyal Collection Pickering because of its commitment to an eco-friendly environment and friendly community. The whole staff is very patient, approachable, and fantastic as well. If I could give the hotel 10 stars, I would.

title: Poor service for a 5-star hotel
desc: The service was very underwhelming from the front desk to dining staff. Overall did not feel recognized as a guest. When we returned to our hotel room around 2:30pm, we found the room not cleaned and had to ask for the room to be cleaned. The dining staff were not super friendly and felt like we were a bother. The reason I selected this hotel was for the location. However, other than that and a nice pool, the stay was very unpleasant. It’s efficient if you’re traveling for business. However, for leisure, you want to have a nice and enjoyable stay. I’d rather stay at a boutique hotel with better service. Do not recommend.

title: Gorgeous hotel & great to be able to use facilities before flying
desc: We really enjoyed our stay, rooms very comfortable and quiet and environmental focus was great. The breakfast buffet was fabulous, so much variety and delicious. Thank you for allowing your guests to use the pool and showers after check out. It was a lifesaver after exploring all day to have a shower before going to airport - thank you ❤️

title: Amazing hotel with a luxurious feel
desc: From the curbside drop off, to the lobby, to the pool and the rooms, it felt very nice, clean, and beautiful. Amazing and unique hotel design and everyone will be jealous of you once you show them pictures of the hotel. The only disagreement was our check in concierge said that our reservation was for a 1 king bed, rather than what we thought was a 2 twin bed reservation. After we reluctantly accepted the fact that there were no other available 2 bed rooms, we found out that our room actually did have 2 beds that were just slid together. Luckily, housekeeping was able to split the two beds separately and bring us extra blankets. After that, everything was great.

title: Good location!
desc: Check in and out was very smooth and efficacy. The staff at the reception is very friendly and answered all my questions that i bought up. Was upgraded to a suite, thanks! The room was clean and neat. Everything is just perfect for me to recharge.

title: Beautiful hotel and great staff
desc: Went for the weekend lunch buffet with my family. The hotel and resto interiors is elegant and very pleasant. However, good thing we had the buffet at a big discount as it could have been better, some dishes like the softshell crab is a bit too salty and the laksa (paste) might have a burnt ingredient a bit bitter. Other than that, their hotel staff are very welcoming and helpful. Special thanks to the Filipina Lime staff who welcomed us at the resto entrance and prepped our seats. And to hotel staff Brent, who went the extra mile to provide assistance to us while we were resting at the hotel reception after eating. Hope to be back soon for a staycation at this beautiful hotel!

title: Excellent stay and service during our wedding celebration!
desc: Superb service from booking, logistics and during our stay. We arranged for a lunch reception for our wedding and the entire experience was just so smooth. It’s remarkable how each and every of the hotel’s associate makes us feel so welcomed! Special thanks to Sherlene and Stella from Reservations, Nizman, Brent and Syahir from Concierge, Derick, Rhelee, Joanne, Amy and Sous Chef Shashi from Lime Restaurant! Thank you all for all your hospitality on our special day!

title: Amazing stay at this fantastic hotel in Singapore
desc: I really enjoyed staying at the hotel. The staff was very welcoming and professional. The room was well-designed and spacious. The hotel is well designed and includes a lot of green plants on the roof tops, downstairs etc. It really creates a sense of calm and serenity.

title: Extraordinary people
desc: I have had the pleasure of staying at The Park Royal Collection Pickering in Singapore a number of times this past couple of years. Apart from the greenery throughout the hotel, the staff are truly outstanding. From those in Lime, to the business lounge, to sales each and every person I have met has left a lasting impression. Special thanks to Shirley, Ana, Donna, Dennis, Jetrix, Sylvia, Yong Chee, Dong Hao, Janisa and Lynn. Thx so much folks.

title: Good overall experience
desc: Slightly dim room lighting. Otherwise stay is comfortable. The staff is very welcoming. The breakfast has good options. The location is very central with china town and a mall right adjacent to the hotel.

title: Highly recommend this fabulous hotel!
desc: Gorgeous hotel in convenient location, between Clarke Quay & Chinatown. Wonderful staff - so friendly & helpful. Clean, well designed rooms with amazingly comfortable beds! Loved this hotel and will definitely stay again. The pool area is a great place to relax pre or post check in.

title: Excellent stay with family
desc: Had a great stay for one week. The hotel is calm and modern retreat in busy city. Great location, walked to lots of nice places for dinner. Breakfast buffet was good and all staff very friendly and helpful, Brent in lobby was super friendly. Right next to Chinatown Plaza with lots of food options and supermarket. We used Grab to get everywhere and nothing was too far, but hotel also very close to MRT. Thanks for a great stay.

title:
Phenomenal
Hotel at an excellent location with great amenities.
desc: Excellent hotel, fantastic pool, amazing jungle like rooms and friendly staff. Bicycles free of charge for the guests were a plus! The hotel is in a brilliant location next to Chinatown so you can walk and explore the areas, shops and temples ;) Must must must !

title: Great location and service
desc: Great full service hotel. Excellent location right next to China town and easy access to buses and subway. Don’t miss out in the wonderful lol. Rich breakfast buffet. Love the infinity pool. . Will be happy to stay again —————————————————-

title: Wonderful hotel and staff!
desc: Absolutely perfect! The rooms, proximity and staff, one of the nicest places we have stayed on our travels over the years. I must mention Anna, Jetrix and Dennis, thank you for making our stay truly memorable. Nothing is too much from those that make up the rooms, hail a taxi, it all adds to the experience. We celebrated our 20th Wedding Anniversary in style…thanks again.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Excellent, we had a three night stay in a garden/city room. The room was fantastic and had amazing views. The breakfast was a real treat and the service was first class. The green Infrastructure was so inspiring and is a popular photo opportunity for passing visitors. Singapore is a worth while trip and we had a wonderful exploring. Also the airport and Jewel are outs of this world. Singapore just know how to do things right!

title: Gorgeous rooms and excellent service! Our favorite hotel in Singapore!
desc: Our favorite hotel in Singapore, and that says a lot considering we're Singaporeans! Excellent service from the staff, and Jasmine at the spa is a very skilled therapist. The rooms and architecture of the place is gorgeous too. 😍

title: Exceptional Service
desc: Excellent service in every aspect. Exceptional service in every aspect. The price is almost the same as the four-star hotel in the neighbourhood, but the service is exceptionally high. The staff will welcome you all the time regardless time of the day.

title: "A Must-Visit Hotel in Singapore: Impressive Architecture and Eco-Friendly Initiatives"
desc: Visited this hotel and was blown away by the stunning architecture and eco-friendly initiatives. Friendly staff and a beautiful garden make this a must-visit hotel in Singapore. Unfortunately we didn't get the chance to stay here. We will definetly try to book st this hotel for our next visit to Singapore.

title: Do it, just go there and enjoy what it offers.
desc: The word awesome does not do justice to the staff and what the Parkroyal on Pickering delivers. From the moment we walked in until our departure we were treated like long standing VIPs. Nothing was too much trouble and in fact the staff went out of their way to make our stay more pleasant and efficient.

title: Top class servcie and facilities - a must stay place
desc: We stayed in one of the Orchid Club Collection rooms - as we do each time we go to Singapore and as usual the quality of the room, facilities, services and staff could not be better. A very special vote of thanks to Donna, Jetrix, Jenisah, Ana,Dong, Raja, Brent, Aung, Sylivia and the 'naughty boy' all of whom made our stay comfortable and most enjoyable. This is not a cheap hotel but it is value for money, and in our opinion the only place to stay when visiting Singapore.

title: Lovely staff
desc: Beautiful hotel in a great location! Raja helped us with our bags when we got there and showed us around our room and the amenities. He was so kind and knowledgeable it was a great intro to Singapore! Upon our departure Brent helped us during check out and gave us some great tips on local travel and navigating the airports with our luggage. Everyone was so lovely! Will be back again!

title: A great nights sleep
desc: Great location. Comfy beds. Very clean. Nice staff. Love the eco conscience at this hotel. Buffet breakfast fit for a king. Or a Queen. All very delicious. Cool layout in the rooms that maximise the space. My third stay here in 6 months. I’ll be back!!

title: Supreme stay, highly recommend
desc: The service is outstanding, and exceeded my expectations. really enjoyed the stay, the infinite pool, the breakfast, and the overall experience is supreme!!! Stayed with my mom, and the staff helped me and my mom greatly to find the right room. Thanks a lot. Would highly recommend, and would like to try out all other park royal hotels as well. PS: compare with my stay in Marina Sands hotel, would say, this one is really with 6 star service!!! (paid double price, close to 1000$sgd for a room at marina sands, but very disappointed.)

title: Fantastic Hotel, and they look after the environment as best they can
desc: This is a fantastic hotel, I have to say that of all the hotels I have stayed in all over the world, this is my favorite. The staff make this hotel with thought a doubt. The rooms are spacious and well laid out. Lime restaurant is fantastic. a couple of hours relaxing in the Club Loung rounds off a busy day in Singapore wonderfully.

title: A green hotel highly recommended
desc: A hotel like a botanic garden. Great service with very friendly staff, quiet and clean room, extensive food selections! Truly recommended. Wish the light options are easier to figure out in the room though, had some difficulties to turn off the lights underneath tables, but no big deal.

title: Great stay .... we'll be back
desc: Shirley, Jetrix, Ana and Donna in the COLLECTION Club Lounge were amazing ambassadors for the hotel. Nothing was a problem. There was a little "issue" at breakfast one morning and Shirley, in particular, went out of her way to ensure that everything was OK. She really went above and beyond. We had a great experience in the Club Lounge and have to thank Shirley and her team for making that happen. By the way, the watermelon juice at breakfast was absolutely "delicious" ;-)

title: A wonderful hotel
desc: This is a fabulous hotel. So green, both in its credentials and its physical appearance. The exterior is surrounded by planting making the view from your room, super special. The room is stylish and modern with a dividing wall separating the bedroom and bathroom. Privacy isn’t a problem if you slide this wall when needed. Breakfast is amazing, food from different cultures being represented. All tasty. I particularly liked the changing station, one day Japanese, one day local Singapore cuisine etc. We particularly enjoyed the infinity pool, again surrounded by greenery but overlooking the city. The whole hotel is just very attractive. Transport links were good with metro stations close by. We can thoroughly recommend this hotel if staying in Singapore.

title: Wedding Celebration at Parkroyal Pickering
desc: We had our wedding lunch celebration at Parkroyal Pickering on May 28, 2023 and our experience was stress-free, pleasant, exciting and memorable. Our sales manager Jasline is helpful, patient and responsive. She handled our requests professionally and advise us on a lot of of our inquires/questions leading up to our big day! Thank you Jasline. Also, Jason the banquet manager for that day, was not only professional but also helpful. He walked us through the whole event which made our wedding celebration smooth and enjoyable. Thank you Jason and the banquet team. Thank you Parkroyal Collection Pickering for a beautiful wedding and we had a blast!

title: Fantastic overnight stay in Singapore.
desc: We had a fantastic stay. My wife and infant were travelling to New Zealand and wanted a stay to break up the journey. Hotel is clean and well kept, lots of greenery. Good location and can walk to both chinatown and the marina with ease. Excellent restaurant on site and great breakfast. Most importantly the staff went to great lengths to make sure the whole family were looked after, including helping check us in early. Would stay again!

title: Beautiful hotel and very good house keeping staff, with a few problems.
desc: My visit was almost two months ago so this review is long overdue. My husband and I stayed in early May 2023. Pro: 1. The lay out of our Lifestyle Premier King Room was modern and efficient; 2. Room is super clean; 3. House keeping staff was very helpful. We were sick at the last couple days of our stay and she patiently explained all the stuffs that help, boil water for us, clean everything, etc; Made us feel at home; 4. The free coffee and teabags provided in the room are famous and top brand, excellent quality. (We are picky tea drinkers); 5. Comfortable mattress and luxury beddings, just like the 5 stars hotels; 6. The building design is really one of a kind, beautiful, as seen online; 7. Just 5 minutes walk to the heart of Chinatown. About 10 minutes walk to very good

title: The best place to stay in Singapore
desc: The staff in both the Lime bar and the Business lounge on the 16th floor were absolutely stellar. Myself and both of my sons were looked after like family. We stayed in the hotel for 6 weeks, and by the end it was difficult to leave! Yogesh and Suren (probably spelled wrong; apologies) looked after me and any friends with me in the Lime bar most evenings. Jetrix, Ana, Donna, and Sylvia (again, don't count on my spelling!) were so attentive while we ate 2 to 3 meals a day on the 16th floor; they always had whatever I needed to me before I even thought to ask for it! Everyone there was also so helpful with recommendations on where to go with my sons that we were never short of fabulous day plans. And also, of course, the hotel itself is fabulous. Phenomenal room service, gorgeous

title: Warm-hearted staff
desc: It features clean room, delicious breakfast, comfortable bed, wonderful view, eco-friendly exterior and etc. It provided me with early check in, late check out and securing luggage service. That were all complimentary. The most important thing was that the unknown staff helped to find my dad who is not good at finding a place. A bellman and James Hary who are a warm-hearted said me it was their job, but I knew it was my business. You just put the case in the hands of Singapore Police Force. You did not have to bring translator because of my bad English, to pay taxi fee and to provide free porridge. But you provided them all for me. I am really sorry to bother each of you and really appreciate your dedication. I have never forgot your kindness and sincerity. I hope to see you

title: Stunning and comfortable
desc: I can't fault this hotel, everything was perfect. The room was well designed and with details that matter like a decent hair dryer with a cord that actually reaches a view of the mirror. Actually this is rare. Anything we asked for they provided. The pool and gym were outstanding. Brent on concerrige was particularly helpful.

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: Amazing hotel, great reception, staff are so welcoming ... it feels like an outdoor spa ... live plants, super clean, everyone is working non stop but always a smile and a hello .. I would stay here again and again!!

title: Excellent.
desc: The Parkroyal on Pickering is worth a visit for just its novel and creative architecture. Also the wide use of greenery to create a unique ambience. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. The swimming pool is large and very pleasant. The breakfast buffet is varied and the staff overall are very helpful. We enjoyed our stay would return at any time for another visit.

title: Awesome dinner buffet and excellent service
desc: My family and I had a great Mother's Day celebration at the Lime restaurant. Special thanks to Ms Aesa who was very helpful, attentive and served with smile which made our dining experience a pleasant one. Thanks!

title: Clean & great location
desc: Excellent location, nice reception staff and welcome. We had a corner suite which overlooked the park. There is no bath in this room but it was super comfortable and spacious. You can easily walk to China Town from this hotel. The hotel has an excellent concierge team who are super helpful and efficient. The hotel was very kind in giving us a 2pm check out. The breakfast was excellent. Bar coverage was minimal and we had to wait for a Barman to return from somewhere to order a drink but that was a small thing, just comparing to the amount of staff at the front desk areas which were plentiful. We both enjoyed our stay here. It is a very big and business like hotel so whilst there was nothing wrong we might seek somewhere with a little more soul in the future. The pool area was

title: Exceeding expectations
desc: Thoughtful service! We have recently planned a wedding at the hotel and have booked several rooms for our guests. All the rooms (including our bridal suite) exceeded our expectations and we love the in room distilled water tap, such a great initiative. Will be back for our future anniversary stays!

title: Back again to Park Royal Pickering! Right next to my favourite food center
desc: Second time back to this hotel. Great location, right next to local food court, accessible for local shops and food. Spacious room with good view of the park. Love the pool, and lots of green around the hotel. Should consider upgrade in- room tech facilities; speed up check in service. And offer a more private place for drinks/ coffee.

title: Fantastic hotel Singapore!
desc: The hotel was top notch! Beautiful, fantastic location and very well appointed. Staff was friendly and very accommodating. Would stay here again in a minute! The location is close to all of the sights and easily walkable!

title: Stunning resort for a quiet getaway
desc: We stayed at this property last week on our anniversary/husband's birthday trip. We had originally thought of staying at the Marina Bay Sands, but we thought the location of this property would be better and we're so glad we made that choice. The location of this property is perfect and the property itself is incredible. We will stay here every time. Our room was spacious and comfortable and had great views of the city and garden terraces. The overall property was well maintained and beautiful. The garden walk was an unexpected experience that I didn't know about until we arrived. And the pool was so relaxing! We had breakfast included and the buffet was expansive and delicious. Maybe not as good as the local hawker market foods, but for a hotel breakfast buffet it was

title: green hotel in singapore
desc: Very nice Hotel - extremely friendly and helpul staff - clean and comfortable interiour - quite greenish with nice pool area and view - fitness facilities are above average with a nice view (same view as pool) - would love to come again

title: Great business+vacation stay
desc: Amazing stay at Park Royal on Pickering. The Signature Exécutive Room was perfect, good size and great views. 5th floor (but the first floor is already very high). The lobby was very pleasant. The pool was one of the best I’ve ever seen in a « in town » hotel: beautiful + stunning view. Last but not least, it’s possible to swim - I mean the pool is quite big and it’s very much appreciable. In addition, everybody was really nice and helpful. Special thanks to 1/ the concierge (we stayed May 17-May 21), 2/ the doorman who helped us finding taxis. Both were very smily and particularly efficient. They were on duty on May 21st around 7:30 when we left. Thank you again.

title: Amazing building close to downtown
desc: Good location. Excellent service. Pretty cool building. Hard to operate light switches. Nice rooms although not that big. Good bathroom.good wifi. Loved the exec Lounge on 16. Room always too cold.

title: Professional, friendly staff! Great hotel!
desc: Excellent hotel! Very professional and friendly staff, particularly Raphael at front desk, Janesa at Club and Faidzul at concierge. Would certainly stay again. Ask for the Club option, which gives access to 16th floor private dining room with tremendous view for breakfast, afternoon tea and evening. Well worth it. Staff amazing! Thank you!

title: PP on Pickering it’s Perfect!
desc: Super comfortable as ever - love the hotel! Conveniently placed for the hawker markets, Clarke Quay, Marina Bay Sands & shops etc. Staff are amazing - big thanks to Vik on security for all his help.

title: Wonderful green hotel-a must in Singapore
desc: I was extremely happy with my stay! I could not find any faults at all. The hotel staff were all excellent, really friendly and very helpful. The food was so good and the extra attention the detail (like my birthday cake on my birthday) was so special. I stayed at the hotel during a conference in Singapore during May. I booked the hotel through a third party service offered by the hotel and not through the hotel but I was treated like a VIP throughout my stay. The room was large and very clean. It had everything I needed and although I was a little concerned the the shower was going to flood the bathroom, it never it! I stayed in a room in the collection club levels with access to the collection club lounge (for cocktails and high tea everyday) and the views themselves are

title: Memorable Wedding in a Botanical Paradise
desc: My wife and I had our wedding on 21st May. We chose Parkroyal Collection Pickering because it was really aesthetic - the hotel exterior, interior ballroom and suites were exactly the theme that we wanted (botanical) However, we were blown away by the service. Never in our wildest dreams, we are so amazed by the level of service and detail. Way better than what the international chains can provide (Marriott, Hilton, IHG has much to learn on what true service is) Firstly, my wedding file was a handed down file. As such, I did not have much expectations as handover files generally do not have that original relationship. Simon completely removed that stigma; he was prepared (always on the ball), personable,but more importantly paid so much attention to our guest preferences -

title: Nice pool, great staff
desc: Great stay with my wife and two teens. Vik from the security was very helpfull with the storage for our lugagges and ordering the taxi to the airport. Hotel is very clean. The pool on the 5th is fun with a fantastic view. Staff very friendly and competent.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Went with my family, service from the front desk is good and thereafter the service for the room is excellent as Mr ang is nice and help us with the needs we needed during the stay and the in room dining food is nice as we have it for both our night during our stay

title: Doesn't do justice what you pay for
desc: Booked a city view and got a room which had view of another room in front, spa timing are very off, food at restaurant is average. Stuff is professional but the money you pay you can easily get good options in nearby hotels

title: Outstanding stay at Parkroyal Pickering - Highly recommend.
desc: Wonderful stay at the Parkroyal Pickering. The property is fantastic and beautiful, and the service is even better. Everyone at the hotel was quite helpful, professional and welcoming. In particular want to thank Jenisah for outstanding service and helpfulness. I would definitely recommend and thank the staff at Parkroyal Pickering for a great visit.

title: Unique location, clean and relaxed place, excellent staff
desc: Excellent location, very beautiful place, green and relaxed. Nice, very clean and quiet room. Super extensive breakfast buffet (continental, asian, fresh fruits and so on). Super helpful and friendly staff. Special thanks to Raja, who always welcomed us with a big smile and did not hesitate to help us with anything we asked. Was very carefully with our stuff and showed all of the room functions and tips and tricks.

title: Always Look Forward
desc: As if like 2nd home, always look forward to return. Precisely because of service oriented staff, comprehensive facilities and meals being served during the stay cation. One can easily occupied in hotel whether to laze / swim at the pool workout in the gym and having meal or drink in the Parkroyal Collections Club Lounge. Or outside hotel, one can easily access to different and varied F & B outlets. shopping mall, public transport. One is really spoiled for choices to do anything. Specially mention and applaud the following staff who made the staycation comfortable and satisfied. Director of Operations : Jamie Rooms Division Manager : Jon Front Desk : Judy, Samuel, Rapheal Lime Restaurant : Leslie Yap, Twinkle, Arianne and Chef Louis Collections Club Lounge : Janeisa, Dong

title: A great, green hotel experience
desc: Amazing architecture and the wall of gardens across several levels. We stayed in one of the Premier Rooms on the 6th floor looking out to a terrace of shrubs and trees. The rooms were large, clean and comfortable, with striking views across the city, as you'd expect in a classy hotel. We enjoyed the infinity pool and the gazebos scattered around the pool area. Also must mention that its located within a 3 min walk to the Chinatown MRT station. Can't speak highly enough of this particular ParkRoyal Hotel. My only suggestion for improvement would be to consider a greater variety of hot meals in the breakfast buffet.

title: Very hard to better this hotel !
desc: This would have to be one of the nicest hotels I have ever stayed with. Every staff member I came in contact with went out of their way to assist me and treat me as a special guest. The hotel itself is magnificent and clearly shows its commitment to the environment. The design of the hotel and the room that we stayed in is excellent. It's not an 'ordinary ' hotel, it's special.

title: Go for Club Collection, check room privacy (glass bathroom)
desc: I spent three nights in a 14th-floor Collection Club room during a business trip. Spotless accommodation, great staff everywhere. However, I was surprised by the full-glass bathroom concept including the toilets. OK, you can enjoy the garden view from the loo. In my opinion, not a great advantage with gardener spotting, or a drone filming the hotel from outside (the hotel warns guests, though). Better to check this kind of structure meets your needs. I was also somehow disappointed by Lime restaurant (noisy, crowdy). Otherwise, I strongly recommend Club Collection perks. Excellent lounge, quiet, with a large choice of food and drinks. The 2 daily free pieces of laundry proved most useful. All worth the extra money. Would I return? Yes!

title: Relaxing stay and great service at Park Royal Collection
desc: Fantastic relaxing stay in a club collection suite. The hotel is full of greenery and calm music which makes the whole place feel like a spa. The club lounge food and drinks plus city views are worth the upgrade. We were helped by Felicia at check in and thought the service was generally too notch. The infinity swimming pool is also worth mentioning - small but feels a bit like the Marina Bay Sands in style.

title: Oasis in the heart o Singapore
desc: A fabulous stay. The room was great - lots of space for the whole family. The staff were efficient and lovely, and the location - just a stone's throw from China Town and the MRT.... Which is a good thing. A bit of a walk is good to burn off the break-feast !

title: Impressive Experience and Stay !
desc: Thank you Park Royal Collection Pickering for the very welcoming experience and took good care of me and my loved ones ! The Room was wonderful and spacious. I also enjoyed the breakfast, fitness centre, and pool access.

title: Stunning hotel
desc: We stayed in this hotel on our return trip back to the UK from Australia. Absolutely stunning hotel from the exterior to the interior. Check in/out was straight forward and all staff were helpful and friendly throughout our stay. Breakfast in the hotel had a variety of food including the usual English breakfast which was great. The view from the pool especially in the evening was breathtaking! The design of the hotel and rooms are exceptional and we would definitely return.

title: Exceptionally nice
desc: Excellent design. Quality materials. Friendly and professional personnel. Excellent breakfast. Comfortable room. Good location. Lovely swimming pool. Good sound isolation in the rooms. It really is a game changer to have lush greenery just outside of your window while being on a high floor. Great design.

title: Park Royal Collection
desc: Beautiful and unique hotel with hanging gardens and an infitity pool with a view. Staff is very friendly and professional and really go the extra mile for guests. Highly recommended. One of the absolute best hotels in Singapore.

title: great stay. Will be back
desc: Great hotel with friendly staff, great amenities and breakfast buffet. Location is excellent - easy to get to main tourist spots with choice of 2 MRT stations and multiple bus stops very close by. Short walking distance to Boat, Robinson, Clarke and Boat Quays with all the restaurants, nightlife and shopping. Spacious rooms and lots of natural light. Lovely pool area to get out of the afternoon heat too!

title: Magic formula
desc: This is a great hotel. All the hardware is there, well thought out, well-designed and comfortable rooms. A busy but excellent breakfast buffet and an under-rated lobby bar. But the thing that makes the Pickering really good - and all the ParkRoyal hotels I have stayed at - is that the chain has discovered how to motivate staff to really care about guests and interact with them in a kind, human and engaged way. Have no idea how they do it, but plan to go on staying with them to find out.

title: Simply Outstanding
desc: Outstanding level of service. Beautiful building. Centrally placed for everything Singapore has to offer. Highly recommended. Breakfast done extremely well. Buffet style, but excellent food. The concierge could not have been more helpful. The ParkRoyal redefines the top class hotel experience.

title: Loved the greenery!
desc: Excellent hotel. Rooms & staff were all great. The restaurant was really good too - lots of choices & quality food. Good location to walk to the gardens & to get onto the Big Bus tour. Had to ask for ‘hot’ tea at breakfast, but that was the only very minor flaw.

title: Amazing Experience
desc: It was an amazing experience to stay in a hotel like Park Royal Pickering. The facility was amazing and the stuff was really helpful and friendly. After a long say it was such a treat to go back to our hotel and to feel like we are at home. In my opinion its the best hotel in Singapore

title: Gardens in the sky
desc: We selected this hotel for the design and the "garden" in the city experience. It was above the price category we would usually select but we do not regret a single coin spent. The garden terraces are amazing, you can be on the tenth floor and have a real garden (no access) in front of your room and the sky in the background. The room was super confortable and wide and the swimming pool not crowded and relaxing. The breakfast was pricey and surely we did not need everzthing that was offered, but the choice and the quality of the products were very high. Maybe one idea to improve the breakfast would be to offer more choice of freshly squeezed juices.

title: Great Room with Minor Flaws
desc: Great room in all aspects except the room lighting. It's either too dim or too bright - do away the fixed light settings (work, sleep, etc) & replace them with the conventional switches are way better. Complimentary in-house parking, spacious & well-insulated rooms, comfortable bed. Love the HDMI & USB ports next to the work desk - however TV brightness could not be adjusted? Smooth check-in & fuss free express check-out. Will return for another stay.

title: Wedding Celebration at Park Royal Collection Pickering
desc: We had our ROM solemnisation and wedding banquet at Park Royal collection Pickering and we have no regrets choosing this hotel for our wedding! Our sales manager Simon Wong were prompt in replies but unfortunately, he changed to another position and was replaced by Felinda Yeoh. We are glad that she is super friendly, replies to all our queries promptly and we felt comfortable liaising with her. Our banquet manager, Jason Lim was very professional and helpful throughout our ROM solemnisation and wedding banquet and making sure everything is smooth. Both are very attentive and good problem solvers. We faced some hiccups along the way but they were unfazed and helped us so much. Both my husband and I are thankful to meet such a good team and we had a wonderful stay and

title: Lovely ParkRoyal Pickering!
desc: We were so fortunate to stay at this lovey, green hotel. The staff is so gracious and kind, making our visit to a BUSY city so relaxing and peaceful. Our room was comfortable and quiet, even with kids in the room next to us. We enjoyed an early morning dip in the infinity pool as the sun rose over the skyline—quite a sublime experience. The design of the hotel (exterior and interior) is quite spectacular, in a non-ostentatious way, making it a jewel in Singapore.

title: Gorgeous and unique hotel!
desc: Absolutely gorgeous hotel, a complete oasis in the middle of the city. so much foliage and so green, pools and calming zen vibes. A completely unique property! The staff - from concierge to front desk to bar staff - were all so lovely, friendly, charming and incredibly helpful. The rooms were a very good size and more importantly, very well designed, with thoughtful storage and clever use of the space. The rooms are also very simple, with a very 'zen' styling. Nice use of technology in the rooms with powered blinds, clever lighting, etc. was a nice touch as well. Extremely comfortable beds as well! What a delightful place to stay - and we will most certainly be back again when in Singapore!

title: Good Hotel
desc: Very nice and comfortable room to stay. Love the view from the hotel and a green hotel. The buffet food is excellent as it has a lobster buffet now. Try it while it still last. Recommended for the location and the hotel service.

title: 5-star sustainable hotel in a great location with excellent amenities
desc: Always a delight staying at this hotel. I love the sustainable focus at the core of the brand, the location is perfect for getting around to all the major attractions and for my business meetings, and the Club Level room provides access to some great benefits and amenities, including daily breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails with canapes. I also can't get enough of the bedding - I always get the best sleep here. Sometimes too much!

title: No bed for my child, despite a reservation for two adults and a child!
desc: The booking was made for two adults and a child, but the assigned room fitted two adults only. There was no space or possibility to add an extra bed for my child and the staff was unable to solve the situation. Very unsatisfactory staying, way below the expectations!

title: Green hotel
desc: Good hotel with friendly staff. Booked this hotel largely because of the trees planted around. Love the idea and the concept which gives you a very relaxing mood when staying. Location is convenient, a shopping mall next to the hotel and just a few minutes walk to the MRT station.

title: A beautiful, comfortable, and welcoming hotel
desc: Fantastic place. I had the opportunity to use the club lounge and it was well worth it. The food there is great and the staff are exceptionally professional and kind. Hats off to Jetrix, Kenosha and chef Michael! The hotel is beautiful, the rooms as well, and it's a great location. I came for business but hope I can bring my family some day.

title: Beautiful stay
desc: A beautiful hotel that would meet your needs. The hotel has a very garden like ambience.. it feels very open and airy. The pool is beautiful with views of the city’s skyline. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Their club sandwich is one of the best. The rooms are very clean and the light wood interiors make it refreshing. I would highly recommend staying here.

title: Royal Collections Royal to to you by all
desc: Royal Collection is a Example of Royalty with Love and affection.To describe in words would be short and in justifying the Hotel.It is to be experienced The Enviro Friendly,its spacious room for health of Body and Mind its silence yet busty,Food quality Room ambience ,Its infinity Pool,Its Buds Pagodas to relax,Its service Its privacy Its Filter water tap in Room is a Unique ..But It is to be experienced

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: The hotel is amazing! The most beautiful that I stayed in my life. The staff is so kind and the food is delicious. The best hotel ever! I loved the experience. The pool and gym area is a excellent place to relax and spend time in Sinagpore.

title: Down time
desc: Always enjoy a stop over at this hotel having visited family and friends in US and Europe Staff so professional and all go out of there way to be helpful nothing to much trouble Special note to Chef Sylvia in club lounge for ensuring my vegetarian needs are meet And last night chef Yong Chee excelled with Soba noodles The reason I didn’t mark 5 stars was I was disappointed as a tennis fan I was unable to watch the French Men’s tennis final at Roland Garros on any of the hotels ‘SmartTV’ systems So watched on my apple phone Susan Sims

title: Have stayed before and keep coming back
desc: Beautifully designed hotel with greenery everywhere. The staff are professional and welcoming. View from the room is amazing and the king size bed was super comfy. I have stayed here several times, and although I look around at other hotels, I enjoy it so much, I keep coming back. Would definitely recommend.

title: Perfect stay at greeny hotel ❤️
desc: huge stunning room, nice bed & perfect pillow, great service & facilities with a great view of the city, strategic location & have an awesome breakfast! super enjoy and definitely will come back!!!!!

title: Excellent stay at Parkroyal Pickering
desc: Awesome Check-in experience with Customer Service and Loyalty Manager, with warm welcome to Parkroyal Pickering. Felt most valued as GHA member in this property. Excellent room and bedding as usual and plenty of food options. Staffs at executive lounge was very friendly and attentive, kudos to them. Hope more GHA hotel chain would be like this.

title: Stunning in every way
desc: The whole hotel and experience was exceptional! Cannot find any fault. The hotel rooms were clean and spacious. Bed was super comfortable! Hotel rooms have a filtered water tap which was a godsend to have. The hotel grounds were stunning - like being part of nature even up in the sky. Buffet breakfast was delicious every day! Service was outstanding.

title: Above and beyond!
desc: Wow from the minute the driver from the hotel met us at the airport we knew we were in for a treat! Everything was so smooth and easy, despite coming off an international flight. Then when we got to the GORGEOUS hotel and Brent helped us with our bags. He was so kind! When he found out it was our anniversary, he was enthusiastic and congratulated us. Then a few days later on our actual anniversary, he surprised us with wine in our room! It was so special and made us feel so good! That was just one incredible example of how wonderful this hotel staff is. One of my other favorite parts was the INCREDIBLE buffet breakfast. It was a dream! My husband and I joked about being excited to wake up just for breakfast. Finally, the location was so perfect, so easy to sightsee and walk.

title: Outstanding, modern hotel
desc: This is an outstanding hotel and architecturally impressive. Modern, clean, well-priced, good service and good location. We enjoyed our two night stay in a premier king room and were grateful for a late check out given we had a flight later in the day. We walked to Chinatown (where we found some LGBT friendly bars) and the Marina Bay Sands area, marvelling at the modern Singaporean architecture. Any taxis we caught took no longer than 10 mins. Brent and the team were very helpful arranging taxis including to the airport (highly recommend spending time at the amazing Changi airport including Jewel). Our room was spacious, relaxing and environmentally friendly. The bathtub was great, there was a water filter tap in the room and we loved the greenery everywhere. Thanks for a great

title: Great location to explore the city & close to China town for good food at reasonable prices.
desc: Great looking hotel, incredibly clean, serene, good size rooms with friendly staff & great services/facilities. Pool small & pool area not always in the sunshine, but it is a city hotel & in Singapore the shade is best!

title: Fantastic
desc: Excellent service and facilities The rooms were beautiful and clean with excellent view The staff were always ready to help and pleasant The aesthetics of the hotel were lovely and the food was great

title: Very good hotel
desc: Very good experience with this hotel. My little one loves this hotel because of the trees and green environment. Have not stay in such a special hotel. Location is convenient also, just a few minutes walk to a mall and the MTR station. Staff are friendly.

title: Must stay here!
desc: Amazing hotel! Parents first overseas trip - they were blown away! The staff were the friendliest people we have ever met. Facilities were clean and welcoming. Such a great location too, close to everything.

title: The perfect place to stay in Singapore
desc: This hotel was unbelievable. I’ve been to Singapore a few times and in future, I’ll always stay at ParkRoyal. It was comfortable, accommodating and beautiful. Every member of staff I spoke with was exceptionally kind and informative and the whole vibe of the place was wonderful. The food is impeccable and the spa was perfection. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: It’s definitely a must
desc: How to start is actually quite difficult without sounding so cliche. Honestly it’s just absolutely amazing. You guys came off a highly regarded recommendation from the Netherlands, we however are from Australia, Word travels fast. ( thanks Hubert Roth) From the very first moment I approached the park royal Pickering I was amazed. Having stayed in Singapore before I was surprised by the lush surroundings. The room was immaculate, the filtered water was an absolute asset. We did upgrade to club lounge ( thank you Donna). All the staff went above and beyond to make our time enjoyable. The location is great, so close to everything. Concierge were just so helpful and had great suggestions. My only suggestion to concierge would be not to suggest staying at the Hatten in malacca

title: Great stay. Poor breakfast experience
desc: Great experience overall. The staff at check in (Chanda) and bellboy who greeted us everyday was great. We lost our child’s pain killer and the entire staff swung into action to solve our problem. The only reason this is not five stars is because of the breakfast crew. They were poorly trained and rude and several times stood over our head to clear our plates while we were eating. Sometimes they would stop us eating to ask us to help clear our plates. Also the buffet was often missing items because they were cleared out before the time or not filled. Some items were cooked poorly. Hopefully the management takes note of this and fixes it

title: excellent service, views and facilities
desc: excellent service, views and facilities choose a room with a good view Location is great, the gym is perfect though a bit compact and with a view the pool is very special too. The architecture is unique and worth discovering

title: One of the best hotels in Singapore
desc: Gorgeous, green-covered hotel that I keep returning to. The infinity edge pool is divine, staff and service superb and the rooms are intelligently designed and appointed. Do pay the extra for the Collection Club rooms as the many benefits are amazing. The food quality and range in their Lime restaurant is well above the usual hotel fare. Highly recommended.

title: Top Hotel with kind staff!
desc: Very kind staff, especially Brand in the lobby. We choose this hotel, because of the location, but the hotel is more that the location itself. The breakfast offers you a lot of choices and the bed is very comfortable. I can only recommend it to the travelers to Singapore.

title: Good but expected more for price
desc: Great hotel and best bed and pillows hands down. Expected more for a hotel at this price point however. (Urban) rooms were bit small, especially the bathroom which was separated from bed by sliding doors only. May try to be environmentally friendly but room lights so dim. Avoid corner rooms where without blinds, can see to room from hotel corridors. The rooms were a bit dark, especially in bathroom area. Lower floors had to bring blinds down otherwise can look in from outside from opposite buildings. Location ok, plenty of food options around a Chinatown but need transport to get to shopping area (orchard).

title: Wonderful stay in a Club room
desc: I stayed for 6 nights in a Club room when travelling for work and can't recommend the hotel and staff hospitality highly enough. Very comfortable rooms, great pool and spa facilities, everything looks beautiful. Access to the Club lounge really made the experience, with the evening cocktails 6-8pm more than sufficient for dinner with delicious fresh meals made to order as well as plenty of savoury snacks and desserts (seafood risotto and laksa were highlights). Breakfast and afternoon tea also excellent. A big thankyou to the amazing lounge staff in particular Jetrix, Sylvia, Dennis and Thomas. They were quick to remember my dietary requirements, always warm and accommodating and made the business trip feel like a holiday. Can't wait to return!

title: A hotel for nature lovers
desc: This hotel far exceeded my expectations! If you are a nature lover, you will love the architecture and interior design. Location was centrally located and made it easy to venture out on day trips to explore the city. The king room was excellent, clean, comfortable and the hotel staff were friendly and attentive. Highly recommend!

title: Best hotel experience in Singapore
desc: Excellent location right next to Chinatown and the metro. Our room was spacious, huge bathroom with relaxation bath tub with amazing views, and exellent facilities (incredible horizon pool on the 5th floor with comfortable private cabanas!). The included breakfast was fabulous and the staff were extremely helpful and friendly.

title: Thank you, Park Royal.
desc: Central, luxurious, great staff in all areas of the hotel. I have stayed at a few hotels in Singapore and this is my first choice. Staff in the Lime restaurant had my coffee ready and hunted down avocado and more when I asked. I am grateful.

title: Perfect. quiet, clean, very comfortable room.
desc: Perfect room. super quiet and comfortable. The king size bed was perfect, room lightning, AC, and all room accessories were great. Even the Wifi was very good. The business lounge is also very nice and welcoming, staff was awesome.

title: Great location snd eco conscious hotel
desc: Lovely sustainable snd eco- conscious hotel in a great location near Singapore’s China town. Great service, nothing was too much trouble and the concierge service was very helpful. The breakfast is great and the infinity pool has a great view and is a welcome cooling & relaxation area after a hot day sight seeing. Recommended!

title: Excellence in green.
desc: Great stay with PR Pickering. Shoutout to Jeffrey, Chanada and the team in PR Pickering for keeping up the 5 star standard across my stay. Would recommend and would return for their excellent services. - Any issues with the room was resolved with haste. - The team provided immediate and thoughtful solutions to issues. - The stay experience was seamless, no long waiting, no SOP service attitude. - Facilities and amenities are well maintained. - Presentation meets expectation of a 5 star hotel. Recommendations: - Perhaps could consider a deep cleaning of the room floor carpets from time to time, as a detailed eye would see the accumulated dusts / hairs.

title: Singapore Jewel
desc: The Parkroyal at Pickering was wonderful. We went for 3 nights but should have stayed longer. We could not fit everything in. The room and amenities were lovely. The infinity pool was great - the only negative was we could not get a cabana. Even though the pool had no-one in it, all cabanas had towels left in them which was annoying as we would have loved to try them out. Other than that, if you are in Singapore and want an excellent hotel which is very well located for Clarke Quay and Chinatown, then this is the one for you.

title: Very friendly, convenient and comfortable
desc: The service staff is very kind, the room is clean and tidy and very comfortable. I slept well even after staying for three nights. I highly recommend families with children to stay here. The breakfast is varied and rich, and the transportation is convenient. It is worth staying again.

title: Friendly and professional staff
desc: It was such a pleasant stay in Parkroyal Pickering Hotel. The room is spacious and bright. The hotel staff are friendly and helpful, especially Felicia at the Reception. She was very professional and provided great service and assistance during my stay. She was very observant and attentive to the guests, so she could offer the help or service even before I asked. Her service was really impressing me. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and relatives.

title: Best hotel in singapore
desc: I experienced with best service and condition , view with this hotel in my life. Honestly, one of the happiest memory was staying in this hotel. All members helped me and considered for me. I was so touched and happy during staying. Surely i will should go and stay again! Thanks all !

title: Amazing hotel.
desc: Great hotel with amazing service and very friendly, accomodating staff. Went above and beyond to accomodate dietary requirements and were lovely to our two small, rambunctious girls. Aziff Bell was wonderful - super friendly and helpful. We would love to stay here again next visit.

title: Just ok
desc: This hotel is not a 5 star hotel! Our stay was ok but I think they live off the fact that the hotel looks cool from the outside with all the greenery. Our urban room was clean and functional with lots of storage. Housekeeping good. To get to the room you have to walk outside on dirty corridors. There was a handle on one door leading into the corridor that was loose for the 5 days we were there. The pool area is nice but lacks sun coverage during the morning and the pool towels are very small and not really absorbent. We asked for some ice one night as the fridge in the room was not very cold and we gave up waiting after 45 minutes as we had a dinner reservation! We also paid our bill the night before checkout as we were leaving early the next day and by the time we got back to

title: Gorgeous Hotel
desc: We stayed here to break our journey to Europe. We were drawn to the lovely green foliage around the building and the funky interior of the guest rooms. Pool was amazing! Great location and we would be keen to revisit.

title: 10 out of 10 recommend!!!
desc: A must stay! This hotel was absolutely gorgeous <3 . They have a huge breakfast spread and the pool is just priceless. We had a 1 bedroom sweet with the trees and pool view and honestly I think it was the best room at the hotel. And shoutout to Jeffrey who was super kind and gave us a warm welcome He even helped us out when we wanted to keep our room for our late flight. We definitely will be back.

title: Fabulous location
desc: Great hotel. Excellent location central to everything. Rooms are very comfortable and clean but I found the lighting way to dark. They have bikes you can use which is an amazing way to get around Singapore to see everything. Concierge is great for making bookings and recommending great restaurants. Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing stay in Singapore!
desc: We absolutely loved this hotel. My husband and I and our two kids stayed for 5 nights, and thoroughly enjoyed the hotel. We checked in very late on the night we arrived and our luggage did not make it onto our arriving flight, but the hotel was very welcoming and Mr. Brent took extra care to make sure we received our luggage from the airport when it did arrive the next day. He also made a point of greeting our kids whenever we saw him during our stay. The buffet breakfast was fabulous with many choices for all of us. Our kids spent many happy hours in the infinity pool. We also loved the location in Chinatown.

title: Parkroyal Perfection
desc: The Parkroyal Collection Pickering, Singapore lived up to its promise. The room was very comfortable with a great view of the park below and the city skyline. The plants adorning the building were spectacular and created a warm and inviting aesthetic. The focus on sustainable accomodation was pleasing, including filtered water for drinking (no plastic drinking bottles) and energy saving sensor devices to reduce power consumption etc was admirable. Other facilities we used included the pool area on the 5th floor which enabled spectacular views, both of the abundant plant life in and around the hotel as well as fabulous city views. The dining area for our breakfast (The Lime) was very pleasant and the food and beverages were first class. The staff were very courteous, approachable

title: Very nice hotel - but dissapointing collection club room
desc: Fantastic hotel - beautiful and clean and very well located e.g. MRT and hop-on-off buses next door. still have 1.5 days left. Just was dissapointed about the Orchid Collection Lounge checkin experience in our room - we arrived early due to our early flight and we were not offered like others mentioned to use the lounge but was offered that we could have a quick refresh at the pool area. There was no welcome drink at reception as other reviewers mention, The room is nice with nice mattresses and very good shower - however, there was no little welcome surprise eg chocolate/macaroons nor a carekit, bottled water or welcome note as Other people mention, even had to call for a Nespresso coffee machine (they came then with more instant coffee before when I insisted they finally came

title: Excellent staycation
desc: We had an excellent staycation at park royal. Everything was great. Special thanks to Jeffrey who warmly welcomed us. The rest of the staff was of course very nice and highly professional. We definitely recommend the place and will for sure come again.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Great hotel, great location with some amazing staff. Pool area is nice. Very close to China town and short walking distance to Marina area. For breakfast you have plenty of choices. Rooms are very nice.

title: Pleasant stay!
desc: Property and Room is clean and well-kept! It was a very pleasant short stay. The lights in the room (including toilet) are rather dim. But overall the property is a dimly-lit place, which gives a relaxed vibe. Venue is approx 5min walk (one traffic light away) from Clarke Quay MRT station. Nearby to Chinatown if that’s a place of your interest.

title: Favourite hotel !
desc: Love this place. The room is clean and very comfortable, love the pillows! They have a filter water tap in the room which is very helpful. I don't have to constantly boil and wait for the water to be cooled.

title: Wedding Dinner
desc: Overall hotel experience from check in to having the wedding banquet to after wedding, stay and check out was beyond expectation. If any of you would like to have a wedding banquet here at parkroyal collection pickering. i will highly recommend felinda yeoh (wedding coordinator manager) and jason lim (banquet manager on actual day) they made the entire experience v pleasant. Jason Lim and Felinda Yeoh both really attended to our needs very well. For pre wedding prep till actual day, Felinda guided us and was extremely patient with us in explaining our questions whenever we have doubts. as for the actual day, Jason really ran the whole dinner so well with all his staff and AV members. the efficiency and the whole timeline of the entire wedding dinner was extremely smooth.

title: Enjoyed our stay at Parkroyal Collection Pickering, Singapore
desc: Excellent location to stay, beautiful lobby, common areas and room set up. Amenities are clean and always smell nice throughout the entire internal areas. Good on-site restaurant, friendly staff, and fast and reliable wifi.

title: Amazing Stay
desc: From the moment I arrived until the time of my departure, every aspect of my experience was absolutely amazing. The culinary experiences at the hotel surpassed all expectations. The breakfast buffet was a delightful spread of both local and international dishes, catering to all tastes. The quality of the food was exceptional. The pool area was beautifully designed and offered a serene retreat for relaxation.

title: Fantastic experience!
desc: This was my family and I’s first time in Singapore and this was the perfect place to stay. The building was very clean, the pool and gym were great with a nice view of the city, and the staff were incredibly nice and attentive. We worked closely with the concierge on scheduling a trip to KL and other things throughout the city. Brent at the front desk was incredibly helpful and friendly as well.

title: Great experience!
desc: We held a wedding banquet at the hotel and were extremely pleased with our experience. Hotel staff who liaised with us were very professional and accommodating. Our banquet manager Jason Lim was the cream of the crop. He catered to our every need and was very professional. Our sales manager Felinda Yeoh was also very friendly and prompt in her service, even replying to us on weekends and late at night. The only room for improvement was the AV system in the ballroom. The sound was very muffled and we could not hear ourselves on stage sometimes. Room stay wise, we had a great experience at the hotel suite (amazing views!) and in-room dining food was great as well. Overall no major issues!

title: Highly recommended!!
desc: We held our wedding banquet here and it was the best decision ever. All the staff were very professional and polite. Service was good. Our sales manager Jaslin was helpful and we were also impressed by our banquet manager, Jason Khew. He is extremely thoughtful and helpful. We were very grateful for all his help that day. Not forgetting the in room dining was great and room was beautiful too. We truly enjoyed our stay there. Looking forward to come back again!! Highly recommended.

title: A garden hotel
desc: Very comfortable hotel with interesting botanical vibe.5th floor outdoor pool of a 16 story hotel was a first time experience! Breakfast was up there with any international buffet. Filtered water on tap was a nice bonus. A rooftop bar for the ‘regular’ punters would have been nice!

title: A real oasis in a modern metropolis
desc: This is one of the best hotels ever stayed in terms of location, facilities, abmience and service. The architectural and interior design are exceptional . The green and water elements everywhere in the hotel, offer a feeling of comfort and relaxation. Food and drinks are excellent. Gym very well located and fully equipped. Swimming pool fantastic. The hotel staff professional but at the same time warm hearted. The rooms and facilities functional, and with all modern amenities. We stayed for three nights with my wife and two teenage daughters and we all loved the place, the convenience in getting around and the feeling of living in an Indonesian island resort while being in the center of Singapore. If I had something to add this would be an extra bar or dining area

title: Wonderful stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay: great location near Chinatown and MRT, superb urban room that was very spacious and accomodated all needs we had. Friendly staff in all areas of the hotel. We also liked the pool and luxurious breakfast. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Great wedding experience
desc: I had chose Parkroyal Pickering as my wedding venue due to its botanical and nature theme. Everything about the wedding experience was perfect, from the venue to the food to the logistics and the planning process. Jasline from events planning was really great to work with and she was very proactive in addressing our queries and facilitating the event to make it a success. Banquet manager Vasu was also amazing in ensuring the smooth flow of event on the actual day. Both Vasu and Jasline were very helpful and warm, and they also shared with us some of the procedures we are unsure about. Ultimately it has been a great experience from start to finish and I'm glad to have chose Parkroyal Pickering as our wedding venue.

title: Enchanted moment
desc: Three words: go for it. Magical weekend, caring staff. Considerate, caring, very nice. It was a waking dream. Beautiful hotel decor and atmosphere. Wellness. Special mention for the warm welcome from Jeffrey. Everything was almost perfect. The lobster buffet, the quality of service. Spa massage and breakfast. The lounge club. Only downside: check your bill carefully when checking out. The hostess made a mistake and wanted me to pay for the room a second time when it was already paid. In any case, despite this small flat. I would go back without hesitation.

title: Wonderful green and relaxing stay
desc: I had A very relaxing and Pleasant stay. The staff (lobby, lounge, cleaning, pool,..) were very nice, polite, Considerating, and caring. The staff were quick to help in any way. Special mention for the warm welcome from Jenisah, and chef michael. Located right next to china-town. I would go back without hesitation.

title: Perfect location
desc: The location of the hotel is perfect that we can walk straight to 2 MTR stations and bus stations. I also love the design of the hotel much, including the rooms, lobby and swimming pool. Most of the staffs are nice and served us with smile. A point to note that we find the quality of the breakfast buffet (the restaurant at 1F) is just fair in taste with not much variety to choose. The staffs work in the restaurant is a bit too busy that they didn’t willing to serve us for coffee when they were asked, some of them talk with each other rather than ready to serve us at the egg station. I think the service and food quality of this restaurant should be upgraded as I expected that I was dining at a 5 star hotel.

title: Fresh and juicy vibe
desc: Green, fresh and succulent vibe. Personell is absolutely amazing, special thanks to Mr. Jefery who made the stay even more pleasant. Room is relatively small but cosy and efficient. What we like most is the dedication to sustainability

title: Fantastic Stay for couple of nights
desc: I had a couple of nights in the hotel whilst I’m Singapore for work related activities. The room was perfect and had all the services I required including a good area to conduct work from. The buffet breakfast was very good with great choice of both European and Asia choices.

title: One of the best in Singapore
desc: Unique property, attentive staff, great location. Everything you could ask for from a luxury hotel. Spa and pool facilities are very pleasant and the restaurant has a solid menu, although not as extensive as some.

title: Appreciation for Exceptional Service - Compliment Letter [15 July - 17 July 2023]
desc: Jasline From the very beginning, she guided us through the entire wedding planning process with professionalism and grace. She provided us with valuable advice and suggestions while always respecting our vision and preferences. Her calm and reassuring attitude helped ease any anxieties we had throughout the planning process. On the day of our wedding, she went above and beyond to ensure that everything ran smoothly. From coordinating with us to overseeing the setup and managing the timeline, she executed everything flawlessly. Jason - PM On the day of the event, I was thoroughly impressed with the outstanding service provided by the banquet manager, Jason. He was attentive, courteous, and went above and beyond to ensure that every guest was well taken care of. On top of

title: One week stay at the Pickering with children
desc: We stayed for six days at the Pickering in a super clean and comfortable suite with a stunning view. The hanging gardens are great and we loved to walk through it. Luckily we booked the Club option. It was a pleasure to be guest of Ana, Jetrix, Dennis and Donna. They created a familiar atmosphere, were very polite and super friendly. We had nice talks and got many good ideas and help for our trip through Singapore. The Chefs Sylvia and Yong Chee create every day different food options, never boring, always healthy and delicious. But our biggest thank goes to Chef Sylvia. She is a super Chef, creates very tasty meals, helps out wherever she is needed, supports the team- even by serving the guests- beside cooking action- when everything is crowded and busy. Sylvia has a big

title: Unique and Peaceful Experience
desc: This hotel is forever one of our favorites and we cannot wait to return. Singapore was the first stop before our trip to Bali, but surprisingly our time spent at this hotel was the most relaxing and best part of our entire trip! The sustainable efforts are far beyond greenwashing that many brands do, they are legit. The greenery was gorgeous and the pool was so peaceful. 10/10 in every way!

title: Every time again.
desc: A very modern but still traditional hotel with good service. The staff is always friendly and helpful, no matter what your request is, they try to fulfil it. The location is perfect for excursions, the metro is close by and you can easily explore Singapore.

title: Amazing stay in perfect location in Chinatown, stunning property
desc: Amazing stay at the Parkroyal Collection Pickering, fantastic hotel and all the staff were very attentive to our needs. Felt like a much smaller boutique hotel. Very new and well designed hotel, the greenery was fantastic to see incorporated so well into the design, it is refreshing to stay at. The check in and out processes were handled perfectly and the bell staff were excellent also. We look forward to returning soon as we have found our new regular hotel for business.

title: Change for the Better
desc: There's always on going changes for the better that makes guests keep coming back, satisfied and happy. Of late, the foods' layout and display in the Collection Club Lounge which are neat and consolidated instead of few locations which one could easily miss out. Thanks to Executive Chef Alvin Leong for making the change. Equally impressive are the good services of Collections Club Manager; Shirley and her team; Donna, Anna, Jetrix, Czerlyn and Lijun. Besides, also the following staff who served with passions and smiles too. Chefs : Alvin Leong and Team : Edmund, Stanley Mak, Yong Chee Director or Operations : Jamie Front Office : Jon, Judy, Jeffrey and Fausteen Housekeeper : Mark. I am sure I will be back and for more.

title: Wonderful hotel and great location.
desc: Amazing property! Room was fantastic. Modern decor and amenities. Rain shower and soaker tub in room were so relaxing and favourite features. Collection lounge offered up excellent dining and service each day.

title: Best experience
desc: I was amazed by the architecture, vibe and service. Staff were amazing and room was super clean. Staff were helpful all the time. everything was at its place. Food was delicious and breakfast was so complete.

title: Excellent food and service
desc: Peach blossoms is an upscale Chinese fine dining restaurant with very classy interiors. Our food and service both were very good.Our server Vincent took special care and made our meal more memorable. Thank you Vincent and we will return again.

title: Review of our stay at PR Pickering: Upside and downside
desc: Both my wife and I stayed for 12 nights. We have experienced sterling hospitality, and we would single out: James @ Lime Bar Brent, porter Fourteen (as pronounced) Selvam, porter Yogesh, bar man Sky, bar man Thuzar, waitress Trinen/part time at Lime Bar We would further add that James @ Lime Bar has been professional, courteous and with great inter-personal qualities. Brent and Selvam also stood out to be pleasant and extremely helpful. The chamber staff were also polite. On the downside, my wife's experience at the "Buffet" chicken rice/roast meat counter to be substandard. She was waiting with her plate of rice and had to endure inordinate delay to be served because the server was chatting with his colleague albeit noticing my wife standing there and he chose to ignore

title: Great stay!
desc: We’ve enjoyed our weekend staying in this hotel. The pool, room and the Bar was really great! Service was superb too! A huge thanks to Athul by the pool for always giving a exceptional service. It is indeed a fun getaway.

title: our favourite hotel
desc: The best experience we had. Staff was friendly and professional at handling check in. Staff was able to go the extra mile just to ensure we are satisfied. We really appreciate their service and hospitality, would return back again.

title: Quiet and comfortable place
desc: Breakfast is delicious. Friendly staff. It's a business district, so it's quiet and comfortable. MRT station exit is just next to the hotel so it's easy to get on train and go to various areas for sightseeing.

title: Class above the rest
desc: Facilities, food, location and above all - the comfort. It’s my home away from home and a great place to relax after a busy day of exploring. The service was prompt and was very well looked after throughout my stay.

title: The best of the best
desc: This is one of the best (if not just the best) Hotel I have stayed in. It’s not the biggest, not the fanciest and not the most expensive or luxurious, but all in all it’s just the best. Location is perfect, service is remarkable and the design is extraordinary. Breakfast was amazing, and the pool is unique with a beautiful city view. Stayed in few hotels during my previous stays in Singapore, and this is easily the best and the one I will definitely return to.

title: Countdown to our Honeymoon ending .... Best decision. DO IT!!
desc: At th end of our Honeymoon (4.5 week world trip) we decided to ease back into New Zealand with a 3 night stopover in Singapore and boy ParkRoyal Collection Pickering is an eye opening hotel. Great gym, pool, spa, food, cocktails and staff. PLUS A Sustainable Buildings WOW factor. GET IN THERE!!

title: Excellent service
desc: The service was exemplary. In particular Trinen and Yusuf down at Lime Bar. They made my stay even better. The pool is fantastic too. Room service - nasi goreng for the win. Will look forward to coming back.

title: Excellent experience that you won't regret.
desc: Excellent view, soft bed, comfortable pillow, clean and tidy room. Very convenient location as it is near to Chinatown. With complimentary infinity swimming pool and gym room. Refreshing environment all around.

title: Had the best wedding thanks to Park Royal Pickering!
desc: Had the best time working with Felinda and Jason for our wedding! She was fast and responsive to our requests and ensured that our wedding was smooth! We had such a good stay at park royal Pickering and would definitely be back! The hotel was clean and spacious and we were surrounded by lush greenery in the heart of the city. We could not have asked for more!

title: Green, luxurious, rejuvenating.
desc: The hotel is beautiful to look at and the greenery everywhere is rejuvenating. We spent two nights in the hotel and were surprised by how quiet our room was overnight considering we were in a bustling city. We traveled with our two teenagers and the rooms (separate but with an additional outer door that encompassed both rooms) made it feel like a suite rather than two rooms. The beds were amazingly comfortable. We all feel very lucky to have stayed in such a lovely setting. The pool is stunning and the garden walk around the pool terrace is a soothing escape. Floating on my back staring up at the plants over the balconies was a joy (see photo). Breakfast was also delicious with lots of variety to choose from.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Everything was perfect. The staff is extremely helpful and nice. Very comfortable and clean rooms. Pool is super nice. Good breakfast with lot of variety of foods. Great attention to details and to clients. Suggest it 100%.

title: Great hotel, one blip
desc: Amazing architecture and comfortable rooms. Brent at the concierge was very friendly and helpful. Wonderful pool and gym facilities. Loved the garden walk. Great stay. We asked for two duvets so our boys could sleep more comfortably in a double bed - this didn’t arrive as requested and at 5am I was woken up by one of my sons complaining that he was cold and needed that extra duvet. So awesome experience overall marred by a bad nights sleep which could have been resolved if my request had been heeded to at the beginning of our stay as asked for.

title: Great birthday celebration at Parkroyal Pickering
