desc: The staff at this hotel is just amazing. When we first arrived, we were greeted by friendly concierge who promptly took over our luggage. Met Samuel who checked us in. Very friendly, helpful and efficient. The next day, he grant us a much needed extension as we have young children who needed the afternoon nap. So grateful to him. Jeffrey and Nurul spoke to us before our arrival. Arranged early check-in, birthday amenities and treats for our children and made sure the room was properly cleaned. Very very grateful too for their great service. Housekeeping staff were not just friendly but efficient. Things we requested were promptly delivered. The upgraded room was in great condition. Really appreciate the upgrade and clean room. We had such a good time. The children were sad to

title: My sanctuary in Singapore
desc: It has become my favourite hotel in Singapore and we stay here every time we come to our second home. It has everything - spacious rooms, central location in (next to Chinatown MRT) , an infinity pool with great views, a sublime breakfast selection and best of all the feeling of a cool green sanctuary to come back to after enjoying Singapore’s many attractions.

title: Singapore stay
desc: Very good service, very comfortable beds and accommodated all our requests. Made us feel special for our anniversary trip. Lovely view from the room and great concierge. Green & sustainable hotel. You

title: Wedding
desc: We had our wedding in Park Royal Pickering and we enjoyed so much! Felinda is our wedding coordinator and she is really good with her role! She is very patient and responsive to our questions. Banquet food was good! Our guests enjoyed it a lot. The chef took our feedbacks during food tasting and was correctly done during actual day. All staffs members were very polite and smiley. Never regret our choice to choose Park Royal Pickering! 👍🏻

title: A must stay
desc: The hotel was amazing staff was amazing food was amazing 10 out of 10 hands down rooms were clean and we had great views of the city with our room type staff was friendly and efficient will return for sure if I ever decide to come to Back to Singapore

title: St Gregory Spa
desc: My husband and I had a wonderful experience at St Gregory Spa. From the initial telephone call to enquire about options, Margaux was knowledgeable and helpful, sharing how massages could be adapted for me as I am 6 months pregnant. On the day, we both had the 'jetlag relief massage' and were both fully relaxed and rejuvenated after. We had the treatments in the couple room which was spacious and luxurious. After our 75 minute treatment, we spent two hours by the pool which was a perfect addition to our day. We would recommend this spa to others and will go back again. Many thanks!

title: Wandeful hotel in Singapore
desc: It's a wonderful hotel located in the hart of China town. The welcome by samuel in the front desk was so helpful and i want to mentioned also jeffrey felicia fustine. The beds are so convenient. The breakfast is very good and large. We liked the crab night in the hotel. We stayed 4 nights 3 adults and two children in two connected rooms. It a walk to china town and awalk from the tube I give them excellent grade.

title: Hanging Garden
desc: Woha's interpretation of how a modern Hanging Garden should look like in a garden city was awe-inspiring when it first opened. Was back recently and I'm happy to report that it is still magnificent. The overall experience was made even more enjoyable by the attentive service from Judy and her team. Many thanks also to the club team for making my short stay most enjoyable.

title: Great location, modern, well appointed, friendly staff and a relaxing place to stay
desc: We used this hotel for our two night stopovers when travelling to Europe from Australia and return. We could not fault this hotel. Great location, comfy clean rooms, very friendly and helpful staff and excellent facilities. We also very much liked the hotel in a garden theme and found the hotel a very relaxing and enjoyable place to stay. While Singapore is not a cheap place to stay for this level of accommodation, the Parkroyal Pickering seemed very competitive and we would certainly use this hotel again.

title: Awesome experience!
desc: We enjoyed the stay very much. I really like the comfy bedding, delicious breakfast, great location and friendly hotel staff. Hotel is near China Town and two subway stations. Highly recommend this hotel to you!

title: A very pleasant stay at one of the best hotels in Singapore
desc: Very good hotel with very friendly staff, good location. Very clean and a good ambience. We really felt at home. Hawker centers and restaurants at walking distance. A good family hotel but also for business. A small gym but good enough to exercise.

title: Disappointing
desc: Used to be my favourite till my recent 2 stays which had been huge disappointment. My impression has declined from excellent to worse. 5 star hotel to less than 3 star. Was given a handicapped room - lack of privacy - cleaner can just open the room without knocking the door, grabbar in the bathroom dropped out while i was trying to hang the towel. The quality and safety of the handicapped room was not on par. What if its a real handicapped person staying in the room. My most recent stay was given an urban deluxe room instead of lifestyle premier room. When i tried to call the reception, the receptionist was rude and not being professional. Denied that i had booked a lifestyle premier room. Has made it an unpleasant experience staying in a garden concept hotel...

title: Wonderfull view,wonderfull staff
desc: I would like thanks to your staff Jeffry,such a nice guy and very friendly bring me around to see how beautiful your hotel ,even I'm not staying..but mby in the future.please tell him my appriciated and keep him as your staff as long as u can.im Singaporean but still want to stay at there with my kids.

title: Would highly recommend
desc: Stunning hotel, location was brilliant, easy to get around .The service we received was 10/10 . Definitely a place to stay while in Singapore.. The facilities were great including the pool which was exceptional.

title: Awesome
desc: One of the best hotels we have ever been. The building, the rooms, the service, the food, the wellness opportunities ... everything was outstanding. we felt very home since the first minute. one of us had birthday during our stay and the hotel surprised us with a good bottle of wine, pralinès and cake. the room was very clean, the interior something special and as smart as the room control. first time we missed nothing in the room: seems like you don't need to bring anything to live there and by the way: the building is the most beautiful in whole Singapore and from our room (level 14) we had a nice view over Chinatown and the skyline

title: Park Royal on Pickering is amazing
desc: Staff are very friendly and helpful - we always stay here when we are in Singapore. Special thanks to Murli and Wong for all the help and advice for best places to visit/eat/play. They both went out of their way to make the trip memorable and help out in every way possible. Highly recommend this hotel - the staff and service are always top notch!!!

title: Green luxury
desc: I travelled with a friend and shared a twin bed room on the 14th floor with city view. Comfortable, clean and quiet, with great location near MRT station and Chinatown. Appreciated the bathroom amenities (shower gel smells sooo good!) and drinking water fountain in room. The staff is fabulous, friendly and efficient (Valerie and Tessa are stars! 🤩) Beautiful pool and sauna. The spa and restaurant looked nice but we didn’t use them. Concierge called a cab to the airport (about 30 min / 28$sin)

title: Fabulous hotel we will be back!
desc: The staff were awesome and the room was spacious and gorgeous. The pool is amazing and the breakfast was great. We will definitely recommend to friends and family and we will also definitely stay here again.

title: Splended
desc: We spent 10 splended nights at this hotel and I can't say enough about how great everything is. The concept, the architecture, the view, the hygiene, the service, the room, the spa, the food.... everything was a 10/10. I also want to thank the whole team for my birthday surprise. I really appreciate it. Also special thanks to Xiao Qin for taking care of our room. 😊

title: Best service ever!!
desc: Great hotel. Lots of greenery, great location and nice big rooms but the staff are the best. Such excellent service from the team. Well spent a lot of time at the pool and gym which were excellent. Highly recommended.

title: Nice experience at Parkroyal hotel in SG
desc: Certainly! Here's a refined version of your review: "My experience on this trip was truly exceptional. I stayed at the Parkroyal Hotel in Singapore, and it felt like I was living in the heart of a lush forest, which was absolutely amazing. A special shoutout to Chanada at the front desk, whose warmth and friendliness made our stay even more memorable. She not only recommended some fantastic places to explore in Singapore but also impressed me with her professionalism and that infectious, adorable smile of hers. I can't wait to return to this hotel on my next visit."

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: Wonderful hotel The staff are outstanding! Nothing is too much trouble Concierge Aziff was brilliant and helped us find the greatest spot for dinner Rooms are compact but nicely appointed And their greenery covering the hotel gives it a hideaway feel in the middle of city ! Well worth staying here

title: 5 star plus
desc: All staff polite and courteous,hotel was spotless this was our 3rd visit here and it’s a central location for transport.I can’t find any fault with the hotel,the next time we visit Singapore we shall be staying here.

title: Best service
desc: Parkroyal Collection Pickering never fail to impress. It is a true sense of delightful customer service which makes you feel warm and truly valued! The reception and lounge staff are the best. They are truly the hotel’s best assets! Thanks very much!

title: Special Hotel, Cuisine and Architecture
desc: Couldn’t be better! Magnificent hotel in a special place in Singapore! Staff is amazingly efficient and gentle! Mr. Aziff Bell was of enormous help during our stay! The hotel is close to MRT also!

title: Excellent hotel, highly recommend.
desc: I stayed with my 10 year old son and we had a fabulous stay. We were made to feel very welcome. Highly recommend. We also found the pool to be a lovely cool temperature amongst the heat and humidity. We used it in the afternoon and at night and it was very much appreciated. All of the staff were very friendly and accommodating. We will definitely return.

title: Travel to Singapore
desc: Very professional services and very helpful all of them, beautiful place with excellent atmosphere, I will choose this hotel again in the future, the rooms was clean internet reception excellent and they had smoking area near to the reception

title: Family Holiday
desc: Excellent hotel in a great location with excellent staff who are extremely friendly and helpful. Brent helped lost the app Grabe for taxis and the staff in the Lounge were extremely friendly and made us very welcome.

title: Best Hotel In Singapore
desc: Excellant Service, great food and drink, highest cleaning standards and amazinging staff. Treated as an individual throughout my stay, check in and out where seamless, the staff where very friendly and attentive I would recommend this hotel to anyone

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Service for my wedding banquet was great. Special shout-out to my wedding coordinator, Felinda and banquet manager, Mr Vasu. Felinda was very prompt in replying to our queries and checked in on us regularly to ensure everything was going well weeks before the AD. My friend had a bit of an unpleasant experience with one of the part-time staff during the banquet, but Felinda and her team quickly sorted it out and attended to him. Mr Vasu was very attentive and my bridesmaids raved about how he went the extra mile to help with the reception decor. Overall, we are very pleased with our experience and we are so glad that we chose to go with PRP for this once-in-a-lifetime occasion.

title: An enjoyable relaxing weekend with my family!
desc: We had an enjoyable weekend and we were truly impressed with Hui Wen from Front Desk. How she handled our request for upgrading with professionalism and always with a smile. She also went the extra mile by checking and updating us on the availability of the rooms. Uncle Ang, the housekeeper who came up with the items was all smiles and even made sure we had what we requested and even made sure that the message was passed over to his other colleagues. After which we made our way to the Collection Club Lounge. Over there we made our acquaintance with Ana. She was so sweet and recommended drinks for myself and my family. I think overall we were bought over with their smiles and friendliness. The staff really made our stay there welcomed and we would love to go back and stay with

title: Great hotel, great stay
desc: It’s the first time visit to this hotel and won’t be the last. We were greeted by the manager as a Platinum level member and escorted to our room. The room was very spacious, clean and the view exceptional. We had afternoon tea in the club lounge which was very good. Evening cocktails and finger food in club lounge was again excellent. The staff were amazing, unfortunately I do not know the names of the two Philippines ladies that served us (Monday 18 September) they went way beyond their duties and made us feel so welcome. Big thanks to them to teach us to do selfies and groupies😁. We will without doubt return to this hotel on our next visit to Singapore. Once again warm thanks to all the staff. Neil & Connie Franklin
